NK106(me)012:1: // tri bi sh+r+aa n+ta k+aa y+aa n+aam sa m+aa ny+aa
NK106(me)012:2: r+tha su b+h+aa sh+wi tam sa mu dra n+aa ma
NK106(me)012:4: ngal gso skor gsum gyi spyi don legs bshad rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
NK106(me)012:6: legs pa'i yon tan du mas rab brgyan zhing //
NK106(me)012:7: phan bde'i rang bzhin 'gro ba yongs la khyab //
NK106(me)012:8: bde gshegs chos dang 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la //
NK106(me)012:9: bdag gzhan dus rnams kun tu phyag 'tshal lo //
NK106(me)012:10: srid lam dub pa dag gis 'gron po rnams //
NK106(me)012:11: gdung sel zhi ba phan bde'i snying po can //
NK106(me)012:12: dam chos rin chen ngal gso gsum dag la //
NK106(me)012:13: thog mar 'jug pa'i bshad thabs yan lag spro //
NK106(me)012:14: de la bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' rab 'byams kun
NK106(me)012:15: gyi snying po'i don gang zag gis ji ltar nyams
NK106(me)012:16: su blang ba'i rim pa phyogs gcig tu bsdebs pa
NK106(me)012:17: / theg pa chen po'i man ngag gi bstan bcos
NK106(me)012:18: ngal gso skor gsum zhes bya ba rgya cher bshad
NK106(me)012:20: gzhung bshad pa la 'jug pa spyi'i don /
NK106(me)012:21: bshad bya gzhung gi don dngos rgya cher bshad pa'o //
NK106(me)012:23: chos byung ba'i tshul spyir bshad pa dang /
NK106(me)012:24: skabs kyi don bye brag tu bshad pa'o //
NK106(me)012:26: rgyu mtshan nyid kyi theg pa /
NK106(me)012:28: de dag la bshad cing nyan pa'i tshul lo //
NK106(me)012:29: dang po rgyu mtshan nyid kyi theg pa spyir byung ba'i tshul la gsum ste /
NK106(me)012:30: dang po sangs rgyas kyi byon tshul /
NK106(me)012:32: tha mar bstan bcos kyi mdzad tshul lo //
NK106(me)012:33: dang po la'ang theg pa che chung gnyis las /
NK106(me)012:34: nyan thos pa ltar na bdag cag gi ston pa
NK106(me)012:35: 'di bskal pa grangs med pa gsum 'das pa'i sngon
NK106(me)012:36: rol du sangs rgyas sh+aakya thub pa chen po'i drung
NK106(me)012:38: tshogs lam chung ngu'i rten de nyid la tshogs gnyis
NK106(me)012:39: goms pa phul du phyin pa'i mthar dga' ldan nas
NK106(me)012:40: dzam+bu'i gling du gshegs te lam lnga mngon du mdzad
NK106(me)012:41: nas sangs rgyas te chos kyi 'khor lo rim pa
NK106(me)012:43: dgung lo brgyad cu la mya ngan las 'das te
NK106(me)012:44: da lta lhag ma med pa'i dbyings na bzhugs par
NK106(me)012:45: 'dod do // de'ang sems bskyed nas rdo rje'i gdan
NK106(me)012:46: du mnyam par bzhag pa'i bar la so so'i skye
NK106(me)012:47: bo dbang po rnon po brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs
NK106(me)012:48: 'dod do // pa zhig / bsam gtan bzhi pa'i
NK106(me)012:49: ting nge 'dzin mngon du mdzad pa'i mthar sangs rgyas
NK106(me)012:50: 'dod do // pa zhig / pa las / so so'i skye bo yin par /
NK106(me)012:52: 'phags pa min yang pha ma dang //
NK106(me)012:53: nad pa dang ni chos smra dang //
NK106(me)012:54: skye matha'i byang chub sems dpa' la //
NK106(me)012:55: yon ni gzhal du med par gsungs //
NK106(me)012:57: stan thog gcig tu lam lnga mngon du mdzad pa yang /
NK106(me)012:59: ston dang bse ru byang chub pa //
NK106(me)012:60: bsam gtan mtha' rten gcig la kun //
NK106(me)012:62: theg pa chen po pa la'ang kha cig ltar na grangs med gsum gyi sngon rol du /
NK106(me)012:63: sangs rgyas sh+aakya thub pa chen po dang /
NK106(me)012:65: rin chen tog rnams rim gyis byon pa la sems bskyed de /
NK106(me)012:66: grangs med dang po la tshogs sbyor gnyis su so so skye bo'i sas bsdus pa'i tshogs gnyis dang /
NK106(me)012:67: sa dang po nas bdun pa'i bar grangs med gnyis pa dang /
NK106(me)012:68: dag pas gsum la grangs med tha ma ste 'phags
NK106(me)012:69: pa slob lam gyis bsdus pa'i tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i
NK106(me)012:70: mthar 'og min du sangs rgyas te sprul pas mdzad
NK106(me)012:71: pa bcu gnyis bstan nas don mdzad par 'dod do
NK106(me)012:72: // de'ang 'og min du sangs rgyas par /
NK106(me)012:73: chos dang longs spyod mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i mdo las /
NK106(me)012:74: rin chen sna tshogs mdzes pa yi //
NK106(me)012:75: 'og min gnas ni nyams dga' bar //
NK106(me)012:76: gtsang ma'i gnas kyi steng bzhugs te //
NK106(me)012:77: yang dag sangs rgyas der sangs rgyas //
NK106(me)012:80: kha cig gi ltar na bskal pa grangs med bsam
NK106(me)012:81: gyis mi khyab pa'i sngon rol du sangs rgyas nas
NK106(me)012:82: / slar yang gdul bya'i don du sems bskyed pa dang /
NK106(me)012:83: tshogs gsog pa dang mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi tshul ston par 'dod de /
NK106(me)012:84: yab sras mjal ba'i mdo las /
NK106(me)012:85: sngon 'das pa'i dus bskal pa dpag tu med pa'i
NK106(me)012:86: gong rol du 'jig rten gyi khams gang+g+aa'i klung gi
NK106(me)012:87: bye ma snyed kyi zhing gcig tu gyur pa der
NK106(me)012:88: / de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog ces bya
NK106(me)012:89: bar sangs rgyas nas don mdzad de zhes pa nas
NK106(me)012:90: / / dpa' bo chen po thabs mkhas che //
NK106(me)012:91: sems can yongs su smin mdzad phyir //
NK106(me)012:92: bye ba phrag brgyar rgyal ba nyid //
NK106(me)012:93: sangs rgyas nyid du bstan gyur kyang //
NK106(me)012:94: da dung yang ni 'dren pa khyod //
NK106(me)012:95: sangs rgyas mang po ston par mdzad //
NK106(me)012:96: ces pa'i bar du gsungs so //
NK106(me)012:97: lugs 'di gnyis thun mong dang thun mong ma yin
NK106(me)012:98: pa'i tshul du gnas shing nges pa'i don la phyi
NK106(me)012:102: nga ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
NK106(me)012:103: mang po'i gong rol du mngon par rdzogs par sangs
NK106(me)012:105: bskal pa bye stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa //
NK106(me)012:106: de yi tshad ni nam yang med pas na //
NK106(me)012:107: byang chub mchog rab 'di ni ngas thob ste //
NK106(me)012:108: nga ni rtag tu chos kyang rab 'chad do //
NK106(me)012:110: de la skabs 'dir mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyis sangs rgyas pa'i tshul ni /
NK106(me)012:112: chos kyi sku las ma g.yos par //
NK106(me)012:113: sprul pa'i rang bzhin sna tshogs kyis //
NK106(me)012:114: skye ba mngon par skye ba dang //
NK106(me)012:115: dga' ldan gnas nas 'pho ba dang //
NK106(me)012:116: lhums su 'jug dang bltams pa dang //
NK106(me)012:117: bzo yi gnas la mkhas pa dang //
NK106(me)012:118: btsun mo'i 'khor dgyes rol pa dang //
NK106(me)012:119: nges 'byung dka' ba spyod pa dang //
NK106(me)012:120: byang chub snying por gshegs pa dang //
NK106(me)012:121: bdud sde bcom dang rdzogs par ni //
NK106(me)012:122: byang chub chos kyi 'khor lo dang //
NK106(me)012:123: mya ngan 'da' bar ston mdzad rnams //
NK106(me)012:124: yongs su ma dag zhing rnams su //
NK106(me)012:125: srid pa ji srid gnas par ston //
NK106(me)012:127: dang po dga' ldan nas 'pho ba'i mdzad pa ni /
NK106(me)012:128: bdag cag gi ston pa 'di dga' ldan gyi lha'i
NK106(me)012:129: gnas ris bzang po na lha'i bu dam pa tog
NK106(me)012:130: dkar po zhes bya bar skye ba bzung bar gyur
NK106(me)012:132: de'i tshe lha rnams la chos ston pa las /
NK106(me)012:133: 'khor gyi khyams su rol mo'i sgra las tshigs su bcad pa rang byung ba /
NK106(me)012:134: bsod nams brgya yi tshogs mnga' dran stobs dang //
NK106(me)012:135: blo gros mtha' yas shes rab 'od mdzad pa //
NK106(me)012:136: mtshungs med stobs mnga' sgyu rtsal rgya che ba //
NK106(me)012:137: mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan dgongs par mdzod //
NK106(me)012:138: ces pa sogs kyis bskul ba na /
NK106(me)012:139: chos kyis mtho ba zhes bya ba'i khang bzang du
NK106(me)012:140: seng ge'i khri rab tu bzang po la bzhugs te
NK106(me)012:141: / lha'i bu skal pa mnyam pa rnams la chos ston cing //
NK106(me)012:142: gzigs pa rnam pa lnga la gzigs nas /
NK106(me)012:143: byang chub sems dpa' lo bcu gnyis na dzam+b+au'i gling du gshegs so zhes de dag gis thos pas /
NK106(me)012:144: dzam+b+au'i gling du rig byed klog tu 'jug go //
NK106(me)012:145: de yang gzigs pa rnam pa lnga ni /
NK106(me)012:151: sangs rgyas gang las 'byon pa'i rigs ni rgyal rigs
NK106(me)012:152: dang bram ze gnyis las rgyal rigs la gzigs pa
NK106(me)012:153: dang / gling rnams las mchog tu gyur pa dzam+b+au'i gling las kyi sa pa la gzigs /
NK106(me)012:154: bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi
NK106(me)012:155: yab dang yum du gyur pa rgyal po zas gtsang
NK106(me)012:156: ma dang btsun mo sgyu 'phrul ma gnyis la gzigs
NK106(me)012:157: / dus ni tshe lo brgya pa yan chad du
NK106(me)012:158: sems can rnams skyo shas chung bas bden pa rtogs
NK106(me)012:163: sems can snyigs ma dang lnga bdo bas sgro skur
NK106(me)012:164: gyi gnas su gyur pa'i phyir byon yang don du
NK106(me)012:165: mi 'gyur bas / tshe lo brgyad cu pa'i dus
NK106(me)012:166: la gzigs te dga' ldan nas gshegs par bzhed de
NK106(me)012:168: ba'i sgo brgya rtsa brgyad pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs
NK106(me)012:169: mi 'gyur bas / / gsungs te / de la
NK106(me)012:170: dad pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste sems rnyog
NK106(me)012:172: mchog tu dga' bas ni lus sems sbyangs par 'gyur zhing /
NK106(me)012:173: dga' bas las su rung bar 'gyur la /
NK106(me)012:174: lus ngag yid gsum bsdoms pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran par 'gyur ba dang /
NK106(me)012:175: de dag gis mi dge ba bcu dag pa dang
NK106(me)012:176: sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la
NK106(me)012:178: de'i tshe lha'i bu rnams las kha cig gis ni byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do //
NK106(me)012:179: kha cig gis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo //
NK106(me)012:180: kha cig gis ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rnam par dag go //
NK106(me)012:181: de'i tshe me tog gi char pus nub tsam bab ste /
NK106(me)012:182: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK106(me)012:183: gang gi tshe na dga' ldan gnas mchog nas //
NK106(me)012:184: 'dren pa seng ge'i skyes bu 'chi 'pho ste //
NK106(me)012:185: lha rnams dag la tshig tu smra ba ni //
NK106(me)012:186: bag med mtha' dag rnam par spangs zhes smras //
NK106(me)012:187: lha yi dga' ba rnam mang ji snyed pa //
NK106(me)012:188: yid kyi bsams pa las 'byung dpal ldan kun //
NK106(me)012:189: thams cad las dge'i rgyu las byung bas te //
NK106(me)012:190: de ni dge ba'i las kyi 'bras bu yin //
NK106(me)012:191: de lta bas na byas pa gzo bar gyis //
NK106(me)012:192: sngon gyi dge ba 'dir ni zad gyur te //
NK106(me)012:193: gang du mi dge'i sdug bsngal myong gyur nas //
NK106(me)012:194: ngan song dag tu ltung bar 'gyur ta re //
NK106(me)012:196: nyid kyi cod pan byams pa'i dbu la bzhag ste rgyal tshab tu bskos nas /
NK106(me)012:197: kho bo cha lugs ji lta bus dzam+b+au'i gling du 'gro bar bya zhes dris pa na /
NK106(me)012:202: zla ba la sogs pa lhar byed pa de dag gi cha byad du gshegs par smras pa las /
NK106(me)012:203: lha'i bu gzi brjid dam pa na re /
NK106(me)012:204: de ni mi bzang ste so so'i phyogs su lhung ba'i phyir ro //
NK106(me)012:205: de nas bram ze'i rig byed las /
NK106(me)012:206: glang chen dam pa lus chen mchog gyur pa //
NK106(me)012:207: mche ba drug ldan gser gyi dra bas g.yogs //
NK106(me)012:208: mgo bo rab tu dmar zhing shin tu mdzes //
NK106(me)012:209: 'gram bzang zag cing gzugs bzang ldan pa'o //
NK106(me)012:210: zhes 'byung ba ltar sprul te gshegs par rigs so zhes smras so //
NK106(me)012:211: lhums su zhugs pa'i mdzad pa ni /
NK106(me)012:212: de nas glang po'i mchog tu sprul te /
NK106(me)012:213: byi ba lo dpyid zla tha chung skar ma sa gas nya ba la /
NK106(me)012:214: yum gso sbyong la gnas pa'i glo g.yas nas lhums su zhugs te /
NK106(me)012:215: lhums gzhal yas khang du byin gyis brlabs nas /
NK106(me)012:216: lha mi khrag khrig bye ba mang po la skye gnas yongs su sbyong ba'i chos bstan to //
NK106(me)012:217: de'i tshe yum gyi rmi lam byung ba yab la smras pa /
NK106(me)012:218: glang po kha ba dngul mdog mche ba drug /
NK106(me)012:219: rkang lag rab mdzes mgo bo dmar sdug cing //
NK106(me)012:220: 'gros bzang lus rdzogs rdo rje bzhin brtan pa //
NK106(me)012:221: glang po'i mchog cig khong du song snyam byed //
NK106(me)012:223: sku bltams pa'i mdzad pa ni /
NK106(me)012:224: de nas zla ba bcu lon pa na lum+bi n+ai'i tshal du gshegs nas /
NK106(me)012:225: blag sha'i yal ga la yum gyis bzung ste /
NK106(me)012:226: gnod pa med par rtsib ma'i go bar nas na bza' dang bcas te sku bltams pa'i tshe /
NK106(me)012:227: lha'i bu rnams kyis sku khrus gsol nas /
NK106(me)012:228: len pa med par rang byon te phyogs bzhir gom
NK106(me)012:229: pa bdun bdun bor bas pad+ma bdun bdun byung zhing
NK106(me)012:230: / nga ni 'jig rten 'di na mchog yin no //
NK106(me)012:232: bar snang gi lhas bstod pa /
NK106(me)012:233: gang tshe rkang gnyis gtso bo mchog bltams tshe //
NK106(me)012:234: sa chen 'di la gom pa bdun gshegs te //
NK106(me)012:235: nga ni 'jig rten 'di na mchog ces gsungs //
NK106(me)012:236: de tshe mkhas pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK106(me)012:238: de'i tshe lum+bi n+ai'i tshal du me tog rnams kha rang bye /
NK106(me)012:239: kun dga' bo la sogs pa sh+aakya gzhon nu lnga brgya yang btsas /
NK106(me)012:240: sngags ldan la sogs pa rta'i mchog lnga brgya yang btsas /
NK106(me)012:241: 'jig rten dus g.yo ba dang 'od zer gyi snang ba chen po yang byung /
NK106(me)012:242: khams kyi rgyal phran bzhi la yang bu bzhi btsas te /
NK106(me)012:243: ma ga d+h+aa'i rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na
NK106(me)012:244: rgyal po pad+ma chen po'i bu gzugs can snying po
NK106(me)012:245: / ko sa la'am mnyan yod na rgyal po rtsibs kyis 'phur tshangs byin gyi bu gsal rgyal /
NK106(me)012:246: grong khyer 'phags rgyal lam rdo mchog tu rgyal po mu khyud mtha' yas kyi bu rab snang /
NK106(me)012:247: koo sham+b+hi'i ba ta sa lar rgyal po dmag brgya pa'i bu shar pa ste /
NK106(me)012:248: so so na 'od zer gyi snang ba byung ba
NK106(me)012:249: dag rang rang gi bu'i ltas su 'dod nas de
NK106(me)012:251: bltams nas zhag bdun na yum 'das te skye dgu'i
NK106(me)012:252: bdag mo la sogs pa ma ma sum cu rtsa
NK106(me)012:253: gnyis la gtad nas mtsho chen po la gnas pa'i
NK106(me)012:255: mtshan mkhan so so la bstan pas de dag na
NK106(me)012:256: re rab tu ma byung na 'khor los sgyur ba'i
NK106(me)012:258: rab tu byung na lha dang mi rnams kyi ston
NK106(me)012:259: pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro zhes
NK106(me)012:260: lung bstan to // de'i tshe ri rab kyi ngos
NK106(me)012:261: nas drang srong nyon mongs med ces bya ba 'khor
NK106(me)012:262: snag gi tsha bo mes byin dang lhan cig pho
NK106(me)012:263: brang du 'ongs pa des rgyal ba'i drung du 'ongs
NK106(me)012:265: rgyal pos sngar gyi lo rgyus rnams brjod pas /
NK106(me)012:267: sa bdag rtog pa po rnams blo 'khrul te //
NK106(me)012:268: rtsod pa'i dus su 'khor los sgyur mi 'byung //
NK106(me)012:269: bsod nams mchog gi chos kyi mdzod 'di ni //
NK106(me)012:270: nyes las rnam par rgyal nas sangs rgyas 'gyur //
NK106(me)012:271: zhes lung bstan te rang gi gnas su song ngo //
NK106(me)012:272: de'i tshe yab rgyal po'i dgongs pa thams cad grub
NK106(me)012:273: pas mtshan yang gzhon nu don thams cad grub par
NK106(me)012:274: btags / sh+aakya gzhon nu mu cor smra ba rnams thub pas sh+aakya thub pa zhes mtshan gsol to //
NK106(me)012:275: bzo'i gnas la mkhas pa'i mdzad pa ni /
NK106(me)012:276: de nas yig dpon kun gyi bshes gnyen dang /
NK106(me)012:277: srin bu go cha la sogs pa la yi ge dang /
NK106(me)012:280: sgyu rtsal la sogs pa slob pa'i tshul bstan nas pho brang na bzhugs pa las /
NK106(me)012:281: yab kyis sh+aakya lag na be con la sogs pa
NK106(me)012:282: gsum la bu mo rgyal bu'i btsun mor bslangs pa
NK106(me)012:283: las / de dag na re sh+aakya pa rnams kyi
NK106(me)012:284: lugs kyi 'phong dang sgyu rtsal phun sum tshogs pa
NK106(me)012:285: yod pa de la sbyin na /
NK106(me)012:286: gzhon nu 'di la ji ltar rung zer ba las /
NK106(me)012:287: rgyal po thugs ma bde ba na gzhon nus smras pa /
NK106(me)012:288: 'jig rten gsum nang las ches mchog tu gyur pa'i 'phong dang sgyu rtsal mnga' ba gzhan med pas /
NK106(me)012:289: ser skya'i gnas na bdag la 'gran par nus pa
NK106(me)012:290: yod na grong khyer gyi phyir dengs shig ces dril
NK106(me)012:291: bsgrags pa las / lhas byin khros te glang po
NK106(me)012:292: che thal mos bsnun nas shi ba'i ro sgo khang
NK106(me)012:293: nas gcung dga' bos phyir bor nas gnas pa'i mjug
NK106(me)012:294: ma zhabs kyi mthe bos bzung ste shing rta las
NK106(me)012:296: ra ba bdun 'das te ljongs zhig tu 'chags pa las /
NK106(me)012:298: glang po'i dbang po rdo ba bzhin du bzhud //
NK106(me)012:299: zhabs kyi mthe bos glang po'i dbang po blangs //
NK106(me)012:300: ra ba bdun dang 'obs bdun yongs 'das te //
NK106(me)012:301: grong khyer 'di yi phyi rol rgyang ring 'phangs //
NK106(me)012:302: mkhyen pa mchog mnga' 'di ni gdon mi za //
NK106(me)012:303: nga rgyal stobs kyis thob pa'i lus can rnams //
NK106(me)012:304: 'khor ba'i grong las phyi rol rgyang ring du //
NK106(me)012:305: shes rab stobs kyis 'dis ni 'phen par 'gyur //
NK106(me)012:307: de nas shing ta la'i ljon pa bdun /
NK106(me)012:309: lcags kyi pha gu bdun te nyi shu rtsa gcig btsugs pa la mda' 'phangs pa na /
NK106(me)012:312: byang chub sems dpas thams cad phigs pa'i phyir thal
NK106(me)012:313: ba las mda' phyung ba'i shul nas mda' chu khron
NK106(me)012:314: pa skyes zhes bya ba chu yan lag brgyad dang
NK106(me)012:316: btsun mo'i 'khor dgyes rol pa'i mdzad pa ni /
NK106(me)012:317: de nas sh+aakya lag na be con gyi bu mo sa 'tsho ma 'khor nyi khri /
NK106(me)012:318: sh+aakya lag na dril bu sgra'i bu mo grags 'dzin ma 'khor nyi khri /
NK106(me)012:319: sh+aakya zas dkar gyi bu mo ri dgas skyes 'khor nyi khri ste /
NK106(me)012:320: btsun mo drug khri khab tu bzhes nas 'dod pa'i
NK106(me)012:321: yon tan lnga la spyod cing pho brang na bzhugs
NK106(me)012:322: so // nges par 'byung ba'i mdzad pa ni /
NK106(me)012:323: de'i tshe sil snyan gyi sgra las /
NK106(me)012:324: sdug bsngal brgyas gang sems can mthong nas ni //
NK106(me)012:325: 'gro ba'i mgon dang skyabs dang gnas gyur cing //
NK106(me)012:326: phan byed mgon dang dpung gnyen gyur cig ces //
NK106(me)012:327: khyod kyis sngon gyi smon lam de skad btab //
NK106(me)012:328: dge ba dpa' bo sngon gyi spyod pa dang //
NK106(me)012:329: 'gro phan bya zhes smon btab dran par byos //
NK106(me)012:331: 'chi med mya ngan med na sangs rgyas te //
NK106(me)012:332: sgom pas nyam thag bdud rtsis tshim bya zhing //
NK106(me)012:333: khyod kyis sngon smras tshig mthong dran byas nas //
NK106(me)012:334: grong khyer dam pa'i 'di nas myur du byung //
NK106(me)012:336: nges par 'byung bar mos te 'dun pas shing rta'i
NK106(me)012:337: kha lo byas nas grong khyer gyi phyogs bzhir byon
NK106(me)012:338: pa las / skye rga na 'chi'i chu bo bzhi dang /
NK106(me)012:339: de las thar pa'i lam du zhugs pa'i dge sbyong gi gzugs su chas pa mthong nas /
NK106(me)012:341: gal te 'di gsum yod med na //
NK106(me)012:342: bdag kyang shin tu yid 'ong ba'i //
NK106(me)012:343: yul rnams la ni dga' bar byed //
NK106(me)012:344: ces de dag gi sdug bsngal la sems shing zhag
NK106(me)012:345: bdun bdun pho brang gi nang du phyir log ste
NK106(me)012:346: bzhugs nas nges par 'byung bar dam bcas pa na
NK106(me)012:347: / grong khyer gyi khor yug dmag gis bsrungs nas gshegs su ma ster ba'i nub tha ma la /
NK106(me)012:348: yab la phyag byas te sngags ldan gyi steng du
NK106(me)012:349: chibs pa'i rta rmig bzhi nas rgyal po chen po
NK106(me)012:350: bzhis bteg nas nam mkha' la byon nas /
NK106(me)012:351: mchod rten rnam dag gi drung du nyid kyi dbu skra nyid kyis bzhar nas rab tu byung ste /
NK106(me)012:352: rta dang rgyal po'i chas rnams phyir slog /
NK106(me)012:353: dbu skra sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lhas gdan drangs
NK106(me)012:354: nas dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten du byas
NK106(me)012:355: / sha na'i gos dang ngur smrig barjesa nas gsol te /
NK106(me)012:356: yangs pa can du sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring
NK106(me)012:357: phur las ci yang med pa man chad kyi ting
NK106(me)012:358: nge 'dzin bslabs shing bsgom pa'i tshul bstan /
NK106(me)012:359: rgyal po'i khab tu rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod
NK106(me)012:360: las srid pa'i rtse mo man chad kyi ting nge
NK106(me)012:361: 'dzin bslabs shing de dag gi 'khor stong dang bcas
NK106(me)012:362: pa la slar lung 'bogs shing slob dpon gyi go
NK106(me)012:364: dka' ba spyad pa'i mdzad pa ni /
NK106(me)012:365: ting nge 'dzin dang kun tu spyod pa de dag
NK106(me)012:366: gis kyang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mtha' dag las mi
NK106(me)012:368: lnga sde bzang po dang bcas nas chu klung nee
NK106(me)012:369: rany+dza na'i 'gram du mkha' khyab kyi ting nge 'dzin
NK106(me)012:370: la mnyam par bzhag nas lo drug tu dka' ba
NK106(me)012:372: de yang lo dang po gnyis la 'bras nyag ma re /
NK106(me)012:373: bar pa gnyis la chu thigs pa re /
NK106(me)012:374: tha ma gnyis la ci yang ma gsol bar bzhugs zhes grag go //
NK106(me)012:375: byang chub snying por gshegs pa'i mdzad pa ni /
NK106(me)012:376: de'i tshe nam mkha' la gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis 'di skad du /
NK106(me)012:377: mi yi dbang po sh+aakya'i sras po 'di //
NK106(me)012:378: gnag pa ma rdzogs don yang ma mdzad cing //
NK106(me)012:379: 'jig rten gsum po sdug bsngal mgon med par //
NK106(me)012:380: mdzad nas mgon 'di 'grongs par mi 'gyur ram //
NK106(me)012:382: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpas kyang bskul ba /
NK106(me)012:383: dka' thub 'di lam bzang po ma yin pas 'di
NK106(me)012:384: las bzhengs te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sangs
NK106(me)012:385: rgyas thob par gyis shig ces gsungs pas /
NK106(me)012:386: de las bzhengs te kha zas rags pa gsol ba'i tshul bstan pa las /
NK106(me)012:387: lnga sde bzang po ma mos te w+aa r+aa na s+air spong ba la song ngo //
NK106(me)012:388: de nas ri ga ya'i rtser gshegs te /
NK106(me)012:389: ting nge 'dzin sgom par chas pa las /
NK106(me)012:390: brag ral zhing sa g.yos pa na /
NK106(me)012:391: gnas gzhan tshol cig par dgongs te ma ga d+h+aa rdo rje'i gdan du gshegs so //
NK106(me)012:392: rdo rje'i gdan de yang nyan thos pa ltar na
NK106(me)012:393: dbang chen gser gyi sa gzhi la thug gi bar
NK106(me)012:394: du rgyu rin po che sna tshogs las grub cing
NK106(me)012:395: / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa las rang byung ba /
NK106(me)012:396: 'og rdo rje rgya gram du gnas pa'i lte ba las byang chub kyi shing skyes pa /
NK106(me)012:397: rdo rje'i rtse mo bzhi'i steng na rdo rje phur
NK106(me)012:398: pa'i mchod rten bzhi yod pa'i shing gi drung na
NK106(me)012:399: khri 'dom gsum pa yod par 'dod la /
NK106(me)012:400: theg pa chen po pa ltar na rdo rje rtse
NK106(me)012:401: lnga pa gyen du langs pa'i khong gseng nas byang
NK106(me)012:403: ra bzhi la rdo rje phur pa'i mchod rten bzhi gnas pa /
NK106(me)012:404: mchod rten bzhi'i bar gyi thang la mda' rgyang 'bring
NK106(me)012:405: po re yod pa'i dbus na rdo rje pha lam
NK106(me)012:406: las grub pa'i gdan khri rgyar phyogs re la 'dom
NK106(me)012:407: gsum gsum dpangs su khru gsum gsum gyi dbus nas
NK106(me)012:408: byang chub kyi shing skyes pa /
NK106(me)012:409: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa las grub pa /
NK106(me)012:410: 'jig pa'i bskal pa byung yang me bdun chu gcig
NK106(me)012:411: gis mi 'jig par nam mkha' la zo ba dpyangs
NK106(me)012:412: pa bzhin du gnas par 'dod do //
NK106(me)012:413: der bzhud pa'i lam na bram ze'i bu mo legs
NK106(me)012:414: skyes mas ba men lnga brgya'i 'o ma nying brgyud
NK106(me)012:415: du bsings pa bskol te drangs pas sku lus gser
NK106(me)012:416: gyi gtan pa phyis pa bzhin du gyur cing /
NK106(me)012:417: gsol ba phul ba'i bsod nams ci mchis pa //
NK106(me)012:418: grags dang ldan pa'i don kun grub 'gyur ba //
NK106(me)012:419: mi yi dbang po blo mchog ldan pa de'i //
NK106(me)012:420: don rnams thams cad myur du 'grub gyur cig /
NK106(me)012:421: ces smon lam rnam par dag pa gzhan don du btab bo //
NK106(me)012:422: de nas gshegs te r+ts+wa 'tshong bkra shis ldan las
NK106(me)012:423: r+ts+wa bzhes pa bsnams nas rdo rje'i gdan du byon
NK106(me)012:424: / bdud kyi sde bcom pa'i mdzad pa ni /
NK106(me)012:425: de nas r+ts+wa de dag rdo rje'i gdan la bting
NK106(me)012:426: nas skyil mo krung mdzad de dam bca' ba brtan
NK106(me)012:427: po mdzad pa / ji srid zag med ma thob par //
NK106(me)012:428: de srid skyil krung gzhig mi bya //
NK106(me)012:430: stan 'dir bdag gi lus 'di bskams kyang rung //
NK106(me)012:431: pags pa rus pa'i tshogs rnams zhig kyang rung //
NK106(me)012:432: bskal mang rnyed daka'i byang chub ma thob par //
NK106(me)012:433: stan 'di las ni lus bskyod mi bya'o //
NK106(me)012:435: de nas srod kyi cha la bdud 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas /
NK106(me)012:436: 'od zer kun du 'gyed par mdzad pa las /
NK106(me)012:437: bdud kyi gnas thams cad dkrogs shing dpa' bkong bar gyur te /
NK106(me)012:438: ma bzod nas bdud kyi rgyal po dga' rab dbang
NK106(me)012:439: phyug rngon pa'i cha byad du bardzusa pa byang chub
NK106(me)012:440: sems dpa'i drung du 'ongs nas smras pa /
NK106(me)012:442: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK106(me)012:443: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i slad du'o //
NK106(me)012:445: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba la tshogs dpag tu med pa rdzogs dgos pa ma yin nam /
NK106(me)012:446: khyod kyis ni rgyal po'i bu skyid bder gnas pa tsam las ci yang ma byas so //
NK106(me)012:447: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK106(me)012:448: khyod kyis gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin gcig byas
NK106(me)012:449: pas kyang 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug chen por
NK106(me)012:450: gyur na / ngas bskal pa dpag tu med par
NK106(me)012:451: tshogs gnyis rdzogs par byas pas ci'i phyir 'tshang mi
NK106(me)012:452: gyur na / rgya / bdud kyis mdzub mo gnyis gyen du bsgrengs te smras pa /
NK106(me)012:453: ngas ni 'di na mchod sbyin gtan pa med //
NK106(me)012:454: byas pa la ni khyod nyid dpang yin na //
NK106(me)012:455: khyod la 'di na dpang 'ga' yod min pas //
NK106(me)012:456: smras kyang dpang med khyod ni yi pham yin //
NK106(me)012:458: de nas byang chub sems dpas phyag bsod nams brgya las grub pa sa la brdabs nas /
NK106(me)012:459: sa 'di 'gro ba kun gyi gnas yin te //
NK106(me)012:460: rgyu dang mi rgyu snyoms shing nye 'khon med //
NK106(me)012:461: 'di ni bdag gi dpang ste bdag brdzun med //
NK106(me)012:462: 'di la khyod ni bdag gi dpang byos shig /
NK106(me)012:463: ces gsungs ma thag tu sa'i lha mo brtan ma
NK106(me)012:464: sku mdog gser btso ma lta bu lus phyed sa
NK106(me)012:465: las 'thon te / phyag tu rdul phra rab cig bsnams nas /
NK106(me)012:466: ngas sa'i dkyil khor chen po 'di 'di tsam du
NK106(me)012:467: grangs kyis bgrang ba ni tshad bzung du rung gi
NK106(me)012:468: / rigs kyi bu 'dis mgo dang yan lag byin
NK106(me)012:469: pa ni bgrang bar mi nus pas mngon par rdzogs
NK106(me)012:470: par sangs rgyas pa'i dus la bab bo zhes brjod
NK106(me)012:471: nas mi snang bar gyur pa dang /
NK106(me)012:472: bdud skyengs shing yu yu por gyur nas rang gi gnas su song ste /
NK106(me)012:473: bdud kyi dmag bye ba dang dung phyur drangs te
NK106(me)012:474: sgyu ma lta bu'i blo dang mi ldan pa rnams
NK106(me)012:475: 'jigs shing skyi bung bar byas so //
NK106(me)012:476: des na byang chub sems dpas byams pa'i ting nge
NK106(me)012:477: 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag pas mtshon cha 'phangs pa
NK106(me)012:478: thams cad ni me tog gi char du bab /
NK106(me)012:479: mi snyan pa'i sgra skad thams cad ni bstod dbyangs
NK106(me)012:480: snyan pa'i rang bzhin du gyur nas bdud kyi sgyu
NK106(me)012:481: thams cad btul ba'i tshe lhas bstod pa /
NK106(me)012:482: sh+aakya'i rgyal pos rten cing 'brel 'byung chos //
NK106(me)012:483: rang gi ngo bo med par mthong nas ni //
NK106(me)012:484: nam mkha' lta bu'i sems dang rab ldan pas //
NK106(me)012:485: g.yon can dpung bcas tshogs kyis bardzi ba min //
NK106(me)012:486: byams pa'i zer gyis bdud kyi sgyu rnams btul //
NK106(me)012:487: mtshon cha 'phangs pa me tog nyid du gyur //
NK106(me)012:489: de nas bdud kyi dmag rnams slar log pa dang /
NK106(me)012:490: bdud kyi bu mo bdun gyis chags pa'i zol gyis
NK106(me)012:491: slu bar chas pa las rgan mo bdun du gyur
NK106(me)012:492: nas slar 'gyod de bzod par gsol nas /
NK106(me)012:493: rnam dag sku lnga mchog tu gzugs bzang zhing //
NK106(me)012:494: ye shes rgya mtsho gser gyi lhun po 'dra //
NK106(me)012:495: grags pa 'jig rten gsum na lham me ba //
NK106(me)012:496: mgon po mchog gyur khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK106(me)012:497: zhes bstod pa brjod pas sngon bzhin gyur te rang gi gnas su song ngo //
NK106(me)012:498: mngon par byang chub pa'i mdzad pa ni /
NK106(me)012:499: de nas dgung gi cha la bsam gtan bzhi pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag /
NK106(me)012:500: tho rangs rnga brdung du nye ba na zad pa
NK106(me)012:501: shes pa dang mi skye ba shes pa'i ye shes
NK106(me)012:505: rig pa gsum brnyes pa de'i tshe sa chen po 'di yang rab tu g.yos /
NK106(me)012:506: 'od zer gyi snang ba grangs med pa yang byung ba na /
NK106(me)012:508: skyes bu seng ge de yis dpung bcas bdud btul te //
NK106(me)012:509: ston pa'i bsam gtan bzhi po mngon du mdzad nas ni //
NK106(me)012:510: gang tshe stobs bcu rigs pa gsum po brnyes gyur tshe //
NK106(me)012:511: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing mang bye ba g.yos par gyur //
NK106(me)012:513: de nas zhag bdun phrag bdun du chos mi gsung bar bzhugs pa las /
NK106(me)012:514: bdun phrag dang po la skyil krung ma bshig par bzhugs /
NK106(me)012:515: gnyis pa la 'dzam gling nye bar bcags /
NK106(me)012:516: gsum pa la stong gsum ring du bcags /
NK106(me)012:517: bzhi pa la byang chub kyi shing la gzigs /
NK106(me)012:518: lnga pa la klu'i rgyal po btang bzung gi gnas su gshegs /
NK106(me)012:519: drug pa la kun du rgyu rnams btul /
NK106(me)012:520: bdun pa la shing sgrol rgyu'i tshal du bzhugs te
NK106(me)012:521: tshong dpon ga gon dang bzang skyong gis sbrang rtsi
NK106(me)012:522: phul ba rgyal po bzhis rdo'i lhung bzed phul bar
NK106(me)012:523: bzhes te gsol nas shis pa brjod pa gsungs pa'i
NK106(me)012:524: rjes la / zab zhi spros bral 'od gsal 'dus ma byas //
NK106(me)012:525: bdud rtsi lta bu'i chos shig bdag gis rnyed //
NK106(me)012:526: su la bstan kyang go bar mi 'dug pas //
NK106(me)012:527: mi smra nags 'dab nyid du gnas par bya //
NK106(me)012:528: zhes gsungs te thugs las chung ngu la gzhol bar gyur to //
NK106(me)012:529: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i mdzad pa ni /
NK106(me)012:530: de nas tshangs pas sngon gyi smon lam rjes su dran nas /
NK106(me)012:531: de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du 'ongs te gsol pa /
NK106(me)012:532: ye shes chen po mchog gi dkyil 'khor bsgrubs nas ni //
NK106(me)012:533: phyogs bcu dag tu 'od zer rnam par bkye mdzad de //
NK106(me)012:534: ye shes zer gyis blo yi pad+ma kha 'byed pa //
NK106(me)012:535: smra ba'i nyi ma ci slad di ring btang snyoms bzhugs //
NK106(me)012:536: dam pa'i chos kyi rnga bo che ni brdung du gsol //
NK106(me)012:537: dam pa'i chos kyi dung ni rab tu 'bud du gsol //
NK106(me)012:538: dam pa'i chos kyi sdong bu sgreng bar mdzad du gsol //
NK106(me)012:539: dam pa'i chos kyi mar me sbar bar mdzad du gsol //
NK106(me)012:540: zhes brjod nas tsan+dana gyi phye mas gtor te rang gi gnas su song ngo //
NK106(me)012:541: de nas yang brgya byin sbran te 'ongs nas /
NK106(me)012:542: brgya byin gyis nor bu rin po che phul te gsol pa /
NK106(me)012:543: zla ba nya ba gza' las thar ba ltar //
NK106(me)012:544: thub pa khyod kyi thugs ni rnam par grol //
NK106(me)012:545: g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba bzhengs su gsol //
NK106(me)012:546: 'jig rten mun par shes rab 'od dbyung gsol //
NK106(me)012:548: de nas tshangs pas gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa phul te zhus pa /
NK106(me)012:549: g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba bzhengs su gsol //
NK106(me)012:550: 'jig rten mun par shes rab 'od dbyung gsol //
NK106(me)012:551: kun nas 'tshal bar gyur pa mchis lags kyi //
NK106(me)012:552: thub pa khyod kyis chos ni bstan du gsol //
NK106(me)012:554: de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa /
NK106(me)012:555: skye dgu 'dod pa rnams kyis bcings //
NK106(me)012:556: nyon mongs rgyun gyis rab tu brdas //
NK106(me)012:557: nga yi tshegs ni chen pos rnyed //
NK106(me)012:558: de lta bas na bstan mi phan //
NK106(me)012:559: tshangs pa nga yis tha ba kun //
NK106(me)012:560: bcom nas tshegs chen gyis rtogs pa'i //
NK106(me)012:562: dkris pas bde blag rtogs ma yin //
NK106(me)012:563: zhes gsungs nas ma gnang ba dang /
NK106(me)012:565: ma ga d+h+aa yi yul 'dir sngon chad chos //
NK106(me)012:566: ma dag dri ma rjes su 'brel ba byung //
NK106(me)012:567: bdud rtsi'i sgo mo dbye bar mdzod cig chos //
NK106(me)012:568: rdul bral dri ma med pa bshad du gsol //
NK106(me)012:570: 'khor lo bzhes te bka' stsal pa /
NK106(me)012:571: tshangs pa ma ga d+h+aa yi sems can gang //
NK106(me)012:572: rna bar ldan zhing dad dang shes rab ldan //
NK106(me)012:573: mi 'tshe 'du shes rtag tu chos nyan pa //
NK106(me)012:574: de dag la ni bdud rtsi'i sgo dabye'o //
NK106(me)012:575: zhes gsungs pa'i skad cig la /
NK106(me)012:576: de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar
NK106(me)012:577: gnang ngo zhes bya ba'i sgra de 'og min gyi
NK106(me)012:578: bar du thos te so so nas mchod pa'i tshogs
NK106(me)012:579: dang bcas pa thogs te lhags so //
NK106(me)012:580: de'i tshe lha srid mchog dang shing gi lha mo bzhis gsol pa /
NK106(me)012:581: chos kyi 'khor lo gang du bskor /
NK106(me)012:585: der ni mi rung ste ljon shing gi grib ma
NK106(me)012:586: nyung ba dang skye bo mang po'i tshogs dang mi
NK106(me)012:587: ldan pas so // bka' stsal pa /
NK106(me)012:588: der ni nga yis mchod sbyin stong phrag khrag khrig drug cus mchod //
NK106(me)012:589: w+aa r+aa na s+ai dam pa de ni sngon gyi drang srong rnams kyi gnas //
NK106(me)012:590: de phyir drang srong zhes bya'i gnas mchog der ni 'khor lo dam pa bskor //
NK106(me)012:592: sngon gyi smon lam rjes su dran pas lnga sde
NK106(me)012:593: bzang po la gzigs te w+aa r+aa ni s+air gshegs
NK106(me)012:594: pa dang / lnga sdes mi 'dud pa'i khrims su bca' ba byas so //
NK106(me)012:595: lam du bram ze nye bar 'tsho ba dang mjal nas /
NK106(me)012:597: go'u ta ma khyod kyis su la tshangs par spyad /
NK106(me)012:599: nga la mkhan po gang yang med //
NK106(me)012:600: nga dang 'dra ba yod ma yin //
NK106(me)012:601: nga ni gcig pur rdzogs sangs rgyas //
NK106(me)012:602: bsil gyur zag pa zad pa yin //
NK106(me)012:605: khyod dgra bcom pa yin nam /
NK106(me)012:607: nga nyid 'jig rten dgra bcom ste //
NK106(me)012:608: nga ni ston pa bla na med //
NK106(me)012:609: lha dang lha min dri zar bcas //
NK106(me)012:610: nga ni do zla'i gang zag med //
NK106(me)012:615: gang dag zag pa zad brnyes pa //
NK106(me)012:616: nga 'dra rgyal bar shes par gyis //
NK106(me)012:617: nga ni sdig pa'i chos las rgyal //
NK106(me)012:618: de bas nyes bcom rgyal ba yin //
NK106(me)012:623: nga ni w+aa r+aa na s+air 'gro //
NK106(me)012:624: grong khyer gsal ldan der song nas //
NK106(me)012:625: long ba lta bu'i sems can la //
NK106(me)012:626: chos kyi sgron ma spar du 'gro //
NK106(me)012:627: 'on pa lta bu'i sems can la //
NK106(me)012:628: chos kyi rnga chen brdung du 'gro //
NK106(me)012:630: w+aa r+aa na s+air byon pa las /
NK106(me)012:631: lnga sde bzang po'i khrims su bca' ba rang zhig /
NK106(me)012:632: sa phyogs der rin po che'i khri stong byung ba las /
NK106(me)012:633: dang po gsum la 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la
NK106(me)012:634: gus pa bskyed pa'i phyir phyag dang bskor ba mdzad
NK106(me)012:635: nas bzhi pa'i steng du bzhugs pas gzhan rnams mi
NK106(me)012:637: lnga sde bzang po lha brgyad khri dang bcas pa
NK106(me)012:638: la bden pa bzhi'i chos kyi 'khor lo lan gsum
NK106(me)012:639: du bldabs pas rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba
NK106(me)012:640: dang / 'khor thams cad kyis bden pa mthong /
NK106(me)012:641: lnga sde bzang po dpal rang byung gis bsnyen par rdzogs te /
NK106(me)012:642: 'jig rten na gdugs zla med pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen por gyur to //
NK106(me)012:643: de nas dang por bca' ba'i gzhi 'dul ba'i sde snod las /
NK106(me)012:644: chos gos ci nas kyang zlum por bgo bar bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
NK106(me)012:645: de nas gnas phun sum tshogs pa bya rgod phung
NK106(me)012:646: po'i ri la sogs par bka' rgyas 'bring bsdus gsum
NK106(me)012:647: la sogs pa bar pa mtshan nyid med pa'i chos
NK106(me)012:650: klu'i gnas la sogs pa nges med sna tshogs su
NK106(me)012:651: bka' tha ma nges pa don gyi chos kyi 'khor
NK106(me)012:652: lo rnams gdul bya so so'i dbang gis bskor te
NK106(me)012:653: / la lar ni gnas gcig tu'ang dbang po'i rim pas 'khor lo gsum gcig tu thos la /
NK106(me)012:654: la lar ni gdul bya gang yod pa de dag
NK106(me)012:655: gi dbang gis tha dad du thos so zhes grags
NK106(me)012:656: so // tha ma mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdzad pa ni /
NK106(me)012:657: de nas gdul bar bya ba'i skye dgu las /
NK106(me)012:658: la la ni lha dang mi'i bde ba la bkod /
NK106(me)012:659: la la ni theg pa gsum gyi lam dang lam gyi 'bras bu la bkod /
NK106(me)012:660: sku dngos su snang bas 'dul ba'i rim pa de
NK106(me)012:661: tsam du dgongs nas grong khyer r+ts+wa mchog tu gshegs
NK106(me)012:662: te mya ngan las 'da' bar dgongs pa na /
NK106(me)012:663: dpal gyi mgur nas sbrid pa zhig byung ba skye dgu'i bdag mos thos nas /
NK106(me)012:664: sangs rgyas bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du bzhugs par gyur cig cis smon lam btab pas /
NK106(me)012:665: de sa bla bas thos pa nas 'og min gyi
NK106(me)012:666: bar du skad cig la thos nas de bzhin du
NK106(me)012:668: de bzhin gshegs pas skye dgu'i bdag mo la khyod kyis ma legs pa byas /
NK106(me)012:669: bstan pa yun ring du gnas par gyur cig mi zer bar /
NK106(me)012:670: skyes bu le lo can mang po'i chos bsgrub pa'i gegs su gyur gsungs pas /
NK106(me)012:671: de'i bzod gsol du skye dgu'i bdag mo dgra bcom
NK106(me)012:672: ma lnga brgya dang bcas pa mya ngan las 'das
NK106(me)012:673: so // de'i tshe sh+aa ri'i bu dang /
NK106(me)012:674: moong+gala gyi bus dmyal ba'i gnas bltar byon pas /
NK106(me)012:675: de na mu stegs byed kyi slob dpon dang mkhan
NK106(me)012:676: po rnams skyes pa kun gyis rang re'i chos de
NK106(me)012:678: sangs rgyas pa'i chos la zhugs shig ces pa'i 'phrin bardzangasa pa khyer nas mi'i yul du byon dus /
NK106(me)012:679: lam du kun du rgyu dag dang 'phrad nas de
NK106(me)012:680: dag gis sh+aa ri'i bu la dge sbyong su la
NK106(me)012:682: dge sbyong sh+aakya'i nang na yod //
NK106(me)012:683: kun du rgyu la dge sbyong med //
NK106(me)012:684: khyed rang gi mkhan po dang slob dpon yang mnar
NK106(me)012:685: med pa'i dmyal ba na skyes pa kun 'di skad
NK106(me)012:686: zer ro zhes sngar gyi 'phrin bshad kyang sha 'khon
NK106(me)012:687: med pas mthos / phyi la moong+gala gyi bu 'ongs pa la dris pas sngar gyi ltar brjod dus /
NK106(me)012:688: 'di dag 'u cag la smra bar ma zad mkhan
NK106(me)012:689: po dang slob dpon la yang smra bar byed pas
NK106(me)012:690: choms shig ces dbyug pas sku lus 'dam bu bcom
NK106(me)012:692: de nas sh+aa ri'i bus chos gos kyi grwar gtums
NK106(me)012:693: te khur nas grong shing thag can du bskyal te
NK106(me)012:694: / mi 'tsho bar shes nas grogs po 'chi ba
NK106(me)012:695: thos par yang mi bya na mthong ba lta smos
NK106(me)012:696: kyang ci dgos zhes sh+aa ri'i bu n+aa lan+dara song
NK106(me)012:697: nas de'i snga dro dgra bcom pa bzhi stong dang
NK106(me)012:698: bcas pa mya ngan las 'das so //
NK106(me)012:699: de'i phyi dro moong+gala gyi dgra bcom pa bzhi stong dang bcas pa mya ngan las 'das so //
NK106(me)012:700: gzhan yang dgra bcom pa mang po bud shing zad pa'i me ltar mya ngan las 'das so //
NK106(me)012:701: de nas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa 'khor rnam pa
NK106(me)012:702: bzhi dang bcas pa gnas brtan 'od srungs chen po
NK106(me)012:703: la gtad de dgung lo brgyad cu dang zla ba
NK106(me)012:704: gsum mam brgyad cu rtsa gnyis na grong khyer r+ts+wa
NK106(me)012:705: can gyi shing s+aa la zung zhig rtsar dgongs pa
NK106(me)012:706: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam du
NK106(me)012:707: dgra bcom pa khri brgyad stong yang mya ngan las
NK106(me)012:708: 'das so // de nas pur ji ltar sbyang ba ma shes pa las /
NK106(me)012:709: 'od srungs chen po klu'i yul nas byon te gsol
NK106(me)012:710: ba btab pas zhugs rang 'bar te sku gdung sil
NK106(me)012:711: bur gyur to // de nas tshems mche ba bzhi
NK106(me)012:712: las dang po sum cu rtsa gsum pas gdan drangs
NK106(me)012:713: bur gyur to // / gnyis pa grong khyer tshig 'dzin gyi rgyal pos gdan drangs /
NK106(me)012:714: gsum pa ka ling+ka'i yul gyi srin pos gdan drangs /
NK106(me)012:715: bzhi pa grong khyer sgra sgrogs kyi klu'i rgyal pos gdan drangs /
NK106(me)012:716: sku gdung cha brgyad kyi dang po grong khyer r+ts+wa can gyi gyad rnams la byin /
NK106(me)012:717: gnyis pa yul sdig pa can gyi gyad la byin /
NK106(me)012:718: gsum pa yul rtog pa g.yo ba'i rgyal rigs bu lu ka chen po la byin /
NK106(me)012:719: bzhi pa grong khyer sgra sgrogs kyi rgyal rigs kro d+ha ba la byin /
NK106(me)012:720: lnga pa khyab 'jug gi gling gi bram ze la byin /
NK106(me)012:721: drug pa ser skya'i rgyal rigs sh+aakya bar gtogs pa ri brag pa rnams la byin /
NK106(me)012:722: bdun pa yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha b+ai rnams la byin /
NK106(me)012:723: brgyad pa grong khyer ma ga d+h+aa'i nang byan ma gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed la byin /
NK106(me)012:724: gdung bcug pa'i bum pa bram ze'i rigs bre bo dang mnyam pa la byin /
NK106(me)012:725: gdung bsregs pa'i sol ba rnams bram ze'i khye'u nya
NK106(me)012:726: gro d+ha la byin te so so nas mchod rten
NK106(me)012:729: spyan ldan sku gdung bre bo brgyad dag las //
NK106(me)012:730: bdun ni dzam+b+au'i gling pa'i mchod par thob //
NK106(me)012:731: skyes bu mchog de'i bre bo gang zhig ni //
NK106(me)012:732: grong khyer sgra sgrogs klu yi rgyal pos mchod //
NK106(me)012:733: skyes mchog de yi mche ba bzhi dag las //
NK106(me)012:734: gcig ni rtsa gsum lha yul 'jig rten mchod //
NK106(me)012:735: gnyis pa tshig 'dzin yid 'ong grong khyer na //
NK106(me)012:736: gsum pa ka ling rgyal po'i yul na ste //
NK106(me)012:737: skyes mchog de yi mche ba bzhi pa ni //
NK106(me)012:738: grong khyer sgra sgrogs klu yi rgyal pos mchod //
NK106(me)012:739: mya ngan med rgyal skya snar bu gnas par //
NK106(me)012:740: mchod rten bdun po rgya cher spel byas te //
NK106(me)012:741: de yi mthu yis dbyig 'dzin 'dir yang ni //
NK106(me)012:742: smon lam dngos po mngon par brgyan gyur te //
NK106(me)012:743: 'di ltar spyan ldan sku gdung de dag la //
NK106(me)012:744: lha dbang klu dbang mi yi dbang po dang //
NK106(me)012:745: mi'am ci dang gnod sbyin bdag po yis //
NK106(me)012:746: rab tu bkur nas bkur sti mchod pa byas //
NK106(me)012:747: bcom ldan sku gdung cha brgyad bgos pa las //
NK106(me)012:748: gcig ni grong khyer r+ts+wa can gyad la byin //
NK106(me)012:749: gnyis pa sdig can gyad kyis rgya cher mchod //
NK106(me)012:750: gsum pa rtog g.yo'i rgyal rigs bu lu kas //
NK106(me)012:751: bzhi pa sgra sgrogs rgyal rigs kro d+ha la //
NK106(me)012:752: lnga pa khyab 'jug gling gi bram zes mchod //
NK106(me)012:753: drug pa ser skya'i rgyal rigs sh+aakya yis //
NK106(me)012:754: bdun pa yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha b+ais //
NK106(me)012:755: brgyad pa yid 'ong grong khyer ma gang+h+aa'i //
NK106(me)012:756: nang byan ma gtogs bram ze dbyar byed mchod //
NK106(me)012:757: gdung bcug bum pa yon tan rab ldan pa //
NK106(me)012:758: bram ze'i rigs mchog be bor mnyam la byin //
NK106(me)012:759: bram ze'i khye'u nya gro d+ha yis ni //
NK106(me)012:760: gdung bsregs sol ba blangs nas mchod rten byas //
NK106(me)012:761: de ltar thog mar 'jig rten sgron ma yi //
NK106(me)012:762: mchod rten yon tan rab mdzes bcur gyur to //
NK106(me)012:764: gnyis pa bka'i bsdus tshul la gsum las /
NK106(me)012:765: bsdu ba dang po la sdom ni /
NK106(me)012:766: dus dang 'dus pa gnas dang ni //
NK106(me)012:767: gsol 'debs dngos po sbyin bdag dang //
NK106(me)012:768: dgos pa bsal bya bsdus tshul gtso //
NK106(me)012:769: rnam pa dgur ni mkhas rnams bzhed //
NK106(me)012:770: de la dus ni sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyi de lo'o //
NK106(me)012:771: mchog 'dus pa ni dgra bcom pa lnga bargya'o //
NK106(me)012:772: de'ang lha'i bu rnams las 'phags pa 'od srungs kyis
NK106(me)012:773: gnas nas gang po la dge 'dun sdus shig ces
NK106(me)012:774: bsgo ba las / gan+d+ai brdungs dge 'dun bsdus pas
NK106(me)012:775: dgra bcom pa lnga brgyar gcig gis ma tshang nas
NK106(me)012:776: bsgo ba las / / sh+r+ai ka ka'i gzhal med
NK106(me)012:777: khang stong pa na 'phags pa ba lang bdag bzhugs
NK106(me)012:778: pa la gang pos 'od srungs la sogs pa'i dge
NK106(me)012:779: 'dun khyod la sdod pas 'byon par zhu zhes sbran
NK106(me)012:780: bsgo ba las / / dus / sangs rgyas mya
NK106(me)012:781: ngan las 'das par shes te chos gos dang lhung
NK106(me)012:783: ba lang bdag kyang mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshul gang pos bsgrags pas /
NK106(me)012:784: 'od srungs kyis da phyin chad bka' bsdu ba ma
NK106(me)012:785: tshar gyi bar la dgra bcom pa su gang yang
NK106(me)012:786: mya ngan las ma 'da' zhig ces bsgrags te /
NK106(me)012:787: kun dga' bo spyo bas gdul bar mkhyen nas /
NK106(me)012:788: mchog 'dus pa'i nang nas 'dod chags dang zhe sdang
NK106(me)012:789: dang bcas pa ma legs kyis song zhig ces smras
NK106(me)012:790: pas / nga dang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa khyod
NK106(me)012:791: la gtad pa lags mod nongs pa ma mchis zhes
NK106(me)012:792: pas / brjod pas / 'od srungs kyi zhal nas
NK106(me)012:793: tshul shing zhog cig ces gsungs nas spyo ba rnam
NK106(me)012:794: pa brgyad mdzad ces grags kyang /
NK106(me)012:795: spyo ba bdun spyo chung dang brgyad mdzad par sngon gyi mkhas pa dag gsungs te /
NK106(me)012:796: 'dri rmed 'di mdzad dang lan 'di btab mi snang
NK106(me)012:797: bas sangs rgyas kyis 'dri rmed mdzad pa la lan
NK106(me)012:798: log pa btab ces pa'i spyo ba mi bgrang ngo
NK106(me)012:799: // spyo ba bdun spyo chung dang bcas pa ni /
NK106(me)012:800: der 'od srungs kyi zhal nas sangs rgyas zhal skyems
NK106(me)012:801: pa la chu rnyog ma can drangs pa khyod kyis
NK106(me)012:803: de'i tshe bdud kyis chu klung ka ku ta dkrugs
NK106(me)012:804: pas rnyog ma med pa ma rnyed ces btab pas
NK106(me)012:805: / lhung bzed nam mkha' la deng byas na lhas
NK106(me)012:806: bdud rtsis 'gengs pas de tsam ma shes pa yang
NK106(me)012:807: khyod kyis nyes gsungs pa dang /
NK106(me)012:808: bdud kyis mya ngan las 'da' bar gsol ba na khyod la dris pa'i tshe /
NK106(me)012:809: de ltar gsol ba ma btab pa khyod kyis nyes zhes pa'i lan du /
NK106(me)012:810: de'i tshe bdud kyi 'od zer gyis khyab pas dran 'dzin nyams par gyur to zhes btab pas /
NK106(me)012:811: bde bar gshegs pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa la
NK106(me)012:812: gnas pas 'dod na bskal pa'am bskal pa las lhag
NK106(me)012:813: par yang gnas par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs tshe /
NK106(me)012:814: khyod kyis gsol ba btab na mya ngan las mi
NK106(me)012:815: 'da' na de tsam ma shes pa nyes gsungs pa
NK106(me)012:816: dang / na bza' rdog pa'i 'og tu bcug nas dras pa khyod kyis nyes zhes pa'i lan du /
NK106(me)012:817: de'i tshe 'dzin mkhan ma rnyed ces btab pas /
NK106(me)012:818: nam mkha' la deng byas na lhas 'dzin pa las de tsam ma shes pa nyes gsungs pa dang /
NK106(me)012:819: gsang ba'i sba ba nub pa grong pa'i bud med
NK106(me)012:820: la bstan pa khyod kyis nyes zhes pa'i lan du
NK106(me)012:821: / de'i tshe bud med skyes par 'gyur du re zhes btab pas /
NK106(me)012:822: rang gi las kyis bud med skyes par ga la 'gyur /
NK106(me)012:823: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i sba ba sba bar
NK106(me)012:824: bya ba yin gyi bstan par bya ba ma yin
NK106(me)012:825: pas de tsam ma shes pa nyes gsungs pa dang
NK106(me)012:826: / sku gser gyi gtan pa phyis pa 'dra ba
NK106(me)012:827: grong pa'i skye bo la bstan pa khyod kyi nyes
NK106(me)012:829: de'i tshe bden pa mthong du re zhes btab pas /
NK106(me)012:830: skal pa med pa dag gis bden pa ga la
NK106(me)012:831: mthong sku dri ma can du 'gyur bas de tsam
NK106(me)012:832: ma shes pa nyes gsungs pa dang /
NK106(me)012:833: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la bud med rab tu
NK106(me)012:834: 'byung ba'i zhu ba byas pas khyod kyis nyes byas
NK106(me)012:835: pa'i lam du / yum 'das nas bskyangs pas drin che snyam nas zhus zhes btab pas /
NK106(me)012:836: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis phyogs gang
NK106(me)012:837: nas kyang drin lan bsab tu yod pa la bstan
NK106(me)012:838: pa'i tha ma lnga brgya phrag gcig rtags tsam 'dzin
NK106(me)012:839: par 'gyur bas de tsam ma shes pas nyes gsungs
NK106(me)012:840: pa dang / gang zag dka' bas nye bar 'tsho
NK106(me)012:841: ba'i tshe bslab pa'i gzhi phra mo dag bag yangs
NK106(me)012:842: su gnang bar gsungs pa la gang phan chad gnang
NK106(me)012:843: ba ma zhus pa khyod kyis nyes zhes pa'i lan
NK106(me)012:844: pa dang / du / sangs rgyas 'das nas dge
NK106(me)012:845: sbyong 'di dag res 'ga' sdom res 'ga' glod ces
NK106(me)012:846: skye bo rnams 'phya bar 'gyur du dogs nas ma
NK106(me)012:848: chos kyi rjes gnang na ci zhig bya de tsam
NK106(me)012:849: ma shes pa nyes so zhes gsungs te mchil lham
NK106(me)012:851: de nas kun dga' bos bri dzi'i ljongs su byon pa las /
NK106(me)012:852: bri dzi'i bu la sogs pas rab tu byung ste
NK106(me)012:853: gdams ngag phog pas de dag gis dgra bcom pa'i
NK106(me)012:856: mkhan po ni 'gro ba mang po sgrol ba'i gru gzings lta bu yin na /
NK106(me)012:857: ci'i phyir dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du mi mdzad ces bskul bas /
NK106(me)012:858: bden snyam nas sgom thun gcig mdzad pas dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob dus /
NK106(me)012:859: mngon shes kyis brtags pas 'od srungs kyis byams pa'i sems kyis spyo ba mdzad par mkhyen te /
NK106(me)012:860: slar dge 'dun gyi nang du byon pas dgra bcom pa lnga bargya'o //
NK106(me)012:861: gnas ni 'od ma'i tshal dang r+ts+wa can la sogs
NK106(me)012:862: pa ston pa mya ngan las 'das pas yid gdung
NK106(me)012:864: rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i ri'i phyogs zhig
NK106(me)012:865: na a su ra ba gsang ba'i brag phug bya
NK106(me)012:867: gsol ba 'debs mkhan 'phags pa 'od srungs chen po ste /
NK106(me)012:868: snam sbyar lnga brgya stan du bting nas nye ba 'khor bzhugs pa la /
NK106(me)012:869: ston pa 'jig rten phan bzhed pa //
NK106(me)012:870: rgyal bas gsungs pa'i chos rnams kyi //
NK106(me)012:871: rnam pa mchog ni gang bshad pa //
NK106(me)012:872: tshe dang ldan pas 'dul ba gsungs //
NK106(me)012:874: 'dul ba lung sde bzhi 'bum phrag gi tshad du longs pa rnams kha ton du gsungs pa dang /
NK106(me)012:875: de bzhin du kun dga' bos mdo sde dang /
NK106(me)012:876: 'od srungs nyid kyis mngon par gsungs so //
NK106(me)012:877: bsdu bar bya ba'i chos ni de ltar sde snod gsum mo //
NK106(me)012:878: sbyin bdag ni rgyal po ma skyes dagra'o //
NK106(me)012:879: dgos pa ni ma 'ongs pa'i gdul bya lung dang
NK106(me)012:880: mngon par rtogs pa med pa dag sgro 'dogs pa
NK106(me)012:881: dang / skur ba 'debs pa spangs nas sangs rgyas
NK106(me)012:882: kyi bstan pa yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i
NK106(me)012:883: dang / phyir ro // bsal bya ni lha'i bu tshe bskal par thub pa dag na re /
NK106(me)012:884: sangs rgyas gzhan mya ngan las 'das nas ring por ma lon par bka' bsdu ba byung ba las /
NK106(me)012:885: sh+aakya thub pa 'das nas da dung ma byung bas
NK106(me)012:886: da ni sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa me shi ba'i
NK106(me)012:887: du ba lang long tsam du gyur to zhes 'phya
NK106(me)012:889: sdud pa po'i gtso bo ni gnas brtan 'od srungs chen po dang /
NK106(me)012:893: de nas gnas brtan 'od srungs chen po mya ngan las 'da' bar bzhed nas /
NK106(me)012:894: bstan pa kun dga' bo la gtad de /
NK106(me)012:895: lha dang klu'i gnas na sangs rgyas kyi tshems mche
NK106(me)012:896: ba g.yas dang g.yon bzhugs pa la phyag 'tshal nas
NK106(me)012:897: / slar byon te ri bo bya rkang can gyi
NK106(me)012:898: nang du sku gdung mi 'jig par byin gyis brlabs
NK106(me)012:900: de'i dgos pa ni ma 'ongs pa na byams pa
NK106(me)012:901: 'khor dung phyur dang bcas pa tshe lo brgyad khri'i
NK106(me)012:903: ri kha bye nas pur de gzigs nas /
NK106(me)012:905: byams pas de'i don rgya cher gsungs dus thams cad
NK106(me)012:906: sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang ldan par 'gyur ba la
NK106(me)012:907: dgongs so // de nas kun dga' bo yang mya ngan las 'da' bar dgongs te /
NK106(me)012:908: rgyal po'i khab pa dang yangs pa can pa bsdum
NK106(me)012:909: pa'i phyir de gnyis kyi bar chu bo gang+g+aa'i dbus
NK106(me)012:910: sar byin gyis brlabs nas bzhugs te /
NK106(me)012:911: skye bo mang po rab tu byung nas /
NK106(me)012:913: nyi ma'i gung pa la sogs par ming btags /
NK106(me)012:914: de dag gis bsgrubs pas dgra bcom pa thob nas /
NK106(me)012:915: mkhan po'i sngon du mya ngan las 'da' bar bzhed pa las /
NK106(me)012:916: kun dga' bos nyi ma'i gung pa la /
NK106(me)012:917: khyod kha che'i yuladu sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa 'dzin
NK106(me)012:918: par snying rje pad+ma dkar po las gsungs pas der
NK106(me)012:919: song la bstan pa zung zhig ces gtad de kun
NK106(me)012:920: dga' bos rdzu 'phrul mang po bstan nas /
NK106(me)012:921: sku gdung tshal pa gnyis su 'gro bar byin gyis brlabs te mya ngan las 'das so //
NK106(me)012:922: de nas rgyal po'i khab pa dang /
NK106(me)012:923: yangs pa can pas so sor spyan drangs mchod rten
NK106(me)012:924: re bzhengs te de phan rtsod pa zhi bar gyur
NK106(me)012:925: to // de nas dgra bcom pa nyi ma'i gung
NK106(me)012:926: pa 'khor dgra bcom pa lnga brgya dang bcas pa
NK106(me)012:927: kha che'i yul du gshegs te /
NK106(me)012:928: mtsho 'gram zhig tu bzhugs pa na yul de klus
NK106(me)012:929: bdag byas pas char chen po phab cho 'phrul du
NK106(me)012:930: ma bstan dus / 'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pas /
NK106(me)012:931: slar dad de klu'i rgyal po na re ci bka' stsal zer ba la /
NK106(me)012:932: 'di bsam gtan dang mthun pa'i gnas shig 'dug pas yul zhig 'dod pa yin gsungs dus /
NK106(me)012:935: yun ci tsam bzhugs zer ba la /
NK106(me)012:936: yul skyil mo krung shong ba re 'dod /
NK106(me)012:937: yun sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ma nub kyi bar du sdod gsungs dus /
NK106(me)012:938: 'o na skyil mo krung chos shig zer ba la /
NK106(me)012:939: skyil mo krung gcig gis lung pa bco brgyad kyi mdo bcad pas /
NK106(me)012:940: klu na re 'khor gcig ma tshang yang nga rang gi yul 'dod zer ro //
NK106(me)012:941: de ni sh+aakya thub pa'i bstan pa ma nub kyi ring rtag tu de na bzhugs pa yin no //
NK106(me)012:942: bsdu ba gnyis pa la yang dgu las /
NK106(me)012:943: dus ni sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgyad cu lon pa na'o //
NK106(me)012:944: 'dus pa ni 'phags pa zla bsgyur dang bcas pas dgra bcom pa bdun bargya'o //
NK106(me)012:945: gnas ni yangs pa can gyi grong khyer kusma pu ri'i gtsug lag khang ngo //
NK106(me)012:946: gsol ba 'debs pa ni tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'o //
NK106(me)012:947: bsdu bar bya ba'i chos ni sde snod gsum ste /
NK106(me)012:948: chos rgyal 'das nas dge 'dun 'gyed pa'i phyir gyi
NK106(me)012:949: rtsod pa 'ga' zhig byung ba las brtsams te rtsa
NK106(me)012:950: ba'i sde bzhir gyes pa'i bsdu ba yang byas so
NK106(me)012:951: // sbyin bdag d+harma a sho ka ste chos rgyal mya ngan med do //
NK106(me)012:952: dgos pa sngar bzhin las khyad par du skad gzhan
NK106(me)012:953: la mos pa'i gdul bya rnams tshegs chung ngus rtogs
NK106(me)012:954: par bya'o // bsal bya ni de'i tshe yangs pa
NK106(me)012:955: can du dge slong lha chen pos rung ba ma
NK106(me)012:956: yin pa'i gzhi bcu chos su mthun par byas pa
NK106(me)012:957: par bya'o // rnams te / hu lu hu lu yi rang dang //
NK106(me)012:958: kun spyad gnod dang lan tsh+wa dang //
NK106(me)012:959: lam dang sor gnyis dkrugs dang gding //
NK106(me)012:960: gser la bya bar rung ba ste //
NK106(me)012:962: de'ang ma 'dus pas las byas nas hu lu hu
NK106(me)012:963: lu zhes brjod pa las chags par 'dod pa dang
NK106(me)012:964: / chos dang mi ldan pa'i las byas nas rjes
NK106(me)012:965: su yi rang ba chos su blo bsgyur bas chos
NK106(me)012:967: na ba la srin bu pad pa'i 'jib lugs kyis
NK106(me)012:968: chang 'thungs na nyes pa med par 'dod pa dang
NK106(me)012:969: / dngos kyi dgag bya med na sa brko bar
NK106(me)012:970: rung ste srog chags la gnod pa med pas zhes
NK106(me)012:971: / 'dod pa dang / dus su rung ba dang
NK106(me)012:972: 'dres pas lan tsh+wa phyi dro spyad du rung ste
NK106(me)012:973: rung chu mi dgos zhes 'dod pa dang /
NK106(me)012:974: lam dpag tshad phyed mi dgos rgyang grags phyed du
NK106(me)012:975: phyin na'ang 'dus te za ma la sogs pa'i nyes
NK106(me)012:977: sor gnyis ni lhag por byed pa la sor mo gnyis kyis len pas chog ces 'dod pa dang /
NK106(me)012:978: dus su rung ba dang dus ma yin pa rung
NK106(me)012:979: ba gnyis bsres nas phyi dro yang btung du rung
NK106(me)012:980: ste de gnyis dkrugs pa na dus su rung bas
NK106(me)012:981: byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur zhes 'dod pa dang /
NK106(me)012:982: gding ba rnying pa la bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho
NK106(me)012:983: gang mi dgos rang gi mtho gang gis glan pas
NK106(me)012:985: bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa'i khri'u grong gi gseb tu
NK106(me)012:986: 'khyer du bcug nas khyim pa dag las gser bslangs
NK106(me)012:987: pa de'i steng du 'jog tu bcug pas gser la
NK106(me)012:988: rung bar 'gyur te nyes pa med ces 'dod pa
NK106(me)012:989: rnams bsal bya'o // sdud pa po'i gtso bo dgra bcom pa nyer sbas yin no //
NK106(me)012:990: bsdu ba rnam pa gsum pa la'ang dgu las /
NK106(me)012:991: dus ni sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas lo sum brgya na'o //
NK106(me)012:992: 'dus pa ni dgra bcom pa lnga brgya /
NK106(me)012:993: so so'i skye bo'i dge slong khri drug stong ngo //
NK106(me)012:994: gnas ni kha che me tog brtsegs pa'i kun dga' ra ba'o //
NK106(me)012:995: gsol ba 'debs pa dang sbyin bdag ni rgyal po ka nish+ka'o //
NK106(me)012:996: bsdu bar bya ba'i chos ni sde snod gsum dang
NK106(me)012:997: gyes pa bco brgyad chos su mthun par bsdu ba'o
NK106(me)012:998: // de yang sde pa tha dad par klog pa'i 'khor lo las /
NK106(me)012:999: sh+aakya seng ge'i bstan pa ni //
NK106(me)012:1000: tha dad rnam pa bco brgyad du //
NK106(me)012:1002: sngon gyi 'phrin las dbang gis yin //
NK106(me)012:1004: de'i tshe bdud sdig to can gyis dge slong du sprul te dbyen spyos pas /
NK106(me)012:1005: thams cad blong blong por gyur cing mdo'i gnas so
NK106(me)012:1006: so dang slob brgyud so sos tshan tshan du bcad
NK106(me)012:1007: de / lta ba dang cho ga mi mthun pas
NK106(me)012:1008: nged kyi ltar yin gyi khyed kyi ltar ma yin
NK106(me)012:1010: de dag dang po gang las 'phros pa'i sde pa
NK106(me)012:1011: de dang der bsdus nas kha 'cham par sangs rgyas
NK106(me)012:1012: kyi chos dang bstan pa'i sol yin par brtsad pa
NK106(me)012:1013: la / nang tshan gyi rtsa ba sde pa bzhi /
NK106(me)012:1014: de las gyis pa bco brgyad du grags pa ni /
NK106(me)012:1015: gzhi thams cad yod par smra ba las dbye na /
NK106(me)012:1019: mang du thos par smra ba /
NK106(me)012:1022: rnam par phye ste smra ba'i sde dang bdun no //
NK106(me)012:1023: 'di dag rgyal rigs sgra gcan 'dzin rab tu bzang
NK106(me)012:1024: po bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa la gus pa'i
NK106(me)012:1025: mchog tu lung bstan pa de'i slob brgyud de /
NK106(me)012:1026: skad ni legs par sbyang ba ste sam skri ta lha'i skad dang mthun pa /
NK106(me)012:1027: snam sbyar gyi snam phran ni dgu yan chad nyi shu rtsa lnga man chad de zung ma gtogs /
NK106(me)012:1037: 'jig rten las 'das par smra ba'i sde dang lnga'o //
NK106(me)012:1038: 'di dag bram ze'i rigs las rab tu byung ba
NK106(me)012:1039: gnas brtan 'od srungs chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis
NK106(me)012:1040: sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i mchog tu lung
NK106(me)012:1041: bstan pa de'i slob brgyud de /
NK106(me)012:1042: skad ni pra kri ta ste 'od gsal gyi lha rnams dang mthun par smra ba /
NK106(me)012:1043: snam phran ni dgu yan chad nyi shu rtsa gsum man chad de zung ma gtogs /
NK106(me)012:1044: rtags ni g.yung drung 'khyil pa dang dpal be'u'o //
NK106(me)012:1045: gnas brtan pa las dbye na /
NK106(me)012:1046: rgyal byed tshal na gnas pa'i sde /
NK106(me)012:1047: 'jigs med ri la gnas pa'i sde /
NK106(me)012:1048: gtsug lag khang na gnas pa'i sde dang gsum mo //
NK106(me)012:1049: 'di dag smyig ma mkhan gyi rigs las rab tu
NK106(me)012:1050: byung ba 'phags pa k+aa t+y+aa ya na chen po
NK106(me)012:1051: bcom ldan 'das kyis mtha' 'khob 'dul ba'i mchog tu
NK106(me)012:1052: lung bstan pa de'i slob brgyud de /
NK106(me)012:1053: skad ni a ba b+h+ram sha ta ste zur chag pa sha za rnams dang mthun pa /
NK106(me)012:1054: snam phran ni dgu yan chad nyi shu rtsa gcig man chad de zung ma gtogs /
NK106(me)012:1056: mang pos bkur ba las dbye na /
NK106(me)012:1059: gnas ma bu'i sde dang gsum mo //
NK106(me)012:1060: 'di dag 'deg mkhan gyi rigs las rab tu byung
NK106(me)012:1061: ba 'phags pa nye bar 'khor bcom ldan 'das kyis
NK106(me)012:1062: 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams kyi nang nas mchog tu
NK106(me)012:1063: lung bstan pa de'i slob brgyud do //
NK106(me)012:1064: skad ni pi sh+aa tsi ta ste tha mal pa gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams dang mthun pa /
NK106(me)012:1065: snam phran ni brtan pa dang mthun /
NK106(me)012:1067: 'di dag gi lta ba dang grub pa'i mtha' dbye
NK106(me)012:1068: ba zhib tu rtogs par 'dod pa na kho bos
NK106(me)012:1069: byas pa'i bstan bcos yid bzhin rin po che'i mdzod
NK106(me)012:1071: dgos pa ni bstan pa nang mthun pa dang yun ring du gnas pa'i dgos pa yod do //
NK106(me)012:1072: bsal bya ni gyes pa bco brgyad chos ma yin par 'dod pa rnams so //
NK106(me)012:1073: sdud pa po'i gtso bo ni srid pa tha ma pa'i byang chub sems dpas su mi tra dang /
NK106(me)012:1074: dgra bcom pa chen po pur+ni ka'o //
NK106(me)012:1075: gsum pa bstan bcos ji ltar mdzad pa'i tshul la /
NK106(me)012:1078: ji ltar mdzad pa'i tshul dang gsum las /
NK106(me)012:1079: dang po la'ang rab chos nyid kyi bden pa mngon sum du rtogs pa /
NK106(me)012:1080: 'bring yi dam lha'i zhal mthong zhing gnang ba thob pa /
NK106(me)012:1081: tha ma rig pa'i gnas lnga shes pa'o //
NK106(me)012:1087: nang gi de kho na nyid kyi gnas so //
NK106(me)012:1088: bstan bcos kyi rang bzhin ni rtsom pa po mtshan
NK106(me)012:1089: nyid dang ldan pas bka'i dgongs 'grel du brtsams shing
NK106(me)012:1090: thar pa'i lam ston pas 'chos skyob gnyis kyi yon
NK106(me)012:1093: nyon mongs dgra rnams ma lus 'chos pa dang //
NK106(me)012:1094: ngan 'gro srid las skyob pa gang yin pa //
NK106(me)012:1095: 'chos skyob yon tan phyir na bstan bcos te //
NK106(me)012:1096: gnyis po 'di dag gzhan gyi lugs la med //
NK106(me)012:1098: ji ltar mdzad pa'i tshul la sangs rgyas zhal bzhugs
NK106(me)012:1099: pa na dgra bcom pa bdun gyis bstan bcos mngon
NK106(me)012:1100: pa sde bdun mdzad pa dang /
NK106(me)012:1101: bsdu ba gnyis pa'i dus su dgra bcom pa nyer
NK106(me)012:1102: sbas kyis bye brag bshad mdzod chen mo mdzad pa
NK106(me)012:1103: dang / sangs rgyas 'das nas lo bzhi brgya na slob dpon klu sgrub yab sras byon te /
NK106(me)012:1104: dbu ma'i lugs rgya cher gsal bar mdzad pa bka' gsum gyi don 'grel ba /
NK106(me)012:1105: gtam gyi tshogs bka' dang po'i 'grel pa dang /
NK106(me)012:1106: rigs pa'i tshogs bar pa'i 'grel pa dang /
NK106(me)012:1107: bstod pa'i tshogs tha ma'i 'grel par mdzad pa dang /
NK106(me)012:1108: 'phags pa lhas bzhi brgya pa la sogs pa mdzad pa dang /
NK106(me)012:1109: legs ldan 'byed kyis mdzad pa spyan ras gzigs brtul zhugs la sogs pa dang /
NK106(me)012:1110: zla ba grags pas mdzad pa tshig gsal ba dang /
NK106(me)012:1111: dbu ma la 'jug pa la sogs pa dang /
NK106(me)012:1112: lo dgu brgya lhag stong du nye ba na slob
NK106(me)012:1113: dpon thogs med sku mched la sogs pa byon te
NK106(me)012:1114: / thogs med kyis byams pa bsgrubs nas dga' ldan
NK106(me)012:1115: du byon te lha'i drod skad cig gnas pa la
NK106(me)012:1116: / / 'phags pa byams pas bka' spyi'i 'grel par /
NK106(me)012:1119: theg pa chen po'i rgyud bla ma'i bstan bcos dang chos lnga mdzad de gsungs pa rnams /
NK106(me)012:1120: dzam+b+au'i gling du dar bar byas te /
NK106(me)012:1121: slob dpon so sos 'grel pa du ma mdzad pa dang /
NK106(me)012:1122: khyad par du slob dpon thogs med kyis sa sde lnga /
NK106(me)012:1123: sdom rnam pa gnyis la sogs pa byams pa dang
NK106(me)012:1124: 'brel ba'i chos nyi shur grags pa rnams mdzad pa
NK106(me)012:1125: dang / dbyig gnyen gyis de dag gi 'grel t+aika du ma dang /
NK106(me)012:1126: khyad par du chos mngon pa mdzod rang 'grel dang
NK106(me)012:1127: bcas pa la sogs pa du ma mdzad pa dang
NK106(me)012:1128: / phyogs kyi glang pos brgyad stong don bsdus dang /
NK106(me)012:1129: tshad ma kun las btus la sogs pa du ma mdzad pa dang /
NK106(me)012:1130: chos kyi grags pas tshad ma sde bdun la sogs mdzad pa dang /
NK106(me)012:1131: tsan+d+ra go mis sgra'i bstan bcos tsan+d+ra pa la sogs pa du ma mdzad pa dang /
NK106(me)012:1132: dpa' bos skyes pa rabs kyi sde la sogs pa du ma mdzad pa dang /
NK106(me)012:1133: slob dpon yon tan 'od kyis mdo rtsa ba bam po dgu /
NK106(me)012:1134: karma sha tam bam po dgu la sogs pa mdzad pa dang /
NK106(me)012:1135: sh+aakya 'od kyis sum brgya pa la sogs pa mdzad pa dang /
NK106(me)012:1136: chos kyi bshes gnyen gyis rgya cher 'grel la sogs pa dang /
NK106(me)012:1137: slob dpon bi ma las lung sde bzhi'i gnas ston pa dga' ba bskyed pa dang /
NK106(me)012:1138: glang po che'i chu 'thung la sogs pa du ma mdzad pa dang /
NK106(me)012:1139: mkhan po zhi ba 'tshos dbu ma snang ba la sogs pa mdzad pa dang /
NK106(me)012:1140: ka ma la sh+ai las sgom rim gsum pa la sogs pa mdzad pa dang /
NK106(me)012:1141: slob dpon ye shes snying pos bden gnyis 'byed pa la sogs pa mdzad pa dang /
NK106(me)012:1142: sh+aan+ti pas nyi khri dag ldan la sogs pa mdzad pa dang /
NK106(me)012:1143: slob dpon rnam grol sdes nyi khri snang ba la sogs pa mdzad pa dang /
NK106(me)012:1144: seng ge bzang pos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi
NK106(me)012:1145: 'grel chung don gsal la sogs pa mdzad pa dang
NK106(me)012:1146: / shes rab 'byung gnas sbas pas thub pa dgongs pa'i rgyan la sogs pa mdzad pa dang /
NK106(me)012:1147: jo bo rjes byang chub lam gyi sgron ma la sogs pa mdzad pa ste /
NK106(me)012:1148: mdor na rgya gar gyi pan+di ta de dag dang
NK106(me)012:1149: gzhan yang dpag tu med pas phyi nang gi gnas
NK106(me)012:1150: gsal bar byed pa'i bstan bcos du ma mdzad de
NK106(me)012:1151: / dzam+b+au'i gling du dar zhing rgyas pas sangs rgyas
NK106(me)012:1152: kyi bstan pa yun ring du gnas par mdzad pa
NK106(me)012:1153: / yin te / chos rnams thams cad bka' dang bstan bcos gnyis //
NK106(me)012:1154: legs par gsungs dang de yi dgongs 'grel ba //
NK106(me)012:1155: de yi dbang gis sh+aakya'i bstan pa ni //
NK106(me)012:1156: 'jig rten khams 'dir yun ring gnas par 'gyur //
NK106(me)012:1158: don gnyis pa 'bras bu gsang sngags kyi theg pa bshad pa la gnyis te /
NK106(me)012:1161: dang po gsang sngags gsar ma'i lugs la gsum ste /
NK106(me)012:1162: gsung ba po ston pa'i byon tshul /
NK106(me)012:1163: des gsungs pa sngags kyi rang bzhin /
NK106(me)012:1164: shes byed rgyud sde'i rnam grangs so //
NK106(me)012:1165: dang po la'ang bya ba'i rgyud du gtogs pa dag
NK106(me)012:1166: brtson pa rab dang ldan na tshe 'di nyid la
NK106(me)012:1167: 'phags pa'i go 'phang chos nyid kyi bden pa mthong
NK106(me)012:1168: nas tshe rabs bcu drug gi tshe tshad du lus
NK106(me)012:1169: des tshogs gnyis bsags pa'i mthar byang chub 'thob la
NK106(me)012:1170: / brtson pa 'bring dang tha mas mi tshe bcu
NK106(me)012:1171: drug tu dkyil 'khor mchod pa la sogs pas tshogs
NK106(me)012:1172: dpag tu med pa bsags pa'i mthar 'og min du
NK106(me)012:1173: sangs rgyas nas 'dir sprul pa 'byung bar 'dod la
NK106(me)012:1174: / / spyod pa'i rgyud du gtogs pa dag tshe rabs bdun dang /
NK106(me)012:1175: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dag tshe gsum
NK106(me)012:1176: gyi mthar 'og min du mngon byang lngas sangs rgyas
NK106(me)012:1177: nas 'dir mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyis don mdzad par
NK106(me)012:1178: 'dod de / gsang sngags bla na med pa las /
NK106(me)012:1179: kha cig snga mar spyod pa snang sbyong gi tshogs gnyis bsags nas /
NK106(me)012:1180: tshe 'dir dbang po rnon po'i gang zag des dka'
NK106(me)012:1181: ba spyod pa'i tshe sku chu klung gi 'gram na
NK106(me)012:1182: bzhugs bzhin du / thugs 'og min du 'od zer
NK106(me)012:1183: chen pos dbang bskur te zab gsal gnyis med kyi
NK106(me)012:1184: ting nge 'dzin bsgoms pas sangs rgyas ma thag /
NK106(me)012:1185: rdo rje gdan du byon te 'tshang rgya ba'i tshul ston par 'dod pa ni /
NK106(me)012:1186: sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs kyi grol ba'i thig le las /
NK106(me)012:1187: ci'i phyir sh+aakya thub pa yis //
NK106(me)012:1188: grangs med gsum du tshogs bsags kyang //
NK106(me)012:1190: ci yang ma yin ting 'dzin gnas //
NK106(me)012:1191: de tshe phyogs bcu'i bde gshegs kyis //
NK106(me)012:1192: thal byung blo chags de bzlog ste //
NK106(me)012:1193: nam mkha'i dbyings ltar rnam dag pa'i //
NK106(me)012:1194: zab gsal gnyis med don bstan pas //
NK106(me)012:1195: nam phyed dus na rgyal ba ltar //
NK106(me)012:1196: de nyid bsgoms pas tho rangs dus //
NK106(me)012:1197: skad cig gis ni yang dag rtogs //
NK106(me)012:1198: 'gro ba gdul bar bya ba'i phyir //
NK106(me)012:1199: byang chub snying por bzhugs nas kyang //
NK106(me)012:1200: dpung chen bdud rnams rab bcom ste //
NK106(me)012:1201: sems can gzung bar bya don du //
NK106(me)012:1204: kha cig ni sems bskyed tshogs bsags pa'i mthar 'og
NK106(me)012:1205: min du sangs rgyas nas slar gtsang ma'i ris kyi
NK106(me)012:1206: 'og min du 'tshang rgya ba'i tshul bstan pa'i rjes
NK106(me)012:1207: la / rdo rje gdan du sangs rgya bar ston par bzhed de /
NK106(me)012:1209: bcom ldan 'das ni sangs rgyas nas ring por ma
NK106(me)012:1210: lon par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
NK106(me)012:1211: dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag nyid du gyur par
NK106(me)012:1212: mkhyen pas / ri rab kyi rtse mo nas byang
NK106(me)012:1213: chub kyi snying po ga la ba der gshegs te
NK106(me)012:1214: mkhyen pas / / byang chub kyi shing drung du
NK106(me)012:1215: 'jig rten pa dang mthun par bya ba'i phyir r+ts+wa
NK106(me)012:1217: yang kha cig 'og min chen por sangs rgyas thams
NK106(me)012:1218: cad kyis dbang bskur ba'i rjes la zhing 'di'i 'og
NK106(me)012:1219: min du rdo rje 'chang du sangs rgyas ma thag
NK106(me)012:1220: rdo rje gdan du sangs rgyas sh+aakya thub par sangs
NK106(me)012:1221: rgyas nas don mdzad par bzhed de /
NK106(me)012:1222: phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud las /
NK106(me)012:1223: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje 'dzin /
NK106(me)012:1224: 'jig rten gyi khams gzhi dang snying po me tog gis brgyan par dbang bskur ba'i rjes la /
NK106(me)012:1225: de nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir bcom
NK106(me)012:1226: ldan 'das sh+aakya thub pa'i mtshan gyis gling bzhi pa
NK106(me)012:1227: bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dzam+b+au'i gling du
NK106(me)012:1228: bdud pham par mdzad nas byang chub tu mngon par
NK106(me)012:1230: gnyis pa des gsungs pa sngags kyi rang bzhin la /
NK106(me)012:1233: bzhir dbye tshul dang gsum las /
NK106(me)012:1234: dang po sngags dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg
NK106(me)012:1235: pa dag mthar thug gi 'bras bu sangs rgyas bsgrub
NK106(me)012:1237: de sgrub par byed pa'i lam dus kyi thabs la
NK106(me)012:1238: khyad par zhugs pas 'phags chos bzhis 'phags pa'i tshul
NK106(me)012:1239: la bsgrub tshul la ma rmongs pa dang /
NK106(me)012:1242: dbang po shin tu rnon po'i dbang du byas pa ste /
NK106(me)012:1243: ma rmongs pa ni 'di ltar zab pa dang rgya che ba'i gnas dag 'jal ba na /
NK106(me)012:1244: mtshan nyid kyi theg pas gtan tshigs kyi sgo nas gzhigs te /
NK106(me)012:1245: rjes dpag nges pa'i tshad mas gzhal ba'i don dam
NK106(me)012:1246: gyi bden pa blos byas kyi gzhir gtan la phab
NK106(me)012:1247: nas / de'i ngang la 'bad pas 'jog pa'i lam zhi lhag tsam des /
NK106(me)012:1248: dus bskal pa mang po na bden mthong thar pa'i 'bras bu la dmigs pas zab pa tsam dang /
NK106(me)012:1249: rgya che ba'ang phyi nang gi chos rnams phung po
NK106(me)012:1250: khams dang skye mched kyi rnam pa kun rdzob kyi
NK106(me)012:1252: blang dor gyi dmigs nges par byed pa tsam las med do //
NK106(me)012:1253: gsang sngags ni zab pa'i gnas dbang 'jal ba na yid dpyod la ma ltos par /
NK106(me)012:1254: lus ngag gi gnad rtsa rlung thig le'i 'phro 'du khyad par can bstun pa tsam gyis skad cig /
NK106(me)012:1255: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes chos sku'i gzhi don bden pa gtan la phab nas /
NK106(me)012:1256: de'i ngang la thabs khyad par can gyi blo gnas pas /
NK106(me)012:1257: tshe 'di nyid la sogs par dbyings don dam pa'i
NK106(me)012:1258: bden pa rtogs nas byang chub mngon du byed pas
NK106(me)012:1259: zab pas khyad par du 'phags pa dang /
NK106(me)012:1260: rgya che ba'ang sems nyid rang bzhin gyis rnam par
NK106(me)012:1261: dag pa dbyings 'od gsal gyi dkyil 'khor ye nas
NK106(me)012:1262: grub pas gzhi'i rgyud du gtan la phab nas /
NK106(me)012:1263: de'i ngang las snang ba'i chos phung po khams skye
NK106(me)012:1264: mched la sogs pa thams cad zhing dang gzhal yas
NK106(me)012:1265: khang dang lha'i rang bzhin du shes pa thabs bskyed
NK106(me)012:1267: thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa rdzogs pa'i rim pa ste /
NK106(me)012:1268: rim pa gnyis po bden pa gnyis su nges pas
NK106(me)012:1269: thabs dang shes rab mchog tu gyur pa'i lam khyad
NK106(me)012:1271: gnas skabs su grub pa brgyad dang /
NK106(me)012:1272: 'phrin las bzhis rang dang gzhan gyi re ba bsgrub pa dang /
NK106(me)012:1275: skye ba bcu drug las mi 'gyang bar byang chub
NK106(me)012:1276: mngon du byed pa'i 'bras bu mchog tu gyur pa'i
NK106(me)012:1277: gnas ston pas na rgya che bas khyad par du
NK106(me)012:1278: 'phags pa'i phyir / gsang sngags rdo rje'i theg pa
NK106(me)012:1279: zab pa dang rgya che ba'i gnas la ma rmongs
NK106(me)012:1280: pas kyang mtshan nyid kyi theg pa las ches khyad
NK106(me)012:1281: 'phags pa'i phyir / par 'phags so // thabs mang bas kyang 'phags te /
NK106(me)012:1282: spang bya 'dod chags lta bu zhig spang ba la'ang /
NK106(me)012:1283: mtshan nyid kyis yul dang yul can spang 'gegs byed pa de /
NK106(me)012:1284: sngags kyis bskyed rim lha'i rnal 'byor du bsgyur ba dang /
NK106(me)012:1285: gya nom gyi 'dod chags dga' ba bzhi'i ye shes
NK106(me)012:1286: su ngo shes pas gnyis su med pa'i ye shes
NK106(me)012:1287: 'char ba'i gzhir gtan la 'bebs pa dang /
NK106(me)012:1288: thun mong gi yo byad lta bu zhig la'ang /
NK106(me)012:1289: mtshan nyid kyis rang rang gi sngon las sbyin 'bras su byas te /
NK106(me)012:1290: rkyen tha mal pa tshong dang so nam la sogs 'bad pas bsgrub pa lta bu nyid /
NK106(me)012:1291: sngags kyis chu dbang gnod gnas la sogs pa'i sgrub
NK106(me)012:1292: thabs kyis dngos su 'byor pa spel du yod pas
NK106(me)012:1293: 'phags so // dka' ba med pas kyang 'phags te /
NK106(me)012:1294: mtshan nyid kyi lam spong len dka' spyad kyi mthar ngal zhing dub pa las /
NK106(me)012:1295: sngags ni thabs khyad par can gyis gang yang grogs
NK106(me)012:1296: su 'char bas 'dod pa'i yon tan ma spangs rgyan
NK106(me)012:1298: dbang po rnon po'i lam yin pas kyang 'phags te /
NK106(me)012:1299: tshegs chung la bun che ba man ngag dam pa'i mthar thug yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK106(me)012:1300: de skad du'ang tshul gsum sgron ma las /
NK106(me)012:1301: don gcig na yang ma rmongs dang //
NK106(me)012:1302: thabs mang dka' ba med pa dang //
NK106(me)012:1303: dbang po rnon po'i dbang byas pas //
NK106(me)012:1304: sngags kyi theg pa khyad par 'phags //
NK106(me)012:1306: gnyis pa 'bras bur bzhag tshul la gsum las /
NK106(me)012:1307: dus myur ba la ltos nas 'bras bu'i theg pa la bzhag ste /
NK106(me)012:1308: dper na mtshon rno rtul gnyis kyis shing lta bu zhig gcod pa las /
NK106(me)012:1309: rtul ba de la 'dis mi chod zer /
NK106(me)012:1310: rno ba la 'dis chod reg pas chog zer ba la /
NK106(me)012:1311: mtshan nyid kyi theg pas dus ring por mi thob pa'i byang chub /
NK106(me)012:1312: sngags kyis tshe bcu drug gam gcig na thob pas
NK106(me)012:1313: dus nye ring la ltos nas kyang 'bras bur bshad
NK106(me)012:1315: bskal pa bye ba du ma ru //
NK106(me)012:1316: bsgrub dka' ba yi sangs rgyas kyang //
NK106(me)012:1317: tshe 'di nyid la ster bas na //
NK106(me)012:1318: 'bras bu'i theg pa zhes bya'o zhes so //
NK106(me)012:1319: de'ang brtson pa rab kyis tshe gcig gis 'grub par /
NK106(me)012:1321: bskal pa bye ba du ma ru //
NK106(me)012:1322: sangs rgyas kun dngos mi mthong ba //
NK106(me)012:1323: gsang sngags tshe 'di'i cho ga yis //
NK106(me)012:1326: brtson pa 'bring gis lus sems bral ma thag gam bar dor grol bar bshad de /
NK106(me)012:1328: bu ga dgu yi steng mchog nas //
NK106(me)012:1330: nyin bzhin bram ze gsod pa dang //
NK106(me)012:1331: mtshams med lnga ni byed pa dang //
NK106(me)012:1332: chom rkun las kyis longs spyod pa //
NK106(me)012:1334: sdig pas gos par mi 'gyur ro //
NK106(me)012:1337: gzugs can phung po rang lus 'di //
NK106(me)012:1338: tshe 'di nyid la ma grub kyang //
NK106(me)012:1339: yid ni rdo rje'i skur grub nas //
NK106(me)012:1343: yang na lus 'di spangs ma thag /
NK106(me)012:1344: bla na med pa'i ye shes sku //
NK106(me)012:1345: brtson pa mi ldan pas kyang 'grub //
NK106(me)012:1346: brtson 'grus ldan pas smos ci dgos //
NK106(me)012:1348: dbang po tha ma'i rab rnams phyi ma la grol bar /
NK106(me)012:1350: skyes ma thag tu 'gro ba'i bdag /
NK106(me)012:1352: sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud las /
NK106(me)012:1353: de phyir rnal 'byor blo ldan gyis //
NK106(me)012:1354: shin tu sbyor ba'i sems kyis ni //
NK106(me)012:1355: skye 'dir dngos grub ma thob kyang //
NK106(me)012:1356: skye gzhan srid par dngos grub 'thob //
NK106(me)012:1358: tha ma'i 'bring rnams skye ba bdun na grol te /
NK106(me)012:1360: dbang bskur yang dag sbyin ldan na //
NK106(me)012:1361: skye zhing skye bar dbang bskur 'gyur //
NK106(me)012:1362: de yi skye ba bdun na ni //
NK106(me)012:1365: tha ma'i tha mas kyang skye ba bcu drug na grol bar rdo rje rtse mo las /
NK106(me)012:1366: pha rol phyin pa'i theg pas ni //
NK106(me)012:1367: bskal pa grangs med mi thob pa //
NK106(me)012:1368: gal te rnal 'byor pa de brtson //
NK106(me)012:1370: yang na mthong ba tsam gyis ni //
NK106(me)012:1371: skye ba bcu drug mya ngan 'da' //
NK106(me)012:1372: so so'i skye bos sangs rgyas nyid //
NK106(me)012:1375: thabs mchog tu gyur pas kyang 'bras bur bzhag pa ni /
NK106(me)012:1376: dper na bya ba gcig bsgrub pa lta bu la
NK106(me)012:1377: mi gcig gis nyin bdun 'bad pas mi zin pa
NK106(me)012:1378: de / gcig gis 'phrul byas pas nyi ma gcig na zin pa ltar /
NK106(me)012:1379: mtshan nyid kyis lo dang zla ba du mar 'bad pas 'grub pa'i zhi lhag tsam de /
NK106(me)012:1380: sngags kyis rtsa rlung gi gnad du bsnun pa'i skad
NK106(me)012:1381: cig la 'grub pa lta bu la sogs pa'i phyir
NK106(me)012:1382: yang 'bras bu che bas 'bras bur bzhag ste /
NK106(me)012:1384: shin tu dka' bas mi 'grub pa //
NK106(me)012:1385: skad cig yang dag sbyor ba'i phyir //
NK106(me)012:1386: rgyu sngon song la ma ltos par //
NK106(me)012:1390: 'bras bu dang 'dra ba lam du byed pas kyang 'bras bu'i theg par bzhag pa ni /
NK106(me)012:1391: sangs rgyas dus kyi 'bras bu gzugs sku gnyis ltar
NK106(me)012:1392: thabs bskyed pa'i 'khor lo lha'i rang bzhin gsung sngags
NK106(me)012:1393: kyi 'khor lo dang bcas pa dang /
NK106(me)012:1394: chos sku ltar shes rab rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsam
NK106(me)012:1395: gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo lam
NK106(me)012:1396: du byed pas / 'bras bu dang cha 'dra lam du byed pa'i phyir de skad brjod de /
NK106(me)012:1398: 'dra ba lam du byed pa'i phyir //
NK106(me)012:1399: 'bras bu'i theg par yang dag brjod //
NK106(me)012:1401: gsum pa rgyud sde bzhir dbye tshul nges pa lnga las /
NK106(me)012:1402: mi rigs bzhi la dgongs nas kyang bzhir bshad de /
NK106(me)012:1403: gtsang sbra can bram ze 'dul ba la bya ba'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1404: rje'u rigs 'dul ba la spyod pa rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1405: rgyal rigs 'dul ba la rnal 'byor gyi rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1406: dmangs rigs gdol ba 'dul ba la bla med de /
NK106(me)012:1407: bde mchog rol pa'i rgyud las /
NK106(me)012:1408: bya ba bram ze gtsang dang bstun //
NK106(me)012:1409: spyod pa rje'u rigs de bas lhag /
NK106(me)012:1411: gzhi dmangs gdod nas grol ba ste //
NK106(me)012:1412: gzhan du su la'ang ma bstan par //
NK106(me)012:1413: mdzes ma khyod la bstan pa yin //
NK106(me)012:1415: dur khrod rgyan gyi rgyud las /
NK106(me)012:1416: bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u rigs dang //
NK106(me)012:1417: dmangs rigs gdol ba 'dul don du //
NK106(me)012:1418: rgyud ni rnam pa bzhir gsungs te //
NK106(me)012:1419: bya spyod rnal 'byor bla med do //
NK106(me)012:1421: gang zag gi blo rigs bzhi la dgongs nas kyang bzhir bshad de /
NK106(me)012:1422: dbang po rab kyi tha ma la bya ba /
NK106(me)012:1425: yang rab la bla med gsungs pa nyid /
