NK106(me)012:1427: dman pa rnams la bya ba'i rgyud //
NK106(me)012:1428: bya min rnal 'byor de ltag la //
NK106(me)012:1429: sems can mchog la rnal 'byor rgyud //
NK106(me)012:1430: rnal 'byor bla med de ltag la'o //
NK106(me)012:1432: dus la ltos nas kyang bzhir gsungs te /
NK106(me)012:1433: bskal pa dang po rdzogs ldan gyi dus 'od dang /
NK106(me)012:1436: tshe phun sum tshogs pa bzhi la spyod pas bya ba'i rgyud 'byung ba'i dus so //
NK106(me)012:1437: de nas rdzu 'phrul ma gtogs pa gsum sngon gyi
NK106(me)012:1438: de tsam du ldan pas spyod pa'i rgyud 'byung ba'i
NK106(me)012:1439: dus so // de nas bdud rtsi ma gtogs pa
NK106(me)012:1440: gnyis ldan pas rnal 'byor gyi rgyud 'byung ba'i dus
NK106(me)012:1441: dus so // so // de nas thams cad 'gribs
NK106(me)012:1442: te 'bras s+aa lu'i ljang pa zas su za zhing
NK106(me)012:1443: pho mo'i dbang po so sor dod nas phan tshun
NK106(me)012:1444: rtsod pas rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud 'byung
NK106(me)012:1445: dus so // so // ba'i dus te / lha thams cad yang dag par 'dus pa'i rgyud las /
NK106(me)012:1446: rdzogs ldan dang po bya ba'i rgyud //
NK106(me)012:1447: sum ldan gnyis pa spyod pa'i rgyud //
NK106(me)012:1448: nyis ldan gsum pa rnal 'byor rgyud //
NK106(me)012:1449: rtsod ldan bzhi pa bla med rgyud //
NK106(me)012:1450: dus ni bzhi la dgongs nas kyang //
NK106(me)012:1451: rgyud ni rnam pa bzhir bshad do //
NK106(me)012:1453: sbyang gzhi 'dod chags kyi 'jug tshul bzhi sbyong ba la dgongs nas kyang bzhir gsungs te /
NK106(me)012:1454: rdzogs ldan gyi dus su bltas pas tshim pa /
NK106(me)012:1455: sum ldan gyi dus su bgad pas tshim pa /
NK106(me)012:1456: nyis ldan gyi dus su lag pa bcangs shing reg pas tshim pa /
NK106(me)012:1457: rtsod ldan gyi dus su dbang po'i sgo sbyar pas
NK106(me)012:1458: tshim pa'i 'dod chags bzhi dag par sbyong ba la
NK106(me)012:1459: bya spyod rnal 'byor bla med bzhir gsungs pa nyid
NK106(me)012:1461: dus ni rnam bzhi'i dbye ba yis //
NK106(me)012:1462: rgyud ni rnam pa bzhir gsungs te //
NK106(me)012:1463: bltas pa dang ni bgad pa dang //
NK106(me)012:1464: de bzhin gzhan ni lag bcangs nyid //
NK106(me)012:1465: gnyis gnyis 'khyud pa gang yin pa //
NK106(me)012:1466: de ltar rgyud ni rnam pa bzhi //
NK106(me)012:1469: blta dang dgod dang lag bcangs dang //
NK106(me)012:1470: gnyis gnyis 'khyud pa gang yin pa //
NK106(me)012:1471: srin bu me yi tshul gyis su //
NK106(me)012:1472: rgyud ni rnam pa bzhir gsungs so //
NK106(me)012:1477: sum cu rtsa gsum dang rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha'i
NK106(me)012:1478: 'dod chags rigs bzhi sbyong bas kyang bzhir bshad ces
NK106(me)012:1480: lha bzhi'i rjes su 'jug pa phyin ci log bzhi 'dul ba la dgongs nas kyang bzhir gsungs te /
NK106(me)012:1481: gti mug can tshangs pa gtsang sbra chos su smra ba ni /
NK106(me)012:1483: 'dag chal dag gis bsgos pa'i dgos //
NK106(me)012:1484: dri ma med par 'gyur ba bzhin //
NK106(me)012:1485: lus la mchod sbyin gyis bsgom la //
NK106(me)012:1487: ces pa'i tshul rjes su gzung ba'i phyir bya ba'i rgyud do //
NK106(me)012:1488: zhe sdang can khyab 'jug 'tshe ba chos su smra ste /
NK106(me)012:1489: rgyal rigs la ni rgyal rigs dang //
NK106(me)012:1490: bram ze 'dod la bram ze gsang //
NK106(me)012:1491: zhes pa'i tshul rjes su gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa'i rgyud de /
NK106(me)012:1493: e ma ho gsod pa 'di ni bzang //
NK106(me)012:1494: gsod pas byang chub thob par byed //
NK106(me)012:1496: nga rgyal can brgya byin rjes su gzung ba'i phyir rnal 'byor gyi rgyud gsungs pa ni /
NK106(me)012:1497: dbang phyug 'byor pa lha yi rgyud //
NK106(me)012:1500: 'dod chags can dbang phyug ni 'dod chags chos su smra ste /
NK106(me)012:1501: g+ho ham bud med nyid yin te //
NK106(me)012:1502: de yi nye gnas thab khung nyid //
NK106(me)012:1503: ces pa rjes su gzung ba la bla med gsungs pa ni /
NK106(me)012:1505: bud med gzugs dang mdangs bzang ma //
NK106(me)012:1506: lo grangs bcu drug lon pa la //
NK106(me)012:1507: byin gyis brlabs te gnas gsum du //
NK106(me)012:1508: dben par mchod pa rab tu brtsam //
NK106(me)012:1510: gsum pa shes byed rgyud sde'i rnam grangs la bzhi las /
NK106(me)012:1511: dang po bya ba'i rgyud la'ang chings gsum las /
NK106(me)012:1512: phyi ltar bcings na mchod pa dang gtor ma gtsor bor ston pa legs par grub pa /
NK106(me)012:1513: ting nge 'dzin bsgrub pa gtso bor ston pa bsam gtan phyi ma /
NK106(me)012:1514: dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga gtso bor ston pa gsang ba'i spyi rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1515: spyod pa gtso bor ston pa dpung ba bzang po dang bzhi'o //
NK106(me)012:1516: bye brag tu sku gsung thugs ltar bcings nas /
NK106(me)012:1517: sku'i rgyud rdo rje gtsug tor /
NK106(me)012:1518: bshad pa'i rgyud 'jam dpal rtsa rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1519: mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1520: gsang ba'i rgyud rnam par rol pa /
NK106(me)012:1521: 'jam dpal rnam par rol pa yid bzhin mchog gi rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1522: bstod pa glur blangs kyi le'u /
NK106(me)012:1524: bshad rgyud cho ga 'dus pa la sogs pa'o //
NK106(me)012:1525: gsung gi rgyud pad+ma brtsegs pa /
NK106(me)012:1526: bshad rgyud pad+ma cod pan la sogs pa'o //
NK106(me)012:1527: thugs kyi rtsa rgyud rig pa mchog /
NK106(me)012:1528: bshad rgyud mi 'khrugs pa'i gzungs la sogs pa'o //
NK106(me)012:1530: sangs rgyas kyi dbu las gdugs dkar po can /
NK106(me)012:1532: dpung pa las dpung pa bzang po /
NK106(me)012:1534: phyag las phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba /
NK106(me)012:1535: lte ba las su sid+d+hi ka ra //
NK106(me)012:1536: gsang ba las don yod zhags pa /
NK106(me)012:1538: skye mched las yid bzhin nor bu /
NK106(me)012:1539: dngos grub bum pa 'od zer can /
NK106(me)012:1540: sgrol ma la sogs pa ste /
NK106(me)012:1541: mdor na mdo sde dang gzungs 'bum gyi nang na /
NK106(me)012:1542: la la la rtog pa zhes bya /
NK106(me)012:1543: la la la gzungs zhes bya ba rab tu mang
NK106(me)012:1544: bar bzhugs pa rnams te bsdu na rgyud sde stong
NK106(me)012:1545: phrag bzhi'o // spyod pa'i rgyud kyi rtsa rgyud rnam snang mngon byang /
NK106(me)012:1546: bshad rgyud kun nas brgyan pa bkod pa chen po /
NK106(me)012:1548: bde ba'i myu gu la sogs pa'o //
NK106(me)012:1551: bshad rgyud rdo rje rtse mo /
NK106(me)012:1552: cha mthun gyi rgyud dpal mchog dang po /
NK106(me)012:1555: rdo rje sems dpa'i rgyud gsum /
NK106(me)012:1556: byin gyis brlab pa'i rgyud ngan song sbyong ba /
NK106(me)012:1558: thams cad gsang ba'i thugs la sogs pa'o //
NK106(me)012:1559: rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud la gnyis las /
NK106(me)012:1560: pha bla na med pa'i rgyud kyi /
NK106(me)012:1561: rtsa rgyud dpal gsang ba 'dus pa /
NK106(me)012:1562: bshad pa'i rgyud dgongs pa lung ston /
NK106(me)012:1563: ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa /
NK106(me)012:1566: 'phros pa cha mthun gyi rgyud la /
NK106(me)012:1568: gshin rje'i gshed dmar po la sogs pa'o //
NK106(me)012:1570: gshin rje'i gshed nag po zhal gsum pa'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1571: gzhon nu gdong drug pa'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1573: 'jigs byed rtog pa bdun pa zhal dgu pa'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1575: rdo rje snyoms 'jug gsang ba'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1578: rdo rje dri ma med pa'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1579: dbang bskur ba kun nas bkod pa'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1580: rdo rje mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud la sogs pa'o //
NK106(me)012:1581: ma'i rgyud la kun gyi rtsa ba rdo rje sems dpa' kun du bkod pa /
NK106(me)012:1583: gsung gi rgyud ma h+aa m+aa y+aa /
NK106(me)012:1584: thugs kyi rgyud skye rdo rje /
NK106(me)012:1585: yon tan gyi rgyud thig le chen po /
NK106(me)012:1586: phrin las kyi rgyud rdo rje gdan bzhi'o //
NK106(me)012:1590: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1591: gser gyi char pa lta bu'i rgyud do //
NK106(me)012:1592: 'phros pa cha mthun gyi rgyud la /
NK106(me)012:1593: dga' chen za nus kyi rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1594: bde chen sgeg pa m+aa ma k+ai'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1595: gsang ba yid bzhin bde ba'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1596: rdo rje mkha' 'gro bskyed rim rgyas par ston pa'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1597: bsdus pa ston pa kun spyod kyi rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1598: mo 'ba' zhig ston pa phag mo mngon 'byung gi rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1599: de'i khyad par ston pa khrag 'thung mngon 'byung gi rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1600: rdzogs rim gtso bor ston pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho /
NK106(me)012:1601: dbang bzhi ston pa lta ba rgya mtsho'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1602: mngon spyod ston pa dus rgya mtsho'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1603: rlung gi las ston pa sdom pa 'byung ba'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1604: brtul zhugs kyi las ston pa sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1605: thun mong gi gnas la gdams pa bde mchog ra li'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1606: de thams cad gnyis su med par ston pa 'jam dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba /
NK106(me)012:1607: de nyid gsal bar ston pa dus kyi 'khor lo la sogs pa'o //
NK106(me)012:1608: 'di dag la'ang pha'i pha rgyud la sogs pa dgu'i
NK106(me)012:1609: dbye ba sngon gyi slob dpon kha cig gis bstan
NK106(me)012:1610: nas / dgur 'byed par snang yang rgyud kyi rdo
NK106(me)012:1611: rje'i tshig gis dngos su zin pa med pas grags
NK106(me)012:1613: pha ma bla na med pa gnyis su bsdu ba tsam don la gnas te /
NK106(me)012:1614: dgongs pa kun du grags pa'i rgyud las /
NK106(me)012:1615: theg mchog bla na med pa yang //
NK106(me)012:1616: ye shes che ba'i khyad par las //
NK106(me)012:1617: rgyud kyi dbye ba gnyis su bshad //
NK106(me)012:1618: pha rgyud bla na med pa dang //
NK106(me)012:1619: ma rgyud bla na med pa'o //
NK106(me)012:1623: snang ba dang stong pa gnyis gnyis mjal ba la ltos pa dang /
NK106(me)012:1624: skyes pa dang bud med gnyis gdul bas kyang gnyis po 'dir rigs bsdus te /
NK106(me)012:1626: skyes pa rnams ni gdul bya'i phyir //
NK106(me)012:1627: rnal 'byor pha yi rgyud bstan cing //
NK106(me)012:1628: btsun mo rnams ni dga' bya'i phyir //
NK106(me)012:1629: phyi nas rnal 'byor ma rgyud gsungs //
NK106(me)012:1631: de gnyis las gzhan zhig gi gnyis med kyi rgyud du dbye ba ni rigs par ma mthong la /
NK106(me)012:1632: de gnyis so so la'ang thabs shes dang bskyed rdzogs gnyis med la sogs ni gnas mod kyi /
NK106(me)012:1633: pha ma gnyis las tha dad pa'i gnyis med gud
NK106(me)012:1634: du yod pa ma yin pas snga ma bzhin no
NK106(me)012:1635: // don gnyis pa gsang sngags rnying ma'i rnam par gzhag pa la gsum ste /
NK106(me)012:1636: gsung ba po ston pa'i byon tshul /
NK106(me)012:1637: des gsungs pa sngags kyi rang bzhin /
NK106(me)012:1638: shes byed rgyud sde'i rnam grangs so //
NK106(me)012:1639: dang po ni thun mong pa kha cig dang por sems bskyed /
NK106(me)012:1640: bar du grangs med gsum du tshogs bsags /
NK106(me)012:1642: dka' ba spyod pa'i rten la zung 'jug gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsgoms pas /
NK106(me)012:1643: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dbang bskur te 'og min du sangs rgyas nas /
NK106(me)012:1644: slar yang sems can gyi don du rdo rje gdan
NK106(me)012:1645: du 'tshang rgya tshul bstan nas phyi ltar na sh+aakya
NK106(me)012:1646: thub pa / nang ltar na rdo rje 'chang chen /
NK106(me)012:1647: gsang ba ltar na dpal kun du bzang po byang
NK106(me)012:1648: chub mchog gi dkyil 'khor du snang bas 'bras bu
NK106(me)012:1649: gsang sngags kyi theg pa gdul bya so so la
NK106(me)012:1652: don grub dka' thub lus can la //
NK106(me)012:1653: phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba sprin bzhin du //
NK106(me)012:1654: 'dus pas longs spyod don gyi phyir //
NK106(me)012:1655: srod dang tho rangs dus nyid du //
NK106(me)012:1656: nyi zla za ba'i dbang byin nas //
NK106(me)012:1657: rol pa'i ka ra bstan pa yis //
NK106(me)012:1658: de bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
NK106(me)012:1660: thun mong ma yin pa kha cig thog ma med
NK106(me)012:1661: pa'i gnas su mngon par byang chub nas chos kyi
NK106(me)012:1662: sku'i gnas skabs na dpal kun du bzang po nyid
NK106(me)012:1663: / longs spyod rdzogs pa sku'i gnas skabs na rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas su bzhengs pa'i ngang las /
NK106(me)012:1664: sprul pa sku'i gnas skabs na gdul bya'i dbang gis
NK106(me)012:1665: 'og min khang bu brtsegs pa ste gtsang ma ris
NK106(me)012:1666: kyi gnas su rdo rje 'chang dang /
NK106(me)012:1667: 'gro drug so so'i gnas su sh+aakya thub pa la
NK106(me)012:1668: sogs pa thub pa drug tu snang ba grangs med
NK106(me)012:1669: pas / gdul bya so so'i mos pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos dpag tu med pa dang /
NK106(me)012:1670: khyad par du gsang sngags don gyi 'khor lo bskor bar bzhed de /
NK106(me)012:1671: dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba chen po'i chos kyi rnam
NK106(me)012:1672: grangs stong phrag brgya pa las sems dang ye shes
NK106(me)012:1673: rang snang bar ston pa'i gnas gsang ba'i snying po
NK106(me)012:1674: de kho na nyid nges pa las /
NK106(me)012:1675: thugs rje chen po'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba /
NK106(me)012:1676: rig pa'i skyes bu thub pa drug /
NK106(me)012:1677: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'thon to //
NK106(me)012:1678: 'thon nas kyang las kyi dbang gis s+n+rel zhi dang /
NK106(me)012:1679: yan man gyi 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha'
NK106(me)012:1680: yas mu med pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po
NK106(me)012:1681: re rer / thub pa chen po bcom ldan 'das re res /
NK106(me)012:1682: 'dul ba rnam pa bzhis 'gro ba lnga'i don mdzad do zhes so //
NK106(me)012:1683: de'ang sku gsum gyi ston pa gsum la zhing khams gsum dang /
NK106(me)012:1685: 'khor gsum la sogs par dbye bas chos kyi sku'i ston pa dpal kun tu bzang po /
NK106(me)012:1686: chos rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po gsang sngags bla na med pa /
NK106(me)012:1688: dus bsam gyis mi khyab pa /
NK106(me)012:1689: gnas chos nyid don gyi 'og min no //
NK106(me)012:1690: longs spyod rdzogs pa sku'i ston pa rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas /
NK106(me)012:1692: 'khor phyag na rdo rje dang 'jam dpal la sogs
NK106(me)012:1693: pa dbang po dang yul snang dag pa 'bras bu'i
NK106(me)012:1695: gnas rang snang lhun stug po bkod pa'i zhing khams so //
NK106(me)012:1696: sprul pa sku'i ston pa rdo rje 'chang thub pa drug /
NK106(me)012:1697: chos theg pa che chung 'khor sar gnas dang /
NK106(me)012:1700: rig sngags 'chang ba la sogs pa ma nges sna tshogs /
NK106(me)012:1701: dus chos 'byung gdul bya dang mtshungs pa da ltar ba /
NK106(me)012:1702: gnas lha gnas kyi 'og min dang /
NK106(me)012:1703: dur khrod chen po dang rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha
NK106(me)012:1704: ga la sogs pa gsang ba chen po'i 'og min
NK106(me)012:1705: dang / 'gro drug so so'i gnas ris tha dad pa'o //
NK106(me)012:1706: 'di dag tu thog ma med pa'i dus nas da
NK106(me)012:1707: lta phyi ma'i matha'i mur thug pa'i bar du sku
NK106(me)012:1708: gsung thugs mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor los 'khor
NK106(me)012:1709: ba ji srid par rnam par rol pa tshad med
NK106(me)012:1710: pas 'gro ba'i don rtag pa rgyun gyi 'khor mor
NK106(me)012:1712: gnyis pa des gsungs pa'i sngags kyi rang bzhin la /
NK106(me)012:1713: gsungs tshul gsum gyis spyir dbye ba /
NK106(me)012:1714: rim dgu nges pas bye brag tu dbye ba /
NK106(me)012:1715: phyi nang bshad pas 'gag bsdu ba dang gsum las /
NK106(me)012:1716: dang po ni sku gsum so so'i ston pas chos
NK106(me)012:1717: bstan pa thams cad kyang dbang po'i rim pa dang
NK106(me)012:1719: snying po'i don rnams bsdus te gsungs pa dang /
NK106(me)012:1720: dus gsum spyi dang bye brag gi gnyen por gsungs pa dang gsum du nges te /
NK106(me)012:1721: a ti bkod pa chen po las /
NK106(me)012:1722: bstan pa'i lugs ni rnam pa gsum //
NK106(me)012:1723: ji ltar skas kyi rim pa bzhin //
NK106(me)012:1724: dbang po'i don du bstan pa dang //
NK106(me)012:1725: 'o ma las ni mar bzhin du //
NK106(me)012:1726: bsdu ba'i don du bstan pa dang //
NK106(me)012:1727: tsha ba'i nad la ga pur bzhin //
NK106(me)012:1728: gnyen po'i don du bstan pa'o //
NK106(me)012:1730: sgra thal 'gyur rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
NK106(me)012:1731: gsungs tshul dgongs pa gsum dang bcas //
NK106(me)012:1732: gnyen po bsdu dang dbang po'i don //
NK106(me)012:1733: tshig rnams bsdus te bstan par bya //
NK106(me)012:1735: de'ang gnyen po'i don du gsungs pa ni /
NK106(me)012:1736: chos kyi phung po brgyad khri dang bzhi stong ste /
NK106(me)012:1740: de gsum cha mnyam pa'i nyon mongs pa nyi khri
NK106(me)012:1741: chig stong ste nyon mongs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong
NK106(me)012:1745: sde snod gsum cha mnyam pa nyi khri chig stong
NK106(me)012:1746: ste chos kyi sgo mo brgyad khri bzhi stong ngo
NK106(me)012:1747: // dbang po'i don du gsungs pa ni theg pa'i rim pa dagu'o //
NK106(me)012:1748: bsdu ba'i don du gsungs pa ni gsang sngags phyi nang gnyis so //
NK106(me)012:1749: gnyis pa rim dgu nges pas bye brag tu dbye ba ni /
NK106(me)012:1750: chung ngu'i chung ngu nyan thos kyi theg pa /
NK106(me)012:1751: chung ngu'i 'bring rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa /
NK106(me)012:1752: chung ngu'i chen po byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa /
NK106(me)012:1753: 'bring gi chung ngu kri ya'i theg pa /
NK106(me)012:1754: 'bring gi 'bring u pa ya'i theg pa /
NK106(me)012:1755: 'bring gi chen po yo ga'i theg pa /
NK106(me)012:1756: chen po'i chung ngu ma h+aa'i theg pa /
NK106(me)012:1757: chen po'i 'bring a nu'i theg pa /
NK106(me)012:1758: chen po'i chen po a ti'i theg pa ste theg pa'i rim pa dgu ste /
NK106(me)012:1760: de ltar dgu la brten nas ni /
NK106(me)012:1761: khams gsum po yang yang dag gi //
NK106(me)012:1764: bkod pa chen po yid bzhin mchog gi rgyud las /
NK106(me)012:1765: chung ngu gsum la bstan pa ni //
NK106(me)012:1766: mtshan mar 'dzin la nyan thos te //
NK106(me)012:1767: 'du shes can la rang rgyal nyid //
NK106(me)012:1768: rtog 'jug can la byang sems so //
NK106(me)012:1769: 'bring po gsum la bstan pa ni //
NK106(me)012:1770: rab tu dman la bya ba ste //
NK106(me)012:1771: dman pa rnams la spyod pa'o //
NK106(me)012:1772: rnam shes can la rnal 'byor nyid //
NK106(me)012:1773: chen po gsum la bstan pa ni //
NK106(me)012:1774: sems yas pa la bskyed pa ste //
NK106(me)012:1775: sems bcud can la rdzogs pa nyid //
NK106(me)012:1776: mchog gsang rab la rdzogs pa che //
NK106(me)012:1778: gsum pa phyi nang bshad pas 'gag bsdu ba la /
NK106(me)012:1780: rgyas par bshad pa gnyis las /
NK106(me)012:1781: dang po ni gsang sngags phyi la k+r+ai ya /
NK106(me)012:1786: a ti gsum ste rgyud sde drug tu gsungs pa nyid /
NK106(me)012:1789: rgyu la gsum dang 'bras la gnyis //
NK106(me)012:1790: gnyis pa las phye drug tu 'gyur //
NK106(me)012:1791: 'di ltar dbang po'i rim pas so //
NK106(me)012:1793: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i theg pa la dbye na rgyu mtshan nyid dang 'bras bu gsang sngags gnyis /
NK106(me)012:1794: 'bras bu gsang sngags la dbye na phyi pa gsum /
NK106(me)012:1795: nang pa gsum ste drug ni dbang po rno rtul gyis phye zhes pa'i don no //
NK106(me)012:1796: rgyas par bshad pa la drug las /
NK106(me)012:1797: dang po k+r+ai ya tan+t+ra ste bya ba'i rgyud kyi
NK106(me)012:1798: rang bzhin ni kun rdzob 'khrul ngor snang ba'i phung
NK106(me)012:1799: po khams dang skye mched kyi chos rnams sbyang bya'i
NK106(me)012:1801: dbyings rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i sems nyid sbyang gzhir byas nas /
NK106(me)012:1802: lam gtsang sbra dang lha'i de nyid bsgom pa'ang bdag
NK106(me)012:1803: dang lha ye shes sems dpa' rje dang khol po'i
NK106(me)012:1804: tshul du lta bas dngos grub 'dod pa'o //
NK106(me)012:1805: u pa ya tan+t+ra ste spyod pa'i rgyud kyi rang bzhin ni /
NK106(me)012:1806: lta ba yo ga ltar byed cing spyod pa k+r+ai ya ltar byed la /
NK106(me)012:1807: khyad par du bdag dam tshig pa'i mdun du ye
NK106(me)012:1808: shes sems dpa' spun nam grogs po'i tshul du bsgoms
NK106(me)012:1810: yo ga tan+t+ra ste rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi rang bzhin ni /
NK106(me)012:1811: snang srid kyi chos kun rdzob kyi bden pa thams cad /
NK106(me)012:1812: don dam sems nyid kyi ngang du sbyangs nas lam sngon byang ltas lha'i dkyil 'khor bskyed dus /
NK106(me)012:1813: bdag dam tshig pa la lha ye shes pa dgug gshegs byas pa las dngos grub 'dod pa'o //
NK106(me)012:1815: gdan pad+ma las mngon par byang chub pa /
NK106(me)012:1816: gsung yig 'bru las mngon par byang chub pa /
NK106(me)012:1817: thugs phyag mtshan las mngon par byang chub pa /
NK106(me)012:1818: sku yongs su rdzogs pa las mngon par byang chub pa /
NK106(me)012:1819: lha ye shes sems dpa' las mngon par byang chub pa ste /
NK106(me)012:1824: ston pa phun sum tshogs pa lnga'i bkod pa rdzogs par byed pa'o //
NK106(me)012:1825: nang pa thabs kyi rgyud gsum las /
NK106(me)012:1826: ma h+aa yo ga tan+t+ra ste thabs chen po pha'i rgyud kyi rang bzhin ni /
NK106(me)012:1827: chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa sku dang ye shes kyi rol par gtan la phab nas /
NK106(me)012:1828: bskyed pa'i rim pa thabs gtso bas bdag dang lha
NK106(me)012:1829: ye shes pa dag mnyam gcig gi ngang nas sgo
NK106(me)012:1830: gsum dkyil 'khor gsum gyi rang bzhin dang mi 'bral
NK106(me)012:1831: zhing rlung phra mo'i rnal 'byor lam du byed pas
NK106(me)012:1833: a nu yo ga tan+t+ra ste shes rab ma'i rgyud kyi rang bzhin ni /
NK106(me)012:1834: chos thams cad ye nas dkyil 'khor du sangs rgyas
NK106(me)012:1835: pas dbyings dang ye shes bden pa dbyer med gcig
NK106(me)012:1836: gi ngang nas / khams bde ba chen po phra mo'i rnal 'byor las dngos grub 'dod pa'o //
NK106(me)012:1837: a ti yo ga tan+t+ra ste gnyis su med pa'i rdzogs pa chen po ni /
NK106(me)012:1838: chos thams cad ye nas byang chub kyi sems su rdzogs pas /
NK106(me)012:1839: spang blang bya rtsol med pa'i chos nyid sku gsum lhun grub chen por ye nas grol te /
NK106(me)012:1840: rang byung gi ye shes la phyogs dang ris med /
NK106(me)012:1841: rtag chad dang 'pho 'gyur med par la zlos pas /
NK106(me)012:1842: gzhi lam 'bras bu'i tha snyad las 'das te /
NK106(me)012:1843: dus bzhi chos nyid kyi 'khor lo dang mi 'bral bas /
NK106(me)012:1844: chos nyid phyogs yan chen por rang shar te /
NK106(me)012:1845: 'khor 'das sems las med par thag chod /
NK106(me)012:1846: rtag chad tshig las 'das par sun phyung /
NK106(me)012:1847: khams gsum yongs grol chen por 'ub chub /
NK106(me)012:1848: gang snang thugs phrad ye grol du dmigs rnyed /
NK106(me)012:1849: rang shar chos sku zang mar gdeng chos /
NK106(me)012:1850: snang sems chos zad blo 'das su gzer thebs te /
NK106(me)012:1851: yul chos nyid kyi rol pa la /
NK106(me)012:1852: yul can ye shes kyi klong rdol bas /
NK106(me)012:1853: 'khor 'das byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor du sangs
NK106(me)012:1854: rgyas pa'i don las gzhan du mi 'gyur ba'i ye
NK106(me)012:1858: rgyu 'bras la zlos pa'i chos nyid dus bzung ste /
NK106(me)012:1859: dngos grub rang chas chos sku las mi 'da' bar 'dod la /
NK106(me)012:1862: man ngag gi sde'i gnas chen po gsum gyis bcings pa'i rang bzhin du bzhugs so //
NK106(me)012:1863: gsang sngags nang pa gsum po de yang dang po
NK106(me)012:1864: dang bar pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i tshul gyis gzhi
NK106(me)012:1865: lam 'bras bu'i bdag nyid chen po gcig tu bzhugs
NK106(me)012:1866: pa ni / seng ge rtsal rdzogs chen po'i rgyud las /
NK106(me)012:1867: bskyed pa ma h+aa yo ga ni rnams kyi gzhi lta bu'o //
NK106(me)012:1868: lung a nu yo ga ni chos rnams kyi lam lta bu'o //
NK106(me)012:1869: rdzogs pa a ti yo ga ni chos rnams kyi 'bras bu lta bu'o zhes gsungs so //
NK106(me)012:1870: gsum pa shes byed rgyud sde'i rnam grangs dgod pa la drug las /
NK106(me)012:1871: dang po k+r+ai ya la'ang spyi dang bye brag gi rgyud gnyis las /
NK106(me)012:1872: k+r+ai ya spyi'i rgyud drug la /
NK106(me)012:1873: rig sngags thams cad kyi khog dbub pa dpung pa bzang po'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1874: rig sngags thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1875: rig sngags thams cad kyi gsang ba bstan pa rig pa mchog gi rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1876: rig sngags thams cad kyi 'dul ba ston pa su sid+d+hi ka ra'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1877: rig sngags thams cad kyi 'phrin las ston pa khams gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1878: rig sngags thams cad kyi dgongs pa ston pa bsam gtan phyi ma'i rgyud do //
NK106(me)012:1880: rigs gsum gyi spyan ras gzigs kyi skor la /
NK106(me)012:1881: pad+ma rtse mo sngags kyi rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1885: a mo g+ha p+aa sha'i rgyud la sogs pa'o //
NK106(me)012:1886: phyag na rdo rje'i skor la /
NK106(me)012:1887: phyag na rdo rje dbang gi rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1889: rdo rje be con gyi rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1890: rdo rje rnon po'i rgyud la sogs pa'o //
NK106(me)012:1892: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' dri ma med pa'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1893: 'jam dpal dra ba gcod pa'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1894: bstod pa glur blangs kyi rgyud la sogs pa'o //
NK106(me)012:1895: las phran tshegs kyi rgyud la /
NK106(me)012:1900: mdzod spu nor bu la sogs pa gzungs phran rnams so //
NK106(me)012:1902: rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1905: rnam par mi rtog pa'i rgyud la sogs pa'o //
NK106(me)012:1907: rdo rje dbyings rtsa ba'i rgyud stong phrag lnga pa le lag dang bcas pa /
NK106(me)012:1908: p+aa sh+aa ka ra rdo rje rtse mo'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1909: pad+m+aa ka ra dpal mchog dang po'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1910: sa muts+tsha rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud de gzhung chen po bzhi /
NK106(me)012:1911: ngan song sbyong ba dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis kyi rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1912: dpal mchog bsdus pa de kho na nyid kyi rgyud la sogs pa'o //
NK106(me)012:1914: rtsa ba'i rgyud dpal gsang ba 'dus pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1915: ri rab zom rgya mtsho dang mnyam pa'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1916: ye shes rgyas pas gzhi dang mnyam pa'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1917: sku'i rgyud 'jam dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba /
NK106(me)012:1918: gsung gi rgyud pad+ma sgyu 'phrul dra ba /
NK106(me)012:1919: thugs kyi rgyud rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba /
NK106(me)012:1920: yon tan gyi rgyud rin chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba /
NK106(me)012:1921: 'phrin las kyi rgyud karma sgyu 'phrul dra ba ste /
NK106(me)012:1922: 'di dag la le'u 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis las /
NK106(me)012:1923: bod du le lag kha cig 'gyur bar 'dod do //
NK106(me)012:1925: bar chad bsrung ba gzi ldan 'bar ba mtshams kyi rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1926: rngam byed me ltar 'bar ba'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1927: za byed rol pa sbyin sreg gi rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1928: stobs po che yongs su sgrol ba'i rgyu /
NK106(me)012:1930: tshe bdag las kyi gshin rje'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1931: zhi ba lha'i rgyud la sogs pa'o //
NK106(me)012:1933: mdo sgyu 'phrul ye shes rngam pa klog gi 'khor lo /
NK106(me)012:1935: dur khrod khu byug rol pa /
NK106(me)012:1938: yi ge rnam dag gi mdo dang mdo drug /
NK106(me)012:1943: rdo rje gdan bzhi'i rgyud do //
NK106(me)012:1944: gdams pa man ngag gi rgyud la /
NK106(me)012:1946: gsung gi rgyud dbang chen 'dus pa /
NK106(me)012:1947: thugs kyi rgyud pun+da r+ai ka /
NK106(me)012:1948: yon tan gyi rgyud lha mo gsang ba /
NK106(me)012:1950: rig sngags spyi'i sgrub pa he ru ka'i tan+t+ra /
NK106(me)012:1951: bye brag gi sgrub pa zla gsang nag po /
NK106(me)012:1952: pad+ma gsung gi rgyud rta mchog rol pa /
NK106(me)012:1953: yang dag thugs kyi rgyud he ru ka'i gal po /
NK106(me)012:1954: phur pa 'phrin las kyi rgyud bi to ta ma la 'bum sde /
NK106(me)012:1955: bdud rtsi yon tan gyi rgyud bdud rtsi rol pa che chung /
NK106(me)012:1956: ma mo rbod gtong gi rgyud ma mo kun 'dus so //
NK106(me)012:1957: sgrub pa sde drug las kha tshar gyi rgyud la /
NK106(me)012:1958: 'phrin las thams cad kyi kha skong ba chos nyid gtor ma'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1959: las rgya mtsho ji ltar bya ba karma m+aa le 'phrin las kyi rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1960: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs gsog pa tshogs kyi rgyud che chung /
NK106(me)012:1961: mchod pa mi zad pa'i gter du byin gyis rlob pa nam mkha' mdzod kyi rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1962: sbyor ba gnas su dag pa thig le klong gi rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1963: sgrol ba gnas su dag pa stobs po che yongs su sgrol ba'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1964: brtul zhugs drag po'i kun du spyod pa glang po che rab 'bog gi rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1965: las bzhi mthar phyin pa za byed rol pa sbyin sreg gi rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1966: las thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba gtor ma'i rgyud che chung /
NK106(me)012:1967: bka'i 'khor lhag mas bskangs nas las la bskul ba dpa' 'bar khro mo'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1968: gdug pa can gzir mnan gyis tshar bcad pa zhing bcu rol pa'i rgyud la sogs pa'o //
NK106(me)012:1970: sems nyid bya rtsol las 'das pa nam mkha' che rtsa ba'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1971: de nyid nyams su blang ba nam mkha' che phyi ma'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1972: de nyid yongs su rdzogs pa'i 'bras bu nam mkha' che phyi ma'i rgyud yongs su sgrol ba /
NK106(me)012:1973: sems nyid 'pho 'gyur med pa chos nyid rgyal po'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1974: sems nyid thig le nyag gcig tu ston pa byang chub sems kyi thig le'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1975: sems nyid rang byung gi ye shes su ston pa ye shes thig le'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1976: sems nyid thams cad kyi rtsa bar ston pa man ngag 'phreng ba'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1977: sems nyid kun khyab chen por ston pa gsang ba rgyal po'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1978: sems nyid rang rig tu ston pa ye shes dam pa'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1979: sems nyid kun du bzang po'i rol par ston pa mkha' dbyings rnam dag gi rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1980: sems nyid kun gyi snying por ston pa man ngag snying po'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1981: sems nyid rang rig tu yid ches par ston pa snying po gsang ba'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1982: sems nyid kun gyi rtsa bar ston pa nam mkha' che rtsa ba can gyi rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1983: sems nyid gcig pur 'dus par ston pa nyag gcig dgongs pa'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1984: sems nyid ji bzhin par bzhag par ston pa bsam gtan chen po'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1985: sems nyid rgyun chags su goms par ston pa bsam gtan rgyun chags kyi rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1986: sems nyid thams cad du gsung bar ston pa sgo mang mdo'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1987: sems nyid dbang dang sbyar nas ston pa nam mkha' che dbang gi rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1988: sems nyid sgra tshig las 'das par ston pa nam mkha' che yi ge med pa'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1989: sems nyid gdod ma'i gnas su ston pa nam mkha' che gzhi'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1990: sems nyid 'od gsal du ston pa rin po che 'bar ba'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1991: sems nyid yon tan lhun grub tu sto napa rin po che 'phreng ba'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1992: sems nyid khams gsum la gsal bar ston pa khams gsum sgron ma'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1993: sems nyid spang blang las 'das par ston pa nges pasnyinga po'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1994: sems nyid 'pho 'gyur med par ston pa rdo rje gsang ba'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:1995: sems nyid ye nas sangs rgyas par ston pa ye
NK106(me)012:1996: sangs rgyas pa'i rgyud de dbyings rtsa ba'i rgyud nyi
NK106(me)012:1997: shu rtsa lnga / lung bam po bco brgyad gdams pa man ngag gi rgyud la /
NK106(me)012:1998: thams cad byang chub kyi sems las byung ba rig pa'i khu byug /
NK106(me)012:1999: rtsol sgrub zil gyis gnon pa rtsal chen sprugs pa /
NK106(me)012:2000: sems nyid dbyings su rdzogs pa khyung chen gshog rdzogs /
NK106(me)012:2001: chos nyid ye gnas kyi dgongs pa rdo la gser zhun /
NK106(me)012:2002: sems nyid lhun grub kyi lta ba mi nub rgyal mtshan /
NK106(me)012:2003: sems nyid ye nas stong pa rmad byung rgyal po /
NK106(me)012:2004: sems nyid chos skur ston pa ye shes dam pa /
NK106(me)012:2005: sems nyid thig ler ston pa yang tig rgyal po /
NK106(me)012:2006: sems nyid skye shi med par ston pa srog gi 'khor lo /
NK106(me)012:2007: sems nyid 'dod dgu 'byung bar ston pa yid bzhin nor bu /
NK106(me)012:2008: sems nyid mnyam rdzogs chen por ston pa thig le 'dus pa /
NK106(me)012:2009: sems nyid theg pa kun rdzogs su ston pa nam mkha' che rgyal po /
NK106(me)012:2010: sems nyid kun gyi yang rtser ston pa rtse mo phyung rgyal /
NK106(me)012:2011: sems nyid ye bde spros bral du ston pa bde ba rab 'byams /
NK106(me)012:2012: sems nyid nyon mongs pa med cing zag med du ston pa bde ba 'phra bkod /
NK106(me)012:2013: sems nyid 'khor 'das kyi gyes gzhir ston pa gter chen yongs rdzogs /
NK106(me)012:2014: sems nyid theg pa kun gyi spyi chings su ston pa lhun grub spyi chings /
NK106(me)012:2015: sems nyid rgya chad dang phyogs lhung med par ston pa nam mkha' mtha' dbus kyi rgyud do //
NK106(me)012:2017: 'khor ba dong sprug rin po che gsang ba'i rgyud /
NK106(me)012:2018: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po /
NK106(me)012:2019: a ti bkod pa chen po yongs su rdzogs pa'i
NK106(me)012:2020: rgyud la sogs pa spyi dang bye brag gi rgyud
NK106(me)012:2021: sde nam mkha' dang mnyam par bzhugs so //
NK106(me)012:2022: spyi don gsum pa de dag la bshad cing nyan pa'i tshul la /
NK106(me)012:2023: bshad thabs kyi tshul bsam pa /
NK106(me)012:2024: ji ltar bshad cing nyan pa'i tshul /
NK106(me)012:2025: bshad cing nyan pa'i phan yon bstan pa dang gsum las /
NK106(me)012:2026: dang po la'ang sangs rgyas chos gsung ba'i tshul /
NK106(me)012:2027: dgra bcom pa chos gsung ba'i tshul /
NK106(me)012:2028: pan+di ta chos gsung ba'i tshul dang gsum las /
NK106(me)012:2029: dang po ni cho 'phrul gsum la brten nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mdzad de /
NK106(me)012:2030: rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul 'od 'gyed pa dang shing
NK106(me)012:2031: ta la bdun srid tsam du nam mkha' la 'phags
NK106(me)012:2032: pa la sogs sku'i cho 'phrul tshad med pa bstan
NK106(me)012:2033: pas gdul bya dad cing 'dun par mdzad nas /
NK106(me)012:2034: kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul gdul bya'i rigs dang /
NK106(me)012:2036: bag la nyal ma lus pa mngon par shes pas gzigs te /
NK106(me)012:2037: de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan par dgongs nas 'khor
NK106(me)012:2038: gyi rgyud byin gyis rlob par mdzad pa ni thugs
NK106(me)012:2039: kyi cho 'phrul te rgyud dag cing las su rung
NK106(me)012:2040: bar bkod nas / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul
NK106(me)012:2041: gdul bya'i mos pa bzhin chos kyi char 'bebs par
NK106(me)012:2042: mdzad pas 'gro ba rnams mngon par mtho ba dang
NK106(me)012:2043: nges par legs pa'i go 'phang la sbyor bar mdzad
NK106(me)012:2044: bar bkod nas / do // 'di cho 'phrul rnams las mchog tu bshad de /
NK106(me)012:2046: cho 'phrul rnams las bstan pa mchog /
NK106(me)012:2047: mi 'khrul phyir dang mthur phyir dang //
NK106(me)012:2051: rdzu 'phrul gyis gdul bya dad par byed de ma
NK106(me)012:2052: dad pa chos kyi snod ma yin pa'i phyir ro
NK106(me)012:2054: ma gus pa la chos mi bshad //
NK106(me)012:2055: mi na bzhin du mgo g.yogs dang //
NK106(me)012:2056: gdugs dang 'khar ba mtshon thogs dang //
NK106(me)012:2057: mgo bo dkris pa dag la'ang min //
NK106(me)012:2059: kun brjod pas sems las su rung ba dang rgyud so sor mkhyen nas /
NK106(me)012:2060: rjes su bstan pas mos pa dang skal pa ji lta ba bzhin ston te /
NK106(me)012:2061: de lta ma yin na chos des gdul bya la
NK106(me)012:2062: phan mi thogs te nad dang sman 'dzol pa ltar
NK106(me)012:2063: slar la dug tu 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
NK106(me)012:2065: rgya chen chos kyi snod gyur pa //
NK106(me)012:2066: dman pa'i chos la sbyar mi bya //
NK106(me)012:2068: rgyan stug po bkod pa'i mdo las /
NK106(me)012:2069: rnal 'byor spyod pa stong pa nyid //
NK106(me)012:2070: gnas ma yin par sbyar mi bya //
NK106(me)012:2071: gnas ma yin par sbyar byas na //
NK106(me)012:2072: bdud rtsi dug tu 'gyur ba bzhin //
NK106(me)012:2074: dgra bcom pa chos gsung ba'i tshul ni /
NK106(me)012:2075: nyan pa po'i snod dag pa /
NK106(me)012:2077: gsung rab kyi brjod bya dag pa dang gsum la brten nas 'chad do //
NK106(me)012:2078: 'chad pa ni mngon shes kyis brtags pas chos kyi snod yin ma yin shes te /
NK106(me)012:2079: snod dang ldan pa nyid gdul bya'i yul du byas nas /
NK106(me)012:2080: ngag dag pa rna bar snyan zhing ngag tshig dri ma med pas mtshams sbyar te /
NK106(me)012:2081: chos kyi don dag pa nor ba dang 'khrul ba
NK106(me)012:2082: med par thar par 'dre ba'i sgra'i rnam grangs la
NK106(me)012:2083: sogs pa bstan pas don du 'gyur ba'o //
NK106(me)012:2084: 'o na cho 'phrul gsum la brten nas mi 'chad pa ci yin zhe na /
NK106(me)012:2085: nyan thos rnams la mi shes pa'i rgyu bzhi yod pas 'chad par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
NK106(me)012:2087: yul gyis bskal pas mi shes te /
NK106(me)012:2088: yul ha cang thag ring drags pa na 'dug pas
NK106(me)012:2089: mi shes pa moong+gala gyi bus ma gar skyes ma
NK106(me)012:2091: dus kyis bskal pas mi shes te dus ha cang
NK106(me)012:2092: snga drags pa na nam byung mi shes pa sh+aa
NK106(me)012:2093: ri'i bus khyim bdag dpal skyes kyi thar pa'i sa
NK106(me)012:2094: bon ma shes pa lta bu'o //
NK106(me)012:2095: mtshan nyid kyis bskal pas mi shes te /
NK106(me)012:2096: rgyu thug med kyi 'bras bu ji ltar yin pa dang /
NK106(me)012:2097: 'bras bu thug med kyi rgyu ji ltar yin pa la sogs pa ste /
NK106(me)012:2099: rma bya'i mdongs ni gcig pu la //
NK106(me)012:2100: rgyu yi dbye ba tha dad rnams //
NK106(me)012:2101: de mkhyen pa ni kun mkhyen te //
NK106(me)012:2102: kun mkhyen ye shes min pas min //
NK106(me)012:2104: sangs rgyas kyi chos rab tu mang po mi shes te /
NK106(me)012:2107: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la sogs pa byang chub chen po'i chos ma thob pas /
NK106(me)012:2108: khams bde bar gshegs pa'i snying po la sogs pa
NK106(me)012:2109: kun nas sgo'i chod kyi rnam grangs blta ba la
NK106(me)012:2112: mdor bsdu na gang zag bzhi po 'di ni de
NK106(me)012:2113: bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po mthong ba la mig dang
NK106(me)012:2114: mi ldan par rnam par bzhag ste /
NK106(me)012:2115: bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste /
NK106(me)012:2119: theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ste zhes so //
NK106(me)012:2120: pan+di ta chos gsung ba'i tshul la gnyis las /
NK106(me)012:2121: dpal n+aa lan+da'i gtsug lag khang na bzhugs pa'i pan+di ta rnams ni /
NK106(me)012:2122: bka' thams cad phun sum tshogs pa lngas 'chad /
NK106(me)012:2123: bstan bcos thams cad rtsis mgo yan lag lngas 'chad do //
NK106(me)012:2124: phun sum tshogs pa lnga la /
NK106(me)012:2130: 'di dag kyang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i zhing dang /
NK106(me)012:2131: sprul pa'i gnas kyis mngon par 'dus ma byas pa dang /
NK106(me)012:2132: byas pa gnyis su bstan to //
NK106(me)012:2133: longs sku gzhir gnas kyi zhing mngon par 'dus ma byas pa la /
NK106(me)012:2134: gnas phun sum tshogs pa 'og min stug po bkod pa'i zhing khams /
NK106(me)012:2135: ston pa phun sum tshogs pa dpal rnam par snang mdzad /
NK106(me)012:2136: chos phun sum tshogs pa theg pa chen po 'ba'
NK106(me)012:2137: zhig /'khor phun sum tshogs pa sa la gnas pa'i
NK106(me)012:2138: byang chub sems dpa'/ dus phun sum tshogs pa rtag pa rgyun gyi khor mo'o //
NK106(me)012:2139: 'du byas pa ni bka' 'khor lo gsum gyi rim pas /
NK106(me)012:2141: gnas phun sum tshogs pa w+aa r+aa na s+ai drang
NK106(me)012:2142: srong lhung ba ri dgas mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i
NK106(me)012:2143: nags / ston pa phun sum tshogs pa sh+aakya thub pa /
NK106(me)012:2144: chos phun sum tshogs pa bden pa bzhi /
NK106(me)012:2145: 'khor phun sum tshogs pa lnga ste bzang po lha brgyad khri dang bcas pa /
NK106(me)012:2146: dus phun sum tshogs pa sangs rgyas nas zhag bdun phrag bdun lon pa'i dus so //
NK106(me)012:2148: gnas phun sum tshogs pa rgyal po'i khab bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri /
NK106(me)012:2149: ston pa phun sum tshogs pa sh+aakya thub pa /
NK106(me)012:2150: chos phun sum tshogs pa bka' rgyas 'bring bsdus gsum sde tshan drug tu gtogs pa /
NK106(me)012:2151: 'khor phun sum tshogs pa la gnyis las /
NK106(me)012:2152: thun mong gi 'khor sh+aa ri'i bu dang /
NK106(me)012:2154: rab 'byor la sogs pa dge slong lnga stong tsam dang /
NK106(me)012:2155: skye dgu'i bdag mo la sogs pa dge slong ma lnga brgya tsam dang /
NK106(me)012:2156: khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang /
NK106(me)012:2157: dge bsnyen ma sa ga ma la sogs pa dge bsnyen dang /
NK106(me)012:2158: dge bsnyen ma'i tshogs rab tu mang po rnams so //
NK106(me)012:2159: thun mong ma yin pa'i 'khor byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong dang /
NK106(me)012:2161: ded dpon dam pa la sogs pa bye ba khrag khrig rab tu mang po rnams so //
NK106(me)012:2162: dus phun sum tshogs pa lo bcu gnyis su zla ba gnyis kyis mchog pa'i bar du gsungs pa'o //
NK106(me)012:2164: gnas phun sum tshogs pa lha'i gnas dang /
NK106(me)012:2167: grong khyer pad+mo can la sogs pa'o //
NK106(me)012:2168: ston pa phun sum tshogs pa sh+aakya thub pa'o //
NK106(me)012:2169: chos phun sum tshogs pa nges pa don gyi rnam
NK106(me)012:2170: grangs de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bstan pa la
NK106(me)012:2171: sogs pa'o // 'khor phun sum tshogs pa thun mong
NK106(me)012:2172: dang thun mong ma yin pa'i tshogs rab tu mang
NK106(me)012:2173: sogs pa'o // po rnams so // dus phun sum
NK106(me)012:2174: tshogs pa lo sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bar du
NK106(me)012:2175: sogs pa'o // po rnams so // gsungs so // rtsis mgo yan lag lnga ni /
NK106(me)012:2176: mdzad pa po gang gis mdzad pa /
NK106(me)012:2179: don ched su'i ched du mdzad pa /
NK106(me)012:2180: dbu nas zhabs su bsdus pa'i don dus bstan pa dang lnga'o //
NK106(me)012:2182: mdzad pa po bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung rab la
NK106(me)012:2183: mang du thos pa'i nor gyis phyug pa kun mkhyen
NK106(me)012:2185: lung rgyu mtshan nyid kyii theg pa dang /
NK106(me)012:2186: 'bras bu gsang sngags kyi theg pa kun las btus so //
NK106(me)012:2187: phyogs rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen por gtogs te blo
NK106(me)012:2188: rim brgyad a tir 'jug pa'i thabs kyi yan lag
NK106(me)012:2190: don ched da lta dang phyi rabs kyi gang zag
NK106(me)012:2191: rim gyis pa dang cig car ba thams cad skyel
NK106(me)012:2193: dbu nas zhabs su bsdus pa'i don la gzhi lam
NK106(me)012:2194: 'bras bu gsum dang lta sgom spyod pa gsum ste
NK106(me)012:2195: drug kyang lam du 'jug pa'i thabs dang /
NK106(me)012:2197: mthar phyin pa 'bras bu'i rim pa gsum du bsdus nas ston pa'o //
NK106(me)012:2198: bi kra ma la sh+ai la'i gtsug lag khang na bzhugs pa'i pan+di ta chos gsung ba'i tshul la /
NK106(me)012:2199: nyan pa po snod du rung bar byed pa dang /
NK106(me)012:2200: bstan pa'i rnam gzhag nges pa gnyis kyis 'chad do //
NK106(me)012:2202: thog mar nyan pa po'i snod khyad par can du bsgrubs nas /
NK106(me)012:2203: de nas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i byung tshul bka'
NK106(me)012:2204: bstan bcos kyi rim pa rnams bstan pas shin tu
NK106(me)012:2206: nyan pa po snod du rung ba'i chos la /
NK106(me)012:2207: mdzad pa po slob dpon gyi che ba /
NK106(me)012:2208: des mdzad pa chos kyi che ba /
NK106(me)012:2209: che ba de lta bu dang ldan pa'i chos de bshad cing mnyan pa'i tshul dang gsum mo //
NK106(me)012:2211: slob dpon dang chos kyi che ba brjod pas /
NK106(me)012:2212: nyan pa po dang rjes 'jug rnams bla ma dang chos la dad mos skye /
NK106(me)012:2213: des byin rlabs zhugs nas thar pa'i lam dang chos la 'jug pa'i rgyu byed de /
NK106(me)012:2215: de la dad pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste
NK106(me)012:2216: sems las su rung bar byed pa'o zhes pa dang
NK106(me)012:2217: / slob dpon klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas kyang /
NK106(me)012:2218: 'di ltar chos rnams thams cad kyi //
NK106(me)012:2219: rtsa ba mos pa legs par gsungs //
NK106(me)012:2222: slob dpon ni bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa la gus pas legs par 'dzin pa /
NK106(me)012:2223: theg pa chung ngu dang chen po'i tshul khong du chud pa /
NK106(me)012:2224: rgyu mtshan nyid kyi theg pa sde snod gsum dang /
NK106(me)012:2225: 'bras bu gsang sngags kyi theg pa rgyud sde bzhi'am drug gi rang bzhin legs par rtogs pa /
NK106(me)012:2228: sgom pa'i rim pa la legs par bslabs pa /
NK106(me)012:2231: rtsom pa'i gnas la dbang 'byor pa /
NK106(me)012:2234: ting nge 'dzin gyi yon tan dam pas rab tu brgyan pa /
NK106(me)012:2235: theg pa rgyal po'i khang bzangs dam pa na /
NK106(me)012:2236: rab tu zhi ba'i yang dag 'jog la gnas pa /
NK106(me)012:2237: snying rjes rang dang gzhan gyi don la brtson pa'i go cha bgos pa ste /
NK106(me)012:2238: mang du thos pa'i chos smra ba tshul khrims blo gros zhes bya ba'o //
NK106(me)012:2239: chos ni theg pa mtha' dag gi snying po'i don phyogs gcig tu bsdebs pa /
NK106(me)012:2240: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i gzhung lam nor ba /
NK106(me)012:2241: dbang po'i rim pa thams cad gong du 'khrid pa /
NK106(me)012:2242: lam gyi cha lag gzhan la mi ltos pa /
NK106(me)012:2243: thos pas ma rig pa'i mun pa sangs pa /
NK106(me)012:2244: bsams pas gnas lugs kyi dgongs pa rtogs pa /
NK106(me)012:2245: bsgoms pas chos nyid kyi klong du grol ba /
NK106(me)012:2246: bshad pas rang gzhan gyi shes rab 'phel ba /
NK106(me)012:2247: nyan pas blo gros kyi pad+ma rgyas pa /
NK106(me)012:2248: bltas pas nyon mongs kyi sdig sgrib mdzad pa /
NK106(me)012:2249: dpyad pas thar lam gyi byang chub brnyes pa ste /
NK106(me)012:2250: yon tan dpag tu med pa'i tshogs chen pos legs par brgyan pa'i gang chen mtsho /
NK106(me)012:2251: theg pa chen po'i man ngag gi bstan bcos ngal gso skor gsum zhes bya ba yin no //
NK106(me)012:2252: ji ltar bshad cing mnyan pa'i tshul ni /
NK106(me)012:2253: chos smra ba la sman pa mkhas pa'i 'du shes /
NK106(me)012:2255: bdag nyid la nad pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas gus pas nyan te /
NK106(me)012:2258: khyod kyis bdag nyid la nad pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o //
NK106(me)012:2259: chos la sman gyi 'du shes bskyed par bya'o //
NK106(me)012:2260: dge ba'i bshes gnyen la sman pa'i rgyal po'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o //
NK106(me)012:2261: nan tan nyams su len pa la nad nyer bar 'tsho ba'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o zhes so //
NK106(me)012:2263: bstan pa'i rnam gzhag nges pa la /
NK106(me)012:2264: dang po ston pas 'khor lo gsum ji ltar gsungs pa'i tshul /
NK106(me)012:2265: bar du dgra bcom pa rnams kyis ji ltar bsdus pa'i tshul /
NK106(me)012:2266: tha mar bstan bcos mkhan po rnams kyis bstan bcos
NK106(me)012:2267: ji ltar mdzad pa'i tshul dang gsum gyis 'chad de
NK106(me)012:2268: gong du bshad pa bzhin no //
NK106(me)012:2269: 'di dag ni bshad tshul nges pa'i tshig go //
NK106(me)012:2270: gnyis pa ji ltar bshad cing nyan pa'i tshul la gsum ste /
NK106(me)012:2271: 'chad pa po slob dpon gyi rang bzhin /
NK106(me)012:2272: nyan pa po slob ma'i rang bzhin /
NK106(me)012:2273: thun mong du bya ba'i rang bzhin no //
NK106(me)012:2274: dang po ni mdo sde'i rgyan las /
NK106(me)012:2275: bshes gnyen dul ba zhi ba nyer zhi ba //
NK106(me)012:2276: yon tan brtson byas lhag par lung gis phyug /
NK106(me)012:2277: rtogs daka'i de nyid rab tu smra mkhas ldan //
NK106(me)012:2278: brtse ba'i bdag nyid skyo ngal spangs la bsten //
NK106(me)012:2280: sku gsung thugs zhi zhing legs par bsdams pa /
NK106(me)012:2281: yon tan dang brtson 'grus che ba /
NK106(me)012:2282: thos pa che ba las khyad par du lung gi gnas la mkhas pa /
NK106(me)012:2283: zab mo'i don ston pa la mkhas shing snying rje che ba /
NK106(me)012:2284: chos ston pa la dka' ba bzod pa ste de lta bu'o //
NK106(me)012:2285: gnyis pa ni chos dang bla ma la gus shing
NK106(me)012:2286: don gnyer gyi 'dun pa khyad par can yod pas
NK106(me)012:2287: chos la bsgrub par nus pa ste /
NK106(me)012:2288: slob dpon sh+aakya 'od kyi zhal snga nas /
NK106(me)012:2289: bla ma la gus tshul khrims yongs dag dang //
NK106(me)012:2290: bsam gtan dang ni don la rtag brtson dang //
NK106(me)012:2291: grims shing dul la bzod dang ldan pa ste //
NK106(me)012:2292: sdom brtson gnas pa'i chos ldan legs par gsungs //
NK106(me)012:2294: des kyang snod kyi skyon gsum dri ma drug dang bral bar byas te nyan par bya'o //
NK106(me)012:2295: skyon gsum ni snod kha sbub ltar tshig don la
NK106(me)012:2296: rna ba mi gtad pas cung zad kyang mi 'dzin
NK106(me)012:2297: pa dang / zhabs rdol ltar bzung yang nan tan
NK106(me)012:2298: mthar chags su mi byed pas rtogs pa mi brtan
NK106(me)012:2299: pa dang / pa dang / dug can lta bu
NK106(me)012:2300: zin yang nges 'byung gi blo dang sems bskyed kyis
NK106(me)012:2301: ma zin pas nyon mongs pa'i gnyen por mi 'gro
NK106(me)012:2302: bar grogs su 'gro ba rnams spangs te nyan pa
NK106(me)012:2303: pa dang / pa dang / ni / mdo las /
NK106(me)012:2305: legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang /
NK106(me)012:2306: ngas khyod la bstan par bya'o zhes gsungs pa bzhin no //
NK106(me)012:2307: legs par nyan pas ni dug can gyi skyon sel ba'o //
NK106(me)012:2308: rab tu nyan pas ni kha sbub kyi skyon sel lo //
NK106(me)012:2309: yid la bzung bas ni zhabs rdol gyi skyon sel lo //
NK106(me)012:2312: nga rgyal dang ni ma dad dang //
NK106(me)012:2313: don du gnyer ba med nyid dang //
NK106(me)012:2314: phyi rol rnam g.yeng nang du sdud du //
NK106(me)012:2315: skyo bas nyan pa dri ma yin //
NK106(me)012:2317: chos nyan dus che khyad kyi nga rgyal dang sgeg
NK106(me)012:2318: 'chos stan ches mtho bar sdod pa la sogs dang
NK106(me)012:2321: bla ma la ma dad bzhin du nyan pa dang /
NK106(me)012:2322: chos la don gnyer 'dod 'dun med pa dang /
NK106(me)012:2325: yid la sogs pa'i dbang po phyi'i yul la 'phyor 'jug pa dang /
NK106(me)012:2326: gnyid rmugs la sogs pas sems nang du bsdus pa dang /
NK106(me)012:2327: chos 'dis ci bya snyam pa la sogs pa chos
NK106(me)012:2328: la bar du gcod pa'i skyo ba rnams spangs la
NK106(me)012:2329: nyan no // de yang dga' ba dang /
NK106(me)012:2332: gnyid rmugs la sogs pa'i sgrib pa dang /
NK106(me)012:2333: nga rgyal la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams spangs la /
NK106(me)012:2334: tshe 'di'i blo ngan dri ma can las 'das pa thar pa kho na la dmigs pas /
NK106(me)012:2335: sems can gyi don du ngas chos 'di nyan la
NK106(me)012:2336: rgyud la phan pa zhig bya snyam du mos pa
NK106(me)012:2337: dang 'dun pa khyad par can dung dung ba bskyed
NK106(me)012:2338: nas nyan pas thos pa dri ma med pa'i gzi
NK106(me)012:2340: 'di gal po che yin te chos lam du 'gro
NK106(me)012:2341: ba yang dang po'i sgo thos pa byed dus nas
NK106(me)012:2342: ma 'chugs pa zhig dgos pa'i phyir ro //
NK106(me)012:2343: 'phags pa yon tan rin po che yang dag par sdud pa'i mdo las /
NK106(me)012:2344: dga' dang gus dang dad pa'i mchog ni nyer gzhag ste //
NK106(me)012:2345: sgrib pa nyon mongs bsal nas dri ma las 'das pa //
NK106(me)012:2346: 'gro don mngon zhugs nges pa'i shes rab pha rol phyin //
NK106(me)012:2347: gang la dpa' rnams spyod pa 'di ni mnyan par gyis //
NK106(me)012:2349: gsum pa thun mong du bya ba'i rang bzhin la gsum las /
NK106(me)012:2350: sbyor ba sems can thams cad kyi don du byang chub thob par bya /
NK106(me)012:2351: de'i ched du chos nyan snyam du sems bskyed nas /
NK106(me)012:2352: pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos ston pa po de thub pa /
NK106(me)012:2353: 'khor rnams la 'khor rnam bzhi so sor shes pas nyan no //
NK106(me)012:2354: sngags la dkyil 'khor gcig tu shes pas gtso 'khor bsal btab nas nyan no //
NK106(me)012:2355: yang na slob dpon 'jam dpal du bsams pa'i zhal nas chos kyi 'od zer 'phros pas /
NK106(me)012:2356: slob lam sgrol mar bsams pa'i rna ba na tshur thim par bsam pa'o //
NK106(me)012:2357: 'dir ni rang nyid gang mos su bya'o //
NK106(me)012:2358: dngos gzhi ni 'chad pa po dang nyan pa po
NK106(me)012:2359: gnyis ka chos kyi tshig don la 'jal ba'i ngang
NK106(me)012:2360: las ma yengs par sems rtse gcig tu 'dzin pa'o
NK106(me)012:2361: // rjes la dge ba sems can gyi don du
NK106(me)012:2362: bsngosa nas mi rtag pa dang rmi lam sgyu ma
NK106(me)012:2363: tsam du shes pas chos dang ston pa'i bka' drin
NK106(me)012:2365: de ltar bshad cing nyan pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug tshang ba ni /
NK106(me)012:2366: chos kyi stan dang mchod pa bshams pa ni sbyin pa /
NK106(me)012:2367: sgo gsum bsdams nas nyan pa ni tshul khrims /
NK106(me)012:2368: de dus shig la sogs pa'i 'tshe ba bzod pa ni bzod pa /
NK106(me)012:2369: bla ma la chos gsung bar bskul ba brtson 'grus /
NK106(me)012:2370: ma yengs par nyan pa bsam gtan /
NK106(me)012:2371: the tshom gyi gnas rnams brgal brtag gis 'dri ba shes rab ste /
NK106(me)012:2372: chos spyod thams cad kyi man ngag mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyud las /
NK106(me)012:2373: me tog stan sogs rab 'bul ba //
NK106(me)012:2374: sa phyogs spyod lam bsdams pa dang //
NK106(me)012:2375: srog chags kun la 'tshe mi byed //
NK106(me)012:2376: bla ma la ni gsol ba 'debs //
NK106(me)012:2377: ma yengs bla ma'i gdams ngag 'dzin //
NK106(me)012:2378: rtog sel phyir la skyon tshig 'dri //
NK106(me)012:2379: sgrol ma yan lag drug dang ldan //
NK106(me)012:2381: zhar la slob dpon gyi drug kyang /
NK106(me)012:2382: legs par smra ba sbyin pa ste //
NK106(me)012:2383: nyon mongs bsdams pa tshul khrims nyid //
NK106(me)012:2384: skyo bar bzod pa bzod pa ste //
NK106(me)012:2386: de las ma yengs bsam gtan la //
NK106(me)012:2387: tshig don 'byed mkhas shes rab nyid //
NK106(me)012:2388: 'jam dpal yan lag drug dang ldan //
NK106(me)012:2389: zhes bya ba ni bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'o //
NK106(me)012:2390: gsum pa bshad cing nyan pa'i phan yon bstan pa ni /
NK106(me)012:2391: de ltar yang dag pa'i chos la gang gis bshad na /
NK106(me)012:2392: sbyin pa rnams kyi nang nas chos kyi sbyin pa mchog tu 'phags pa'i phan yon 'thob ste /
NK106(me)012:2393: tshe rabs thams cad du chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pa dang /
NK106(me)012:2394: de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas pas dgongs par 'gyur ba dang /
NK106(me)012:2395: rtag tu tshe rabs dran pa dang /
NK106(me)012:2396: sangs rgyas las chos thos par 'gyur ba dang /
NK106(me)012:2397: myur du sangs rgyas 'thob pa la sogs pa'o //
NK106(me)012:2398: nyan pas ni sems kyi sgrib pa sbyong ba dang /
NK106(me)012:2399: the tshom gyi 'ching ba gcod pa dang /
NK106(me)012:2400: rtag tu dam pa'i chos dang mi 'bral ba dang /
NK106(me)012:2402: ngan 'gro log par ltung bar mi 'gyur ba dang /
NK106(me)012:2403: lhas bsrung zhing nad dang 'tshe ba nyung ba dang /
NK106(me)012:2404: myur du sangs rgyas 'thob pa la sogs te shes
NK106(me)012:2405: rab kyi mig rnyed pas 'khor ba las 'da' bar
NK106(me)012:2407: gang phyir 'di ni shes rab mchog yin de yi rgyu ni thos pa yin //
NK106(me)012:2410: shes rab kyis ni chos kyi rang bzhin yongs shes nas //
NK106(me)012:2411: khams gsum ma lus pa las myur du 'da' bar 'gyur //
NK106(me)012:2413: de dag gis chos byung ba'i tshul spyir bshad pa gtan la phab zin to //
NK106(me)012:2414: spyi don gnyis pa skabs kyi don bye brag tu bshad pa la gnyis te /
NK106(me)012:2415: spyi chings lngas 'brel dgod pa dang /
NK106(me)012:2416: dgos 'brel yan lag bzhis gtan la dbab par bya ba'o //
NK106(me)012:2417: dang po ni rnam bshad rig pa las /
NK106(me)012:2418: mdo don smra bar 'dod rnams la //
NK106(me)012:2419: man ngag cung zhig spyin par bya //
NK106(me)012:2420: de la man ngag 'di yin te //
NK106(me)012:2421: dgos pa bsdus pa'i don bcas dang //
NK106(me)012:2422: brgal lan bcas dang mtshams sbyor bcas //
NK106(me)012:2423: tshig don bcas te bsnyad par bya //
NK106(me)012:2424: zhes gsungs pa dang sbyar te /
NK106(me)012:2425: bstan bcos 'dir don lngas nye bar mtshon pa la /
NK106(me)012:2426: dang po dgos pa'i don ni /
NK106(me)012:2427: ngal gso skor gsum 'grel pa dang bcas pa nye bar bkod pas /
NK106(me)012:2428: skal ba dang ldan pa'i gang zag gis thos pa dang /
NK106(me)012:2430: sgom pa'i rim pa bde blag tu rtogs te zhugs pas /
NK106(me)012:2431: gnas skabs dang mthar thug gi don gnyis 'grub pa'i thabs dam par gyur pa ni 'di'i dgos pa'o //
NK106(me)012:2432: de la brten nas thar pa'i lugs gsal ba dang /
NK106(me)012:2433: bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa yun ring du gnas pa dang /
NK106(me)012:2434: rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam
NK106(me)012:2435: grangs 'jig rten na dar zhing rgyas pa ste mchog
NK106(me)012:2436: gi dgos pa khyad par can yang yod do //
NK106(me)012:2440: grogs spyod pa gsum tshang la ma nor bar ston pa yin no zhes bya bar bsdus so //
NK106(me)012:2442: gzhung rgya cher bshad pa'i skabs bzhin no //
NK106(me)012:2443: snga phyi 'brel pa'i mtshams sbyor ni /
NK106(me)012:2444: dang por gang zag gcig lam du 'jug pa na
NK106(me)012:2445: chos kyi gzhi 'cha' ba gal che bas de'i phyir
NK106(me)012:2446: sems nyid ngal gso le'u bcu gsum gyi rang bzhin
NK106(me)012:2447: du / dal 'byor rnyed dka' ba nas bzung ste
NK106(me)012:2448: lta ba mtha' gnyis la mi gnas pa'i gzhi rnams
NK106(me)012:2450: cha shas lam dang 'bras bu'i rim pa'ang 'phros pa'i tshul du yang bshad pa yin no //
NK106(me)012:2451: de ltar gzhi rtogs nas lam bsgom pa la 'jug pas /
NK106(me)012:2452: bsam gtan ngal gso le'u bzhi pa'i rang bzhiin du /
NK106(me)012:2453: gang du bsgrub pa'i gnas dang /
NK106(me)012:2454: gang gis bsgrubs pa'i gang zag dang /
NK106(me)012:2455: gang ltar bsgrub pa'i thabs dang /
NK106(me)012:2456: gang bsgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams go rims kyis legs par bstan pa yin no //
NK106(me)012:2457: de ltar lam bsgrub pa na chos thams cad la
NK106(me)012:2458: ma chags pa dang zhen pa med pa 'ba' zhig
NK106(me)012:2460: de'i grogs su spyod pa'i rim pa rgya cher gsal
NK106(me)012:2461: ba'i gnas sgyu ma ngal gso le'u brgyad kyi rang
NK106(me)012:2462: bzhin sgyu ma'i dpe brgyad du chos thams cad ji
NK106(me)012:2463: ltar spyad cing nyams su blang ba'i rim pa tshang
NK106(me)012:2464: la ma nor bar bstan pa yin no //
NK106(me)012:2465: brgal lan gyis gtan la dbab pa la gsum las /
NK106(me)012:2466: dang po sems nyid ngal gso la brgal ba /
NK106(me)012:2467: ci khyed kyi bstan bcos 'di nyid sems nyid ngal gso zhes brjod pa mi 'thad de /
NK106(me)012:2468: sems nyid la ngal gso ba dang thang chad pa gnyis char med pa'i phyir ro zhes so //
NK106(me)012:2470: spyir sems nyid ces pa'i sgra 'di nges gzung dang
NK106(me)012:2471: gzhi bsdu ba gang du yang sbyar du rung bas
NK106(me)012:2472: / nges gzung ltar na sems nyid ngal gso dgos te /
NK106(me)012:2473: sems dang sems las byung ba thams cad 'khor ba'i
NK106(me)012:2474: rgyu khams gsum pa'i sgro btags kyi rnam par rtog
NK106(me)012:2475: pa yin pas / de nyid rnam par mi rtog
NK106(me)012:2476: pa'i dbyings su nye bar zhi dgos pa'i phyir ro
NK106(me)012:2477: pa yin pas / // bden gnyis las /
NK106(me)012:2478: sems dang sems byung khams gsum pa //
NK106(me)012:2479: sgro btags rnam pa can rtog yin //
NK106(me)012:2482: rnam rtog nye bar zhi ba dang //
NK106(me)012:2483: byang chub sems ni bsgom par bya //
NK106(me)012:2486: sems 'gags pa de sku yis mngon sum mdzad //
NK106(me)012:2488: phyogs kyi glang pos 'jam dpal la bstod pa las /
NK106(me)012:2489: rnam rtog ma rig chen po ste //
NK106(me)012:2490: 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor ltung byed yin //
NK106(me)012:2491: rnam rtog de dang bral bas na //
NK106(me)012:2492: khyod ni rtag tu mya ngan 'das //
NK106(me)012:2494: sangs rgyas ngo sprod pa rin po che gsang ba'i rgyud las kyang /
NK106(me)012:2496: sems dang sems las byung ba thams cad ni 'khor
NK106(me)012:2497: ba'i chos yin no zhes ngas bstan te zhes gsungs
NK106(me)012:2498: so // des na sems dang sems byung gi rtog
NK106(me)012:2499: pa de nyid kyi rang bzhin 'khor bar yang dang
NK106(me)012:2500: yang du dub cing ngal bar byas pas /
NK106(me)012:2501: da ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes chos
NK106(me)012:2502: kyi dbyings shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
NK106(me)012:2503: spros pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i ngal stegs
NK106(me)012:2505: de'i ched du gnas lugs kyi bgrod lam de kho
NK106(me)012:2506: na nyid du 'jug cing ngal gso ba'i bstan bcos
NK106(me)012:2507: 'di brtsam par bya zhes kho bo cag gis dam
NK106(me)012:2508: bcas nas bstan pa yin te /
NK106(me)012:2509: nyi khri snang ba'i mjug dang /
NK106(me)012:2510: mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel chung du /
NK106(me)012:2511: kye ma gzhung lugs sna tshogs kyis //
NK106(me)012:2512: dub pa dag gi ngal gso'i gnas //
NK106(me)012:2513: shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i lugs //
NK106(me)012:2514: ring mo zhi gnas mthong ba yin //
NK106(me)012:2515: zhes gsungs pa dang mthun no //
NK106(me)012:2516: gzhi bsdu ba dang sbyar na yang sems nyid ngal gso bar 'thad de /
NK106(me)012:2517: sems 'khrul snang la ring du spyad cing 'khor bas
NK106(me)012:2518: dub pa'i 'gron po kun du rtog pa'i tshogs dag
NK106(me)012:2519: / sems nyid ngal gso ba'i bsti gnas spros pa
NK106(me)012:2520: zhi ba'i ngang du ma bcos par 'jog pa yin
NK106(me)012:2521: / te / 'gron po chad cing dub pa dag
NK106(me)012:2522: ngal stegs la rang babs su glod nas lus ngag
NK106(me)012:2523: yid gsum dal bar 'jog ste ngal gso ba bzhin
NK106(me)012:2524: / te / no // de'i phyir ngal gso ba sems nyid du /
NK106(me)012:2525: sgo gsum 'khor bas dub pa'i sems kyi spros pa
NK106(me)012:2526: rang zhir ngal gso ba'i 'di thar pa dam pa'i
NK106(me)012:2528: dub pa sems nyid kyi 'gron po dag /
NK106(me)012:2529: spros dang bral bar ngal sos shig /
NK106(me)012:2530: so ma gnyug ma rang babs dang //
NK106(me)012:2531: blo 'das phyag rgya chen po yin //
NK106(me)012:2533: skye med rin po che'i mdzod las /
NK106(me)012:2534: gar yang ma rtog cir yang ma bsams shig /
NK106(me)012:2535: bcas bcos ma byed rang bzhin lhug par zhog /
NK106(me)012:2536: ma bcos pa de skye med rin chen mdzod //
NK106(me)012:2537: dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi gshegs shul yin //
NK106(me)012:2539: bsam gtan ngal gso la brgal ba ni /
NK106(me)012:2540: ci khyed kyi bstan bcos 'di bsam gtan ngal gso zhes brjod pa mi 'thad de /
NK106(me)012:2541: bsam gtan rang bzhin gyis mi rtog pa la ngal dub gang yang med pa'i phyir ro zhes so //
NK106(me)012:2543: nges gzung dang sbyar ba ni /
NK106(me)012:2544: bsam gtan ngal gso zhes brjod pa 'thad de /
NK106(me)012:2545: 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan rtog med rang gsal gyi
NK106(me)012:2546: ting nge 'dzin khams gsum pa'i sems kyi spyod yul
NK106(me)012:2547: can 'di dag kyang 'khor zhing dub pa'i 'gron po
NK106(me)012:2548: lam 'khyams nas dub pa lta bu yin pas /
NK106(me)012:2549: de thar pa dam pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
NK106(me)012:2550: bsam gtan gyi ngal stegs shes rab dang ting nge
NK106(me)012:2551: 'dzin zung 'brel khyad par can gyi zhi lhag tu
NK106(me)012:2552: sgom pas 'da' dgos pa'i phyir ro //
NK106(me)012:2553: 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan de dag shes rab khyad
NK106(me)012:2554: par can gyis ma zin pas lam du mi 'gyur
NK106(me)012:2555: te / zhi lhag zung 'brel khyad par can gyi ting nge 'dzin ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK106(me)012:2556: 'dir 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgo'i bsam gtan khyad par can sgrib pa'i gnyen po byed pa /
NK106(me)012:2557: 'khor ba las nges par 'byin pa'i lam mchog tu ngal gso ba yin no //
NK106(me)012:2559: bsam gtan med pa la yang shes rab med //
NK106(me)012:2560: shes rab med pa la yang bsam gtan med //
NK106(me)012:2561: gang la gnyis po yod pa 'khor ba yi //
NK106(me)012:2562: rgya mtsho gnag rjes lta bur 'tshal bar bgyi //
NK106(me)012:2564: gzhi bsdu ba dang sbyar na /
NK106(me)012:2565: bsam gtan ngal so zhes 'thad de /
NK106(me)012:2566: yang dag pa'i bsam gtan spros pa'i mtha' las 'das
NK106(me)012:2567: pa de nyid 'khor bar dub pa'i sems kyi 'gron
NK106(me)012:2568: po rnams kyi ngal gso'i bsti gnas khyad par yin
NK106(me)012:2569: pa'i phyir ro // de yang yul dngos po gzugs
NK106(me)012:2570: sogs su snang ba la gzung ba'i rtog pa yang
NK106(me)012:2571: pa'i phyir ro // med de / yul can dngos
NK106(me)012:2572: med sems kyi rang bzhin la 'dzin pa'i rtog pa
NK106(me)012:2573: pa'i phyir ro // med de / yang med par
NK106(me)012:2574: / blo dmigs pa med pa de ni ngal gso
NK106(me)012:2575: khyad par can gyi gnas yin te /
NK106(me)012:2577: gang tshe dngos dang dngos med dag /
NK106(me)012:2578: blo yi mdun na mi gnas pa //
NK106(me)012:2579: de tshe rnam par gzhan med pas //
NK106(me)012:2580: dmigs pa med par rab tu zhi //
NK106(me)012:2582: sgyu ma ngal gso la brgal ba ni /
NK106(me)012:2583: ci khyed kyi bstan bcos 'di sgyu ma ngal gso zhes mi 'thad de /
NK106(me)012:2584: sgyu ma ni rang bzhin gyis med pa'i phyir de
NK106(me)012:2585: la ngal ba dang gso ba med pa'i phyir ro
NK106(me)012:2586: zhes so // lan la gnyis las /
NK106(me)012:2587: nges gzung dang sbyar ba ni /
NK106(me)012:2588: sgyu ma ngal gso zhes 'thad de /
NK106(me)012:2589: 'khor ba kun du rtog pa'i sgyu ma 'di dag
NK106(me)012:2590: la ngo bo med kyang rnam pa snang char ma
NK106(me)012:2591: 'gags pas / snang cha sgyu ma'i 'gron po dag
NK106(me)012:2592: lam du ngal gso ba ltar med bzhin snang ba'i
NK106(me)012:2594: chos nyid yang dag pa'i ngang du ngal gso bar snang dgos te /
NK106(me)012:2595: snang tsam du 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las grol zhing 'da' dgos pa'i phyir ro //
NK106(me)012:2596: de'ang 'khor ba sgyu ma'i ngo bo nyid du shes
NK106(me)012:2597: nas yang dag sgyu ma'i dbyings su snang la rang
NK106(me)012:2598: bzhin med par spyad pas grol ba yin te /
NK106(me)012:2600: srid gsum 'di dag sgyu ma dang //
NK106(me)012:2601: smig rgyu chu yi phung po bzhin //
NK106(me)012:2602: nor bar mthong bas phyir bzlog go //
NK106(me)012:2605: sgyu ma ngal gso zhes 'thad de /
NK106(me)012:2606: yang dag sgyu ma'i ngo bo nyid de /
NK106(me)012:2607: log rtog sgyu ma'i ngal stegs kyi gzhi khyad par can yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK106(me)012:2608: de'ang sems nyid rang bzhin gyis dag cing 'od gsal ba de nyid yang dag sgyu ma yin la /
NK106(me)012:2609: de'i rang bzhin bdag gzhan spros pa dang bral ba'i ngang du /
NK106(me)012:2610: log rtog sgyu ma 'khrul snang 'khrul rtog dang bcas
NK106(me)012:2611: pa rten med gzhi med chen por ngal gso ba
NK106(me)012:2613: yang dag sgyu ma'i tshul gnyis su //
NK106(me)012:2614: bdag dang bdag gi gzhan med de //
NK106(me)012:2615: bdag dang gzhan dang rtog pa'i rgyun //
NK106(me)012:2616: log par rtog pa tsam nyid las //
NK106(me)012:2617: phra zhing zab pa'ang yod ma yin //
NK106(me)012:2619: de'i phyir chos thams cad sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du snang bas /
NK106(me)012:2620: ngal gso ba dang dub par snang ba ma 'gags la /
NK106(me)012:2621: snang ba'i dus nas yong ma myong bar kho bo 'dod do //
NK106(me)012:2622: 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin rgyal po las /
NK106(me)012:2623: ji ltar skye bo mang po'i dbus dag tu //
NK106(me)012:2624: sgyu ma byed pa dag gis gzugs sprul te //
NK106(me)012:2625: rta dang glang po shing rta sna tshogs byas //
NK106(me)012:2626: de nyid mi bden snang ba sna tshogs ltar //
NK106(me)012:2627: chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis //
NK106(me)012:2629: ji ltar sgyu mar gyur pa'i gzugs //
NK106(me)012:2630: skyes pa ma yin 'ongs pa min //
NK106(me)012:2631: de bzhin chos rnams thams cad kun //
NK106(me)012:2632: skyes pa ma yin 'ongs pa min //
NK106(me)012:2634: gnyis pa dgos 'brel yan lag bzhis gtan la dbab pa la gsum ste /
NK106(me)012:2635: spyir ngag tsam la yod pa'i dgos 'brel yan lag bzhi dper dgod /
NK106(me)012:2636: dgos 'brel ngag la yod pa'i dgos 'brel yan lag bzhis bstan bcos la 'jug pa'i rgyu brjod /
NK106(me)012:2637: bstan bcos lus la yod pa'i dgos 'brel yan lag
NK106(me)012:2638: bzhis gzhi lam 'bras bu'i don gtan la dbab pa'o
NK106(me)012:2639: // dang po ni spyir skyes bu rtogs ldan gyi
NK106(me)012:2640: ngag tsam la dgos 'brel bzhi tshang du rung ste
NK106(me)012:2641: // / dper na bum pa khur la chu long zhes pa'i ngag de'i brjod bya ni chu'o //
NK106(me)012:2642: dgos pa ni ngag de la brten nas chu khyim du thob pa'o //
NK106(me)012:2643: nying dgos ni chu des skom pa bsal ba la sogs pa skyes bu'i don grub pa'o //
NK106(me)012:2644: de gsum yang gcig med na gcig mi 'byung yod
NK106(me)012:2645: na 'byung bas phan tshun 'brel ba ni 'brel pa'o
NK106(me)012:2646: // gnyis pa bstan bcos lus la yod pa'i dgos 'brel rnams 'di'i brjod bya'o //
NK106(me)012:2647: de la brten nas bstan bcos la chos bzhi tshang
NK106(me)012:2648: bar rtogs pa ni dgos 'brel gyi ngag bkod pa'i
NK106(me)012:2649: dgos pa'o // de la brten nas rtogs ldan gyi
NK106(me)012:2650: gang zag bstan bcos 'dir 'jug pa de nyid dgos
NK106(me)012:2651: dgos pa'o // so // de gsum gcig la gcig
NK106(me)012:2652: 'brel du med na mi 'byung yod na 'byung bar
NK106(me)012:2654: gsum pa ni gzhi lam 'bras bu'i gnas gsal bar
NK106(me)012:2655: byed pa ngal gso skor gsum gyi tshig dang don
NK106(me)012:2656: gyi rim pas gang zag gcig gi thar lam tshang
NK106(me)012:2657: la ma nor bar ston pa'i tshul ni brjod bya'o
NK106(me)012:2658: // de ltar yod pa de skyes bus rtogs pa ni dgos pa'o //
NK106(me)012:2659: rtogs pa bzhin nyams su blangs pas gnas skabs dang
NK106(me)012:2660: mthar thug gi don gnyis 'grub pa ni nying dgos
NK106(me)012:2661: so // de gsum gcig la gcig 'brel du yod
NK106(me)012:2662: na 'byung med na mi 'byung ba ni 'brel pa'o
NK106(me)012:2663: so // // de dag kyang 'dul ba'i rgya cher 'grel par /
NK106(me)012:2664: de bas na 'dul ba'i mdo la brjod par bya
NK106(me)012:2665: ba med par dogs pa bsal ba'i phyir brjod par
NK106(me)012:2667: 'bras bu med par dogs pa bzlog pa'i phyir dgos pa brjod do //
NK106(me)012:2668: thabs med par dogs pa spang ba'i phyir 'brel pa bshad do //
NK106(me)012:2669: 'dod pa'i don grub par bya ba'i phyir dgos pa'i
NK106(me)012:2670: dgos pa yang bstan to zhes rgya cher gsungs pa
NK106(me)012:2671: bzhin no // spyi don gnyis pa bshad bya gzhung
NK106(me)012:2672: gi don dngos rgya cher bstan pa la gsum ste
NK106(me)012:2673: bzhin no // / chos thams cad gzhung lam gcig
NK106(me)012:2674: tu ston pa rdzogs pa chen po sems nyid ngal
NK106(me)012:2675: gso 'grel pa dang bcas pa rgya cher bshad pa
NK106(me)012:2676: bzhin no // / / chos thams cad 'od gsal
NK106(me)012:2677: lhun grub chen por ston pa rdzogs pa chen po
NK106(me)012:2678: bsam gtan ngal gso 'grel pa dang bcas pa rgya
NK106(me)012:2679: bzhin no // / / cher bshad pa / chos
NK106(me)012:2680: thams cad bden med rang snang du ston pa rdzogs
NK106(me)012:2681: pa chen po sgyu ma ngal gso 'grel pa dang
NK106(me)012:2682: bcas pa rgya cher bshad pa'o //
NK106(me)012:2684: 'grel pa bshad pa la 'jug pa'i rgyu brjod pa /
NK106(me)012:2685: 'jug yul lus kyi don rgya cher bshad pa /
NK106(me)012:2686: yongs su rdzogs pa mjug gi don no //
NK106(me)012:2687: dang po la mtshan gyi don /
NK106(me)012:2688: phyag gis mchod par brjod pa /
NK106(me)012:2690: dang po la mtshan bsgyur ba /
NK106(me)012:2692: gang la mtshan du gsol ba dang gsum las /
NK106(me)012:2693: bsgyur ba ni legs par sbyar ba'i skad dang ldan pa /
NK106(me)012:2694: rgya gar skad du ma h+aa san+d+hi la sogs pa 'di dag /
NK106(me)012:2699: ta la ring cha byin pa'i khong nas shud+d+ha zhes
NK106(me)012:2700: 'byung ba de kho na nyid du dag par sbyor
NK106(me)012:2701: ba ste / sgra bsgrubs pas sems nyid ces pa'o //
NK106(me)012:2708: rdzogs pa 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad do //
NK106(me)012:2709: gang du rdzogs na chen po rang byung gi ye
NK106(me)012:2710: shes su ye nas tshang zhing de las chos thams
NK106(me)012:2713: gcig rdzogs gnyis rdzogs sems su rdzogs //
NK106(me)012:2714: bya ba phun sum tshogs pas bde //
NK106(me)012:2717: sems nyid gcig pu kun gyi sa bon te //
NK106(me)012:2718: gang la srid dang mya ngan 'das 'phro ba //
NK106(me)012:2719: 'dod pa'i 'bras bu ster bar byed pa yi //
NK106(me)012:2720: yid bzhin nor 'dra'i sems la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK106(me)012:2722: sems nyid ni nges par gzung ba dang sbyar na sems dang sems byung ngo //
NK106(me)012:2723: ngal gso ni rang byung gi ye shes su spros pa dang bral bar ston pa'o //
NK106(me)012:2724: gzhi bsdu ba dang sbyar na /
NK106(me)012:2725: sems nyid ni rang bzhin gyis 'dod gsal ba'o //
NK106(me)012:2726: ngal gso ni kun du rtog pa cha dang bcas pa 'jug pa zhi bar ston pa'o //
NK106(me)012:2734: shing rta ni gzugs can gyi rgyan du shan sbyar ba ste /
NK106(me)012:2735: shing rta gsum gyis me'i 'obs las byis pa 'dren
NK106(me)012:2736: pa'i dpe dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar por gsungs pa
NK106(me)012:2737: ltar / 'dir bla na med pa'i theg pa shing rtar skal ba chen po rnams 'dren pas /
NK106(me)012:2738: thar pa'i gling du phyin par byed pa dang /
NK106(me)012:2739: yang gcig tu na ngal gso skor gsum la tshig don gyi gnas gsum yod pa las /
NK106(me)012:2740: 'dir zab pa dang rgya che ba'i gnas thams cad
NK106(me)012:2741: rdzogs par ston pas kyang shing rta chen po'i zhes
NK106(me)012:2742: bya ba ni / tshig gi phrad 'og ma dang
NK106(me)012:2743: mtshams sbyor bas bkod mdzes par byas pa tsam mo
NK106(me)012:2744: bya ba ni / // gang la mtshan du btags pa ni /
NK106(me)012:2745: sems nyid ngal gso zhes pa don la mtshan du btags la /
NK106(me)012:2746: shing rta chen po zhes pa dpe la mtshan du btags pa'o //
NK106(me)012:2747: gnyis pa phyag gis mchod par brjod pa la gnyis las /
NK106(me)012:2749: dpal kun du bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo zhes pas /
NK106(me)012:2750: dpal ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
NK106(me)012:2751: kun tu bzang po ni zab cing rgya che ba'i
NK106(me)012:2752: yon tan dpag tu med pas kun nas brgyan pas
NK106(me)012:2754: phyag 'tshal ba ni sgo gsum gus pas 'bul ba ste /
NK106(me)012:2756: rtog pa'i dra ba rnam bsal cing //
NK106(me)012:2757: zab cing rgya che'i sku mnga' ba //
NK106(me)012:2758: kun du bzang po'i 'od zer dag /
NK106(me)012:2761: rgyas par bshad pa la gsum las /
NK106(me)012:2762: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal ba ni dpal ldan
NK106(me)012:2763: tshogs gnyis la sogs pa ste char sprin bzang po
NK106(me)012:2764: dang chos mtshungs par bstod pa gzugs can gyi rgyan
NK106(me)012:2765: no // pad+ma 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal ba ni /
NK106(me)012:2766: o rgyan mtsho gling la sogs pa ste yon tan rang bzhin brjod pa'i rgyan gyis bstod pa dang /
NK106(me)012:2767: shis pa brjod pa'i rgyan te /
NK106(me)012:2768: bsres pas rab spel gyi rgyan dang gsum du 'gyur ro //
NK106(me)012:2769: rang byung ye shes la phyag 'tshal ba ni /
NK106(me)012:2770: gdod nas 'od gsal la sogs pa ste sems nyid
NK106(me)012:2771: la yod pa'i gshis kyi rang bzhin brjod pa rigs
NK106(me)012:2773: zab cing rgya che ba'i gnas brjod pas rgya che
NK106(me)012:2774: ba dang phul byung gnyis bsres pas rab spel gyi
NK106(me)012:2776: brtsam par dam bca' ba ni /
NK106(me)012:2777: dus gsum rgyal bas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK106(me)012:2778: sangs rgyas kyis sngon byon pa'i lam der rang gzhan
NK106(me)012:2779: thams cad bgrod nas thar pa thob par bya ba'i
NK106(me)012:2780: phyir bstan bcos brtsam par bya'o zhes dam bcas nas
NK106(me)012:2781: brtson pas go bgo ba ste /
NK106(me)012:2783: gzhan don brtse ba can rnams srog phyir yang //
NK106(me)012:2784: rang gi nus pa lhod par mi byed de //
NK106(me)012:2785: skyes bu dam pa khur lci khur ba dang //
NK106(me)012:2786: nyam nga'i gnas su nam yang 'dor mi byed //
NK106(me)012:2789: yongs su rdzogs pa mjug gi don ni 'grel pa
NK106(me)012:2790: dang bsdus don gyi gnas ji lta ba bzhin no
NK106(me)012:2791: // spyi don gnyis pa chos thams cad 'od gsal
NK106(me)012:2792: lhun grub chen por ston pa rdzogs pa chen po
NK106(me)012:2793: bsam gtan ngal gso 'grel pa dang bcas pa rgya
NK106(me)012:2794: cher bshad pa la gsum ste /
NK106(me)012:2795: 'grel pa bshad pa la 'jug pa'i rgyu brjod pa /
NK106(me)012:2796: 'jug yul lus kyi don rgya cher bshad pa /
NK106(me)012:2797: yongs su rdzogs pa mjug gi don no //
NK106(me)012:2800: phyag gis mchod par brjod pa /
NK106(me)012:2805: gang la mtshan du gsal ba dang gsum las /
NK106(me)012:2806: bsgyur ba ni skad rigs chen po bzhi dang ldan pa'i yul rgya gar gyi skad du /
NK106(me)012:2807: ma h+aa san+d+hi la sogs pa 'di dag bod kyi skad du bsgyur na /
NK106(me)012:2811: shud+d+ha don 'gyur du ngal gso ste sgra 'gyur du
NK106(me)012:2812: dag pa zhes 'byung ba de nyid gnas lugs dang
NK106(me)012:2814: chos nyid gsum la 'jug pa las 'dir ngal gsor bsgyur te /
NK106(me)012:2815: gnas lugs dang chos nyid de nyid ngal gso khyad par can yin te /
NK106(me)012:2816: 'khor bar dub pa dag don de bsgoms pas ngal sos pa ste dbugs 'byin pa'i phyir ro //
NK106(me)012:2824: gang du rdzogs na rang byung gi ye shes chen
NK106(me)012:2825: po la tshur rdzogs pas 'khor 'das thog ma'i ka
NK106(me)012:2826: dag rang rig ngo las gzhan du ma grub /
NK106(me)012:2827: phar rdzogs pas chos thams cad rtsa ba rig pa las gyes pa'i phyir /
NK106(me)012:2828: phar rdzogs tshur rdzogs thig le nyag gcig gi klong du rdzogs pa'o //
NK106(me)012:2829: rdzogs pa rig pa yin pas chen por bzhag ste /
NK106(me)012:2830: chos gzhan gyi klong yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK106(me)012:2832: klong chen sems kyi yul de na //
NK106(me)012:2833: mi gnas pa ni gcig kyang med //
NK106(me)012:2835: bsam gtan ni gnas lugs kyi ngang gdangs rnam par
NK106(me)012:2836: mi rtog pa'i ye shes rtse gcig las gzhan du
NK106(me)012:2837: ma yengs par gnas pa ste /
NK106(me)012:2838: sangs rgyas sras gcig gi rgyud las /
NK106(me)012:2839: sems dal bsam gtan ngang gis rnyed //
NK106(me)012:2841: ngal gso ni chos nyid kyi ngang dang 'dres dus
NK106(me)012:2842: sems rnam rtog gi 'gron po 'phro 'du med par
NK106(me)012:2843: rang babs chos zad chen por dbugs phyin pa'i don
NK106(me)012:2844: te / 'gron po dub pa bsti gnas su cha
NK106(me)012:2845: babs glod nas bzhag pas ngal gso ba bzhin no
NK106(me)012:2846: te / // 'grel pa ni rtsa ba'i don gsal ba ston /
NK106(me)012:2848: go bar byed ces bya ba ste sngar bzhin no //
NK106(me)012:2849: shing rta ni 'gron po 'dod pa'i gnas su 'dren
NK106(me)012:2850: pa'i bzhon pa 'khor lo yang mig dang bcas pa
NK106(me)012:2851: lta bu ste / thar pa chen po'i grong khyer
NK106(me)012:2852: du skal pa mchog dang ldan pa'i skye bo 'dren
NK106(me)012:2853: pa'i bzhon pa yin pas so //
NK106(me)012:2855: de gang zhon nas sems can thams cad mya ngan zlo //
NK106(me)012:2857: rnam dag ni nyes pa'i skyon med pa dang /
NK106(me)012:2858: chos nyid byang chub sems su chos thams cad dag par ston pa dang /
NK106(me)012:2859: dag mnyam rdzogs pa chen po'i lam dam pa yin pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ste /
NK106(me)012:2861: 'di ni rnam dag legs pa'i lam //
NK106(me)012:2863: zhes bya ba ni tshig gi phrad de /
NK106(me)012:2864: don snga phyi 'brel bar ston pa'i ngag go //
NK106(me)012:2865: gang la mtshan du btags pa la /
NK106(me)012:2866: bsam gtan ngal gso ni don gyi cha nas btags /
NK106(me)012:2867: shing rta rnam dag ni dpe don tshogs pa la btags pa'o //
NK106(me)012:2869: mdor bstan ni sngar bstan pa bzhin no //
NK106(me)012:2871: dpal ni rang byung gi ye shes /
NK106(me)012:2872: kun du ni dus gsum thams cad du 'pho 'gyur
NK106(me)012:2873: med par sku dang ye shes 'du 'bral med pa'i
NK106(me)012:2874: dgongs pa bzang po las mi g.yo ba ste /
NK106(me)012:2875: phyag 'tshal ba ni don de rtogs par bya'o zhes pa'o //
NK106(me)012:2877: dpal ni rig pa byang chub kyi sems cog gzhag chos sku'i dgongs pa'o //
NK106(me)012:2878: kun du ni dus rtag par de'i ngang las mi 'da' bar byed pa'o //
NK106(me)012:2879: bzang po ni chos sku'i ngang las ma 'das na
NK106(me)012:2880: snang sems thams cad ye grol rdzogs pa chen po'i
NK106(me)012:2882: phyag 'tshal lo ni sgom pa chos nyid kyi klong
NK106(me)012:2883: du phebs par bya ba la brtson par bya zhes
NK106(me)012:2885: dpal ni thog ma'i mgon po ste 'khor 'das kun
NK106(me)012:2886: gyi bla mar byon pas lhun grub rin po che
NK106(me)012:2887: gsang ba'i sbubs na nang gsal sku dang ye shes
NK106(me)012:2889: kun du ni de'i ngang las stug po bkod par nges pa lnga ldan gyi bkod pa ston pa'o //
NK106(me)012:2890: bzang po ni de'i ngang las thugs rje chen pos
NK106(me)012:2891: 'gro drug so so'i gnas su thub pa drug gi
NK106(me)012:2893: phyag 'tshal ba ni gus pas 'bul ba ste /
NK106(me)012:2895: ye shes dbyings las mi gzhan phyir //
NK106(me)012:2896: thugs rje chen pos 'brel bas na //
NK106(me)012:2897: 'gro drug dus gnas ma lus snang //
NK106(me)012:2899: phyag rgyas par bshad pa ni /
NK106(me)012:2900: gang gi rang bzhin la sogs pa ste nam mkha'
NK106(me)012:2901: la nyi ma shar ba dang sbyar nas sangs rgyas
NK106(me)012:2902: dang byang chub sems dpa' la basngagasa pa ni gzugs
NK106(me)012:2904: brtsam par dam bca' ba ni /
NK106(me)012:2905: skal bzang la sogs pa ste /
NK106(me)012:2906: bya ba rang bzhin brjod pa'i rgyan gyis bstan bcos kyi don 'grol bar khas blangs pa'o //
NK106(me)012:2908: yongs su rdzogs pa mjug gi don ni 'grel pa dang bsdus don gyi gnas bzhin no //
NK106(me)012:2909: spyi don gsum pa chos thams cad bden med rang
NK106(me)012:2910: snang du ston pa rdzogs pa chen po sgyu ma
NK106(me)012:2911: ngal gso 'grel pa dang bcas pa rgya cher bshad
NK106(me)012:2913: 'grel pa bshad pa la 'jug pa'i rgyu brjod pa /
NK106(me)012:2914: 'jug yul lus kyi don rgya cher bshad pa /
NK106(me)012:2915: yongs su rdzogs pa mjug gi don no //
NK106(me)012:2918: phyag gis mchod par brjod pa /
NK106(me)012:2923: gang la mtshan du btags pa dang gsum las /
NK106(me)012:2924: dang po ni 'phags pa'i yul dbus 'gyur 'chang /
NK106(me)012:2935: sgyu ma ni bden med kyi chos te /
NK106(me)012:2936: ma dag pa 'khor ba'i sgyu ma 'gron po thang chad pa lta bu dang /
NK106(me)012:2937: dag pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgyu ma dbyings
NK106(me)012:2938: 'od gsal gyi bden pa bsti gnas bzang po lta
NK106(me)012:2939: bu gnyis te / gsang snying las /
NK106(me)012:2940: yang dag sgyu ma'i tshul gnyis su //
NK106(me)012:2942: ngal gso ni mthar thug ka dag dang /
NK106(me)012:2943: gnas skabs chos nyid spros pa dang bral ba'i bsti
NK106(me)012:2944: gnas bzang po der blo rang mal du gnas pa'i
NK106(me)012:2945: don to // 'grel pa dang shing rta ni sngar bzhin no //
