NK106(me)012:2946: bzang po ni mchog dam pa phul du gyur pa'o zhes bya ba ni mtshams sbyor ba ste /
NK106(me)012:2947: mtshan de lta bu dang gzhung don gnyis don gcig par ston pa /
NK106(me)012:2948: bum pa zhes pa dang lto ldir gnyis gcig par ston pa bzhin no //
NK106(me)012:2949: gang la mtshan du btags pa ni /
NK106(me)012:2950: sgyu ma ngal gso don dang /
NK106(me)012:2951: shing rta bzang po dpe don tshogs pa la btags pa'o //
NK106(me)012:2954: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo zhes pas /
NK106(me)012:2955: dpal ni longs sku nges pa lnga ldan /
NK106(me)012:2956: rdo rje ni sku 'pho 'gyur med pa /
NK106(me)012:2957: sems dpa' ni sprul sku ma nges sna tshogs te /
NK106(me)012:2958: sku gsum byang chub mchog gi go 'phang brnyes pa'i
NK106(me)012:2959: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang rdo rje sems dpa' kun
NK106(me)012:2960: du bzang po thog mtha' med pa'i ston pa la
NK106(me)012:2963: rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
NK106(me)012:2964: rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa kun //
NK106(me)012:2965: rdo rje dang po kun du bzang //
NK106(me)012:2966: phyag 'tshal phyag na rdo rje la'o //
NK106(me)012:2968: phyag rgyas par bshad pa ni /
NK106(me)012:2969: gdod nas byang chub la sogs pa ste /
NK106(me)012:2970: yon tan rang bzhin brjod pa'i rgyan gyis bla ma
NK106(me)012:2971: dang sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
NK106(me)012:2972: basngagasa pa'o // brtsam par dam bca' ba ni /
NK106(me)012:2973: gdul bya'i khams dang la sogs pa ste /
NK106(me)012:2974: yon tan dang rdzas rang bzhin brjod pa'i rgyan gnyis
NK106(me)012:2975: rab spel gyi rgyan du bkod pas gzhan don du
NK106(me)012:2976: rtsa ba'i don 'grel par dam bcas pa'o //
NK106(me)012:2978: mtshan bkod pas bstan bcos btsal sla ba dang rgya bod don mthun par shes la /
NK106(me)012:2979: phyag 'tshal bas rtsom pa mthar phyin pa dang /
NK106(me)012:2980: gzhan rjes su zhugs pas tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa dang /
NK106(me)012:2981: ston pa la dad cing bstan bcos la 'jug par 'dod pa'i 'dun pa bskyed pa ste /
NK106(me)012:2982: slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas /
NK106(me)012:2983: bstan bcos byed pas ston pa la //
NK106(me)012:2984: mchod par brjod pa 'bras med min //
NK106(me)012:2985: ston pa dang ni bstan bcos la //
NK106(me)012:2986: dad 'dun bskyed par bya phyir ro //
NK106(me)012:2988: rtsom par dam bcas pas mthar phyin par 'gyur la /
NK106(me)012:2989: bar skabs su skyo ba dang bya dka' ba la sogs pa'i rkyen gyis mi 'phrogs par byed pas /
NK106(me)012:2990: khas blangs pa dang dam bcas pa dag nyam 'og tu chud par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
NK106(me)012:2991: skyes bu dam pa khur lci khur ba dang //
NK106(me)012:2992: nyam nga'i gnas su nam yang 'dor mi byed //
NK106(me)012:2994: gnyis pa 'jug yul lus kyi don dang /
NK106(me)012:2995: yongs su rdzogs pa mjug gi don ni 'grel pa dang bsdus don gyi skabs bzhin no //
NK106(me)012:2996: 'di dag gi tshe don gyi 'grel dgod pa sbal pa'i 'phar stangs dang /
NK106(me)012:2997: tshig gi 'bru gzhol ba rus sbal gyi nur 'gros dang /
NK106(me)012:2998: skabs kyi don bsdu ba glang po che'i 'gying lta
NK106(me)012:2999: bu dang gsum gyis bcings nas bshad pa ni 'chad
NK106(me)012:3000: pa'i man ngag me tog gi 'phreng ba lta bu
NK106(me)012:3001: sbyin pa'o // de ltar bshad thabs yan lag nges pa'i don //
NK106(me)012:3002: zab cing rgya che don gsal yid du 'ong //
NK106(me)012:3003: theg mchog dam pa rab tu mdzes byed pa //
NK106(me)012:3004: me tog phreng ba ma brnyings gsal bar spel //
NK106(me)012:3005: thos pa'i sprin chen rab tu bzang po las //
NK106(me)012:3006: legs bshad 'brug sgra phyogs kyi mthar khyab pa //
NK106(me)012:3007: tshig don rnam bkra'i glog gi 'phreng ba can //
NK106(me)012:3008: gzhan don byed pa mtha' yas char chen 'bebs //
NK106(me)012:3009: 'di ni dpal ldan dga' ba'i skyed mos tshal //
NK106(me)012:3010: thos bsam ting 'dzin me tog rgyun chags pa //
NK106(me)012:3011: nyer bkra'i rang bzhin 'gro kun ngal gso'i gnas //
NK106(me)012:3012: byang chub lam bzang gsal bar byed pa la //
NK106(me)012:3013: tshul 'di theg mchog snying po'i rnal 'byor pa //
NK106(me)012:3014: blo dang thos pa'i 'dab stong rgyas pa des //
NK106(me)012:3015: gangs ri thod dkar rin chen snying po'i mgul //
NK106(me)012:3016: o rgyan rdzong zhes bya ba'i gnas su bkod //
NK106(me)012:3017: dge ba 'di yis bdag dang 'gro ba kun //
NK106(me)012:3018: dam chos rin chen shing rta mchog zhugs te //
NK106(me)012:3019: 'khor ba'i mya ngam thang las rab brgal nas //
NK106(me)012:3020: thar pa'i grong du dga' ston 'phel bar shog //
NK106(me)012:3021: bde gshegs bstan pa dar zhing rgyas par shog //
NK106(me)012:3022: bshes gnyen mchog rnams sku tshe ring bar shog //
NK106(me)012:3023: dam chos mchog 'dis gzhan don mtha' yas shog //
NK106(me)012:3024: phyogs dus kun du bkra shis bde legs shog //
NK106(me)012:3025: theg pa chen po'i man ngag gi bstan bcos ngal
NK106(me)012:3026: gso skor gsum gyi spyi'i don legs par bshad pa'i
NK106(me)012:3028: yul byang phyogs kyi rgyud gangs ri ra ba'i skyed mos tshal du skyes pa /
NK106(me)012:3029: bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung rab kyi gnas la mang
NK106(me)012:3030: du thos pa'i chos smra ba kun mkhyen ngag gi
NK106(me)012:3031: dbang pos sbyar ba rdzogs so //
